name: Absol
notes: All of Absol's attacks and damaging moves can critically strike. Absol's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Super Luck
skills.description: Increased Critical-Hit rate by 15%.

rsb.name: Super Luck
rsb.true_desc: Increases Critical-Hit rate by 15%.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage to enemies and lowering their Defense by 15% for 2s when it hits. If this boosted attack hits only a single target, it deals increased damage.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage to enemies and lowering their Defense by 15% for 2s when it hits. If this boosted attack hits only a single target, it deals increased damage.

skills.name: Feint
skills.description: Dash in an arc, attacking enemies that come in contact with Absol. This move ignores the defense stat and shield effects of enemies.

rsb.name: Feint
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Absol dashes in an arc, damaging all enemies hit and increasing attack speed by 60% for 0.5s. Each use alternates between a left and right arc. Feint ignores the target’s Defense and bypasses all shields.

upgrades.name: Night Slash
upgrades.description1: Dash in an outward arc, dealing damage to enemies. If this first attack hits, a second attack can also be performed. The second attack has the user dash straight ahead, dealing damage to enemies and increasing the user's critical-hit rate. The lower the enemies HP, the more the user's critical-hit rate is increased.
upgrades.description2: Using this move again will restore the user's HP.

rsb.name: Night Slash
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Absol dashes in an arc, damaging the first Pokémon hit and increasing attack speed by 60% for 0.5s. If Absol hits, this ability can be activated within 6s – allowing Absol to dash again, dealing damage to all enemies hit and increasing attack speed once again. The second hit also has 30% increased Critical-Hit Rate on enemies below 50% max HP.
rsb.notes: Cooldown on Hit or without recasting is 6s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Absol heals for 50% of damage dealt on the second hit, including critical hits.

upgrades.name: Pursuit
upgrades.description1: Dash to the designated location and quickly charge an enemy with the next basic attack. (Basic attack range is doubled while this effect is active). If the basic attack lands from behind, its damage is increased and this move's cooldown is reduced.
upgrades.description2: Increased movement speed.

rsb.name: Pursuit
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Absol dashes to a location, and dashes to an enemy with its next auto attack. If Absol hits the back of the target, this ability's cooldown is reduced by 80%. If it fails to hit the back, damage is reduced. The next auto attack stays empowered for 3s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Absol gains 35% increased movement speed for 2s after the initial dash.

skills.name: Slash
skills.description: Slash with sharp claws in front of the user, increasing this move's critical-hit rate.

rsb.name: Slash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Absol quickly slashes in front of themself, damaging any enemy hit by the slash. Slash has an increased critical-hit rate by 15%.

upgrades.name: Psycho Cut
upgrades.description1: Attack with blades formed by psychic power that decrease the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits. Also increases basic attack damage dealt to the affected enemy for up to 3 attacks after this move hits.
upgrades.description2: Also increases movement speed for a short time when the user gets close to the enemy that this move hit.

rsb.name: Psycho Cut
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Hit
rsb.true_desc: Throw a wide slash forward; damaging and slowing enemies hit by 90% for 2s. This slow decreases by 25% every 0.5s. Enemies hit are marked for 5s with 3 cleansable marks. The first two deal 2x damage when triggered, the third deals 3x damage. When Absol deals damage to a marked enemy, a mark is consumed, dealing extra damage.
rsb.notes: All damage dealt by Psycho Cut or its marks have a 15% increased Critical-Hit Rate.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases Absol's movement speed by 20% when near a debuffed enemy.

upgrades.name: Sucker Punch
upgrades.description1: Look for an opening to attack an enemy, decreasing the movement speed of the user and the target enemy for the duration. After a short time, charge forward to attack the enemy. However, if the user receives damage or gets attacked before it charges, attack immediately and shove the enemy.
upgrades.description2: Increases basic attack speed for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Sucker Punch
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Absol targets an enemy and enters a counter stance for 1s, decreasing the movement speed of the target enemy and Absol by 50% for the duration and negating all damage and effects of the next attack on Absol. While in counter stance, if Absol is attacked or the target attacks, Absol immediately exits counter stance and leaps behind the target, stunning it and dealing damage. If the attack is not triggered before the counter stance expires, Absol leaps behind the target dealing damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases Attack Speed by 40% for 3s after using this move.

skills.name: Midnight Slash
skills.buffs: 80% Movement Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Unleashes a flurry of slashes in front of the user. This move ends by unleashing powerful blades of energy, dealing increased damage to enemies and shoves them.

rsb.name: Midnight Slash
rsb.label: Damage - Full (6 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Unleash a flurry of 5 slashes in front of Absol and become untargetable for 1.15s. This move ends by unleashing powerful blades of energy, shoving enemies and dealing damage up to 4 times at melee range and down to 1 time at maximum range. Only the first ending hit connecting with an enemy does full damage, the others, deal 30% damage to the same target.

name: Aegislash
notes: Auto attacks, Shadow Claw, and Iron Head (after using Shadow Claw+) can critically strike. While in Shield Stance however, boosted attacks do not critically strike. Aegislash's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: No Guard
skills.description: Honedge and Doublade do not gain the stat benefits of Stance Change. However, their boosted attack functions like Aegislash's Sword Stance boosted attack.
skills.passive2_description: Aegislash can switch between Sword Stance and Shield Stance. Using a blade move switches stance to Sword Stance; which increases Attack, movement speed by 5%, and Attack Speed by 15%. Using a shield move switches stance to Shield Stance; which increases Defense and Sp. Defense and reduces Attack Speed by 20%. After switching stances, movement speed and basic attack speed are further increased by 15% for 3.5s.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Slash at enemies in front of Aegislash, dealing damage to them. If the boost count is one or more, basic attacks become a boosted attack. When in Blade Stance: pierce through enemies, dealing damage. When in Shield Stance: ram enemies, dealing damage and leaving them unable to act for a short time, restore HP, and reduce the cooldown of Sacred Sword and Shadow Claw when this attack hits. Every boosted attack consumes one boost count. Up to 4 boosted boosted attacks can be stored.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Slash at enemies in front of Aegislash, dealing damage to them. If the boost count is one or more, auto attacks become a boosted attack. When in Sword Stance or No Guard: pierce through enemies, dealing damage. When in Shield Stance: ram enemies, dealing damage and leaving them unable to act for .1s, restore HP, and reduce the cooldown of Sacred Sword and Shadow Claw by 1s when this attack hits. Every boosted attack consumes one boost count. Up to 4 boosted attacks can be stored.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Deals an additional 7% of the enemies Max HP as damage.
rsb.add1_notes: Against Wild Pokemon: The additional damage from maximum HP is capped at 1000.

skills.name: Shadow Sneak
skills.description: Cast a shadow in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. After the shadow hits an enemy or travels its maximum distance, Aegislash warps to the shadow’s location, dealing damage to nearby enemies and increase boost count by 1.

rsb.name: Shadow Sneak
rsb.label: Damage - 2 Hits
rsb.true_desc: Cast a shadow in the designated direction dealing damage to enemies hit. After the shadow hits an enemy or travels its maximum distance, Aegislash warps to the shadow’s location, dealing damage to nearby enemies and increase boost count by 1.

upgrades.name: Sacred Sword
upgrades.description1: Aegislash thrusts its blade into the ground, creating a triangular zone. This zone erupts with a hidden power, dealing damage to enemies in the area and throws them. Also increases boost count by 1 for each enemy hit (capped at 2 for wilds, 4 for players). At the same time as the eruption, Aegislash slashes forward, dealing additional damage to enemies hit. For a short time after this slash hits, damage dealt by Aegislash partially ignores the Defense of all enemies.
upgrades.description2: Increase Attack for a short time after hitting enemies with this move.

rsb.name: Sacred Sword
rsb.label: Damage - Triangle Attack
rsb.true_desc: Aegislash thrusts its blade into the ground creating a triangular zone. This zone erupts with a hidden power, dealing damage to enemies in the area and throws them in the air for .6s. Also increases boost count by 1 for each enemy hit (capped at 2 for wilds, 4 for players). At the same time as the eruption, Aegislash slashes forward, dealing additional damage to enemies hit. For 3s after this slash hits, damage dealt by Aegislash ignores 25% of the enemy Defense.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increase Attack by 50 for 3s after hitting enemies with the triangle attack.

upgrades.name: Shadow Claw
upgrades.description1: Aegislash slashes with its blade twice in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. Follow up with a final rising slash that deals damage to enemies hit and throw them. Boost count increases by 1 when at least one of the three slashes hits.
upgrades.description2: Increases Critical-Hit Rate with all attacks and moves except for Coup de Grace for a short time.

rsb.name: Shadow Claw
rsb.label: Damage - First 2 Hits
rsb.true_desc: Aegislash slashes with its blade twice in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. Follow up with a final rising slash that deals damage to enemies hit and throws them in the air for .75s. Boost count increases by 1 when at least one of the three slashes hits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases Critical-Hit Rate by 20% for 1s (This move does not benefit).

skills.name: Iron Defense
skills.description: Envelops Aegislash in a powerful protective force for 1s. The protection disappears after blocking one attack or after 1s and then increases boost count by 1.

rsb.name: Iron Defense
rsb.true_desc: Envelops Aegislash in a powerful protective force for 3s or after blocking one attack. If this move blocks an attack, increase boost count by 1.

upgrades.name: Wide Guard
upgrades.description1: Focus in place for a short time to create a great shield on Aegislash. When this shield appears, boost count increases by 1, granting a shield to Aegislash and shoves enemies in front. While this shield is active, enemy player attacks increase boost count by 1 for each different enemy player (capping at 4). When this move ends, shove enemies in front of Aegislash once again.
upgrades.description2: Cooldown reduced by 1s.

rsb.name: Wide Guard
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Focus in place for a short time to create a great shield on Aegislash for 1.2s. When this great shield appears, boost count increases by 1, grants a shield to Aegislash and shoves enemies in front. While the shield persists, Aegislash is Unstoppable and incoming damage increases boost count by 1 for each different source (capping at 2). When this move ends, shove enemies for .75s in front of Aegislash once again and slow them by 45% for 2s.
rsb.notes: Gain 1 boosted count if the shove at the end hits at least one enemy. If the great shield is depleted before the duration of this move ends, the boosted count is granted regardless of whether an enemy is hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Cooldown reduced by 1s.

upgrades.name: Iron Head
upgrades.description1: Dash in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. Also increases boost count by 1, and protects Aegislash with a special shield for a short time afterward. This shield doesn’t protect from hindrances, but it can nullify damage. When the shield blocks an attack, it disappears and boost count is increased by 1.
upgrades.description2: Increase Attack for a short time after blocking an attack.

rsb.name: Iron Head
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dash in the designated direction dealing damage to enemies hit. Also increases boost count by 1, and protects Aegislash with a special shield for 1s afterward. This shield doesn’t protect from hindrances, but it can nullify damage. When the shield blocks an attack, it disappears, the cooldown is reduced by 3s, and boost count is increased by 1.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: If an attack is blocked with this move, Aegislash gains +10% Attack for 3s.

skills.name: Coup de Grace
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Unleash a ground-splitting slash in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. The lower their remaining HP, the more damage this move deals. If this slash knocks out an enemy, boost count increases by 1.

rsb.name: Coup de Grace
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Unleash a ground-splitting slash in the designated direction dealing damage to enemies hit and switching to Sword Stance. The lower their remaining HP, the more damage this move deals. If this slash knocks out an enemy, boost count increases by 2.
rsb.add1_notes: Against Wild Pokémon: The additional damage from missing HP is capped at 1000.

name: Azumarill
notes: All attacks and damaging moves can critically strike, but the damage is 150% instead of 200%.

skills.name: Huge Power
skills.description: When this Pokémon hits only a single enemy with a basic attack, a move, or their Unite Move, the hit is always a critical hit. However, when hitting two or more enemies at once with a basic attack, a move, or its Unite Move, the hits are never critical hits.

rsb.name: Huge Power
rsb.true_desc: When this Pokémon hits only a single enemy with an auto attack, a move, or their Unite Move, the hit is always a critical hit. However, when hitting two or more enemies at once with an auto attack, a move, or its Unite Move, the hits are never critical hits.
rsb.notes: Critical hits deal 150% rather than 200%.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage to enemies within a cone area of effect in front of this Pokémon.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage to enemies within a cone area of effect in front of this Pokémon.

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: Charge forward, dealing damage to any enemy hit and leave them unable to act for a short time.

rsb.name: Tackle
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charge forward; dealing damage to any enemy hit and leave them unable to act for a short time.

upgrades.name: Play Rough
upgrades.description1: Increases movement speed for a short time and changes the next basic attack. When Azumarill performs their next basic attack, lunge at one enemy in range and deliver repeated blows; dealing damage to that target and leave it unable to act for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Further increases movement speed when this move is used, and also reduces this move’s cooldown.

rsb.name: Play Rough
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (3 hits)
rsb.true_desc: Increase movement speed by 35% for 4s and change the next auto attack. When performing the next auto attack, lunge at one enemy in range and deliver repeated blows dealing damage to that target and leave it unable to act for .75s.
rsb.notes: Using Play Rough will overwrite any active Aqua Tail attack change. Play Rough attacks count as auto attacks for the purpose of items, lifesteal and other benefits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Further increases movement speed when this move is used, and also reduces this move’s cooldown by 1s.

upgrades.name: Water Pulse
upgrades.description1: Shoot a pulsing blast of water in front of Azumarill. When the blast of water hits an enemy, decrease that Pokémon’s movement speed and deal damage to all enemies in an area of effect around the initial target hit. The blast of water then automatically bounces to another target if one is available. Including the first target, the blast of water can bounce between up to 3 targets consecutively, and each hit behaves in the same way as the first. While the blast of water is traveling, Azumarill can perform a short rolling dash in a designated direction.
upgrades.description2: Increase the maximum number of targets that the blast of water can bounce between by 2.

rsb.name: Water Pulse
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Shoot a pulsing blast of water in front of Azumarill. When the blast of water hits an enemy, decrease their movement speed for 2s and deal damage to all enemies in an area of effect around the initial target. The blast of water then automatically bounces to another target if one is available. Including the first target, the blast of water can bounce between up to three targets consecutively, and each hit behaves in the same way as the first.
rsb.notes: While the blast of water is traveling, Azumarill can perform a short rolling dash in a designated direction.

skills.name: Bubble
skills.description: Spray bubbles in a cone; dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed for a short time. This move can be used while moving.

rsb.name: Bubble
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Hit
rsb.true_desc: Spray bubbles in a cone dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. This move can be used while moving.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Subsequent hits on the same target deal 25% damage.

upgrades.name: Whirlpool
upgrades.description1: For a short time, four small whirlpools appear that swirl around Azumarill as they move. If a whirlpool hits an enemy, the whirlpool deals damage and restores Azumarill's HP. If a whirlpool hits an enemy player, an increased amount of HP is restored.
upgrades.description2: Reduce this move’s cooldown and increases the amount of HP it restored.

rsb.name: Whirlpool
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit
rsb.true_desc: For a short time, four small whirlpools appear that swirl around Azumarill as it moves. If a whirlpool hits an enemy, the whirlpool deals damage to them and restores Azumarill's HP. If a whirlpool hits an enemy player, an increased amount of HP is restored.
rsb.notes: Moving clockwise against your target will grant more hits against that target, and counter-clockwise will reduce the number of hits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move’s cooldown by 2s and increases the amount of HP restored.

upgrades.name: Aqua Tail
upgrades.description1: Increases the speed and area of effect of Azumarill's next 3 basic attacks. If these basic attacks hit from a distance, they also deal increased damage, restore Azumarill's HP, and can ignore the Defense stat and shield effects of enemies hit.
upgrades.description2: After activating this move, Azumarill's next 3 basic attacks will also reduce the cooldown of all moves when they hit an enemy from a distance.

rsb.name: Aqua Tail
rsb.label: Damage - Basic (Close Range)
rsb.true_desc: Increase area-of-effect and attack speed for the next three auto attacks for 6s. If these auto attacks hit from a distance, they also deal increased damage and restore HP. Using Aqua Tail will overwrite any active Play Rough attack change.
rsb.notes: Aqua Tail attacks count as auto attacks for the purpose of items, lifesteal and other benefits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Aqua Tail attacks that hit an enemy from a distance reduce the cooldown of all moves by 0.8s per enemy hit.

skills.name: Belly Bash
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Azumarill pounds their belly 3 times, granting a shield. With each pound, Azumarill loses HP in exchange for increased Attack. Azumarill can move while pounding their belly. Afterward, target an enemy and then charge at the target; dealing damage to them and throwing all enemies hit while charging.

rsb.name: Belly Bash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Azumarill targets a Pokémon and then pounds their belly three times; losing 5% remaining HP with each pound in exchange for a 5% max HP shield that stacks with each pound and lasts 6s. Azumarill also gains increased Attack for 5s and can move while pounding their belly. Azumarill then charges at the target damaging and throwing all Pokémon hit while charging and Pokémon within the area effect around the target.

name: Blastoise
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Blastoise has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Torrent
skills.description: When the Pokémon is at half HP or less, its Attack and Sp. Attack are increased.

rsb.name: Torrent
rsb.true_desc: Increases Attack and Sp. Attack by 20% while at half HP or less.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Blastoise’s third auto attack is empowered - dealing 3 instances of damage, slowing enemies hit and reducing Blastoise’s move cooldowns by 1 second each.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing 3 instances of damage, slowing enemies hit by 50% for 1s, and reducing Blastoise’s move cooldowns by 1s.
rsb.add1_true_desc: When evolving into Blastoise, auto attacks now strike twice for 50% Atk.

skills.name: Water Gun
skills.description: Attacks with a shot of water, shoving enemies and decreasing their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Water Gun
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise shoots a jet of water in a straight line; damaging, knocking back, and stunning enemies hit for 0.5s. Enemies hit are also slowed by 30% for 1s.

upgrades.name: Hydro Pump
upgrades.description1: Has the user attack by blasing out a huge volume of water, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon and shoving them when it hits.
upgrades.description2: Increases damage dealt by this move.

rsb.name: Hydro Pump
rsb.label: Damage (3 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise shoots a large amount of water, damaging, knocking back, and stunning enemies hit for 0.5s.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Blastoise unleashes a large burst of water in a radius around themself, damaging, stunning, and knocking back enemies hit. Blastoise also gains a 30% movement speed bonus for the duration of this move.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

upgrades.name: Water Spout
upgrades.description1: Spouts water toward the designated location, decreasing the movement speed of opposing Pokémon in the area of effect for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increases damage dealt by this move.

rsb.name: Water Spout
rsb.label: Damage - Area (6 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise calls down a barrage of water in a targeted radius. Enemies within the radius are struck 6 times over 3s, damaging and slowing them by 30% for 1s (refreshing every hit).
rsb.add1_label: Damage - Area (17 Hits) During Rapid Spin
rsb.add1_true_desc: Blastoise rapidly unleashes bursts of water in a radius around themselves dealing up to 17 instances of damage over the duration of Rapid Spin. Blastoise also gains a 30% movement speed bonus for the duration of this move.
rsb.add1_notes: The move button must be held for the duration of Rapid spin in order to trigger all of the additional attacks.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.
rsb.enhanced_add1_label: Damage - Area (17 Hits) During Rapid Spin

skills.name: Skull Bash
skills.description: Fiercely rams an opposing Pokémon and leaves it unable to act.

rsb.name: Skull Bash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise dashes forward damaging and stunning all enemies hit for 0.5s.

upgrades.name: Surf
upgrades.description1: Has the user charge forward on a wave, shoving enemies and leaving them unable to act. The user becomes immune to hindrances while using this move and can jump in a designated direction once this move ends.
upgrades.description2: Also grants a shield when this move hits.

rsb.name: Surf
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise rides a large wave in the designated direction damaging, knocking back, and stunning enemies hit for 1.6s. Blastoise is unstoppable while surfing, and once it ends, Blastoise can jump in a designated direction. The wave continues for a short duration after leaping off and the wave continues to knock back enemies hit but inflicts no damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Blastoise gains a small shield for 4s when hitting an enemy with Surf.

upgrades.name: Rapid Spin
upgrades.description1: Has the user spin rapidly, changing the mechanics of its basic attacks as well as its Hydro Pump and Water Spout moves.
upgrades.description2: Also reduces the damage the user receives while using this move.

rsb.name: Rapid Spin
rsb.label: Damage (10 hits)
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise withdraws into its shell and begins rapidly spinning for 5.5s resetting the cooldown of its other move. Blastoise resists hindrances for the duration of Rapid Spin and can freely move about the battlefield. While spinning, Blastoise will damage nearby enemies. Blastoise’s next auto attack after Rapid Spin ends becomes boosted. For the duration of Rapid Spin, the mechanics of Blastoise’s auto attacks as well as Hydro Pump and Water Spout are changed. Blastoise may exit Rapid Spin by re-entering the input used to enter Rapid Spin
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Blastoise gains a massive amount of Def and SpDef for the duration of the spin.

skills.name: Hydro Typhoon
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 40% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Has the user spout water to attack while spinning, throwing enemies in a large area. This also grants the user a shield.

rsb.name: Hydro Typhoon
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise gains a shield for 4s and sweeps powerful water jets in a large circle around itself dealing massive damage and throwing enemies hit into the air for 1.5s.

name: Blissey
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Blissey has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Natural Cure
skills.description: Removes all status condition from the Pokémon. This ability goes on cooldown after it's triggered.

rsb.name: Natural Cure
rsb.true_desc: Every 6s Blissey will automatically cleanse themselves. Natural Cure will activate even if Blissey has no active debuffs.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack after a set amount of time passes, dealing increased damage.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Whenever Natural Cure activates, Blissey's next attack will become boosted, dealing increased damage.

skills.name: Pound
skills.description: Has the user attack by pounding in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time when it hits.

rsb.name: Pound
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blissey pounds in a designated direction damaging and slowing enemies hit by 40% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Egg Bomb
upgrades.description1: Hurls an egg at the designated location. The egg then explodes, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and throwing them.
upgrades.description2: Also decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when they are thrown by this move.

rsb.name: Egg Bomb
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blissey hurls an egg at a location which explodes; damaging and throwing enemies in the radius for .8s. Holds 2 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 2s.
rsb.notes: When learning Soft-Boiled and Egg Bomb, gain 2 additional charges for Soft-Boiled. Charges are shared between both moves. Base cooldown becomes 5s for both moves and time between using the same move remains a 2s cooldown.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also slows enemies by 40% for 2s after they're thrown.

upgrades.name: Helping Hand
upgrades.description1: For a short time, greatly increases the user's and nearby allies movement speed and basic attack speed. While this move's effects last, all of the user's basic attacks become boosted attacks.
upgrades.description2: Increases the damage of basic attacks while this move's effects last.

rsb.name: Helping Hand
rsb.true_desc: Blissey greatly improves movement speed and auto attack speed for self and allies by 35% for 3s. During this duration, all of Blissey's auto attacks are boosted. After this bonus expires, Blissey loses any boosted attack that was granted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also increases auto attack damage for all those affected by 15% for 3s.

skills.name: Heal Pulse
skills.description: Continually restores the user's and designated ally HP for a short time.

rsb.name: Heal Pulse
rsb.label: Healing (4x)
rsb.true_desc: Blissey continually restores HP as well as the HP of a designated ally for 2s, healing every 0.5s.

upgrades.name: Soft-Boiled
upgrades.description1: Throws an egg to an ally, restoring its HP as well as the user's HP. A maximum of 3 uses can be kept in reserve for this move and cannot be used more than once every 2s.
upgrades.description2: Increases the maximum number of uses that can be kept in reserve.

rsb.name: Soft Boiled
rsb.label: Healing
rsb.true_desc: Blissey throws an egg to an ally, healing Blissey and the designated ally. Additionally healing every 1s for 2s afterwards. Additional Soft Boiled uses before these 2s will overwrite the previous egg's additional healing over time. Holds 2 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 2s.
rsb.notes: When learning Soft-Boiled and Egg Bomb, gain 2 additional charges for Soft-Boiled. Charges are shared between both moves. Base cooldown becomes 5s for both moves and time between using the same move remains a 2s cooldown.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Gain an additional charge.

upgrades.name: Safeguard
upgrades.description1: Blissey grants both the targeted ally and themself a shield, purging hindrances and making both immune to hindrances as long as the shield lasts.
upgrades.description2: Shield value increased.

rsb.name: Safeguard
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Blissey grants both the targeted ally and themself a shield for 3s, purging hindrances and making both immune to hindrances until the shield is removed (3s shield duration).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Shield value increased.

skills.name: Bliss Assistance
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Has the user dash to the designated ally to give it an egg, granting that ally a shield and increasing its Attack and Sp. Attack for a short time. The user also intercepts a portion of the damage received by that ally for a short time. While dashing, the user throws nearby enemies and those it comes in contact with.

rsb.name: Bliss Assistance
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blissey dashes to the designated ally to give it an egg, granting that ally a shield and increasing their Attack and Sp. Attack by 20% for 6s. Blissey also intercepts 50% of the damage received by that ally for 6s. While dashing, throw hit enemies into the air for .8s. When reaching the target ally, deal additional damage to all nearby enemies.

name: Buzzwole

builds.name: Super Smack
builds.explanation: For Non-stacking, replace Attack Weight with Weakness Policy and Aeos Cookie with Focus Band

builds.name: Super Lunge
builds.explanation: For Non-stacking, replace Attack Weight with Weakness Policy and Aeos Cookie with Focus Band

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Buzzwole's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

rsb.name: Beast Boost
rsb.true_desc: When Buzzwole knocks out an enemy player, movement speed is increased by 100% and basic attack speed increased by 50% for 3s. When Buzzwole assists in knocking out an enemy player, movement speed is increased by 50% and basic attack speed increased by 25% for 3s. Each time Buzzwole hits an enemy with basic attacks, Mega Punch, Lunge, or Smack Down - muscle gauge increases. Conversely, when Buzzwole is not in combat with enemy players, muscle gauge depletes by 1 increment every 5s. Up to 6 muscle gauge increments can be stored.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Each time a basic attack hits an enemy, increase muscle gauge by 1 increment. Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, throwing two consecutive punches while restoring Buzzwole's HP and increasing muscle gauge by 1 increment for each hit.

rsb.name: Mega Punch
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Jump in the designated direction before slamming the ground with a powerful punch. The shock from the punch deals damage to enemies in the area. If this move hits an enemy, muscle gauge increases by 1 increment for each enemy hit.

rsb.name: Lunge
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Lunge in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies, decreasing their Attack by 30% for 2s and slowing them by 30% for 1s. If this move hits an enemy, muscle gauge increases by 1 increment for each enemy hit. After this move is used, Buzzwole's basic attack speed is increased by 30% for 2s. Holds 2 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 1s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Whenever this move hits enemy players, Buzzwole's Attack increases by 10% for 2s for each player hit (up to a max of 5 stacks).

rsb.name: Smack Down
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Hit
rsb.true_desc: Deliver an uppercut punch to an enemy in the designated direction, dealing damage and throwing them into the air. While the enemy is airborne, the user can activate this move again to perform a follow-up attack that smacks the target to the ground, dealing damage to all enemies in an area centered on the airborne enemy. When this move deals damage, muscle gauge increases by 2 increments for each enemy hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Widens the area-of-effect in which damage is dealt when the grappled enemy slams the ground. Additionally, muscle gauge will now increase by 3 increments for each enemy player hit from the slam.

rsb.name: Fell Stinger
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Consumes the entire muscle gauge and has the user deal damage to an enemy in the designated direction, briefly shoving and stunning them for .2s. The damage dealt by this move increases for each muscle gauge increment consumed at a rate of 12.5% per increment. If this move knocks out an enemy, the user recovers 10% of maximum HP.

rsb.name: Leech Life
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick
rsb.true_desc: Grab and restrain an enemy in the designated direction, dealing damage-over-time while restoring Buzzwole's HP. When this move is used, consume the user's entire muscle gauge. The number of hits and the amount of damage dealt per hit increases for each muscle gauge increment consumed. Number of hits starts at 4 and increases by 1 per 2 increments of muscle gauge consumed. Initial damage increases by 1.5% per muscle gauge increment. This move ends if Buzzwole becomes unable to act for any reason or if the restrained enemy escapes by using an Eject Button or through some other means.
rsb.notes: Against Unstoppable Targets: Only 1 instance of damage and healing will occur, equal to 5 hits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also causes each instance of damage dealt by this move to be stronger than the last by 5% additively.

rsb.name: Superpower
rsb.label: Damage - Initial
rsb.true_desc: Consumes the entire muscle gauge and has the user run in the designated direction and grab an enemy. The user then slams the target down on the ground at full strength, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and granting a shield.
rsb.notes: The damage dealt by this move is increased at a rate of 12.5% per muscle gauge increment.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Resets the cooldown of this move when the user's muscle gauge reaches maximum.

skills.name: Ultra Swole Slam
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Ultra Swole Slam
rsb.label: Damage - Sweep
rsb.true_desc: Buzzwole flies at high speed, dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect. Afterward, the user targets the enemy with the lowest percentage of HP remaining among those hit and charges down at them from the sky, dealing area damage once again and additional damage to the targeted enemy based on their missing HP.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokemon: Missing HP damage is not dealt.

name: Chandelure
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Chandelure has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

rsb.name: Infiltrator
rsb.true_desc: When this Pokémon deals damage, receive a stacking buff that makes Special damage dealt by this Pokémon ignore 2.5% of Special Defense per stack. This buff lasts 4s, can stack up to 8 times, and the duration refreshes when gaining a new stack.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Gains a Boosted Attack every 5s, dealing increased damage, slowing enemies by 30% for 2s and burning enemies hit for 2.5s.

boosted_rsb.name: Boosted
boosted_rsb.label: Damage - Boosted
boosted_rsb.true_desc: Burns tick every 0.5s and on application for 6 damage ticks.
boosted_rsb.notes: Burns tick every 0.5s for 5 damage ticks.

rsb.name: Ember
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Shoot out a small flame, dealing damage to Pokémon it hits, slowing them by 30% for 2s and leaving them burned for 2.5s. After the first cast, this move may be used again within 5s before going on full cooldown.
rsb.notes: Burns tick every 0.5s for 5 damage ticks.

rsb.name: Flamethrower
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Shoot an intense blast of fire in the designated direction, dealing damage to Pokémon and leaving them burned for 2.5s. The end of the blast explodes, dealing increased damage. If the explosion hits a Pokémon, this move's cooldown is reduced by 65% of its current cooldown.
rsb.notes: Burns tick every 0.5s for 5 damage ticks.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: If the explosion hits a Pokémon, Chandelure deals 20% increased damage for 3s. This effect also applies to the triggering explosion itself.

rsb.name: Overheat
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Throws consecutive flames in an arc into designated areas up to 3 times by holding the move input down. Pokémon in the area are hit and are left burned. The area may be aimed and changed during the use of this move. When one of the flames hits a Pokémon, the user gains one heat energy. If this move is used again, an exploding flame is shot out, dealing damage to Pokémon based on the heat energy and leaves them burned. The exploding flame hitting with 0, 1 or 2 heat energy reduces the cooldown of this move by 75%, 50% or 30% respectively. After the follow-up attack, the user cannot use basic attacks for a short time.
rsb.notes: Burns tick every 0.5s for 5 damage ticks.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: This move's cooldown is reduced by 1s.

rsb.name: Night Shade
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Makes Pokémon in the area of effect see a frightening mirage, dealing damage to them and marking them. When Chandelure deals damage again to the marked Pokémon, the marked Pokémon are stunned for 1s.

rsb.name: Poltergeist
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Create a zone of mysterious power and mirages of floating furniture. Pokémon that come in contact with a mirage take damage and are slowed by 65% for 1s. Pokémon that step on the zone's border will also be slowed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the slow for Pokémon that step on the zone's border to 80%.

rsb.name: Imprison
rsb.true_desc: Creates a zone in front of itself lasting 4s. The first enemy caught in the zone will be immobilized for 0.7s. Furthermore, all enemy Pokémon in the zone or enter the zone become imprisoned and cannot use Moves.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Changes the Imprison to briefly immobilize all Pokémon caught in the zone on creation.

skills.name: Ignite Midnight
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 40% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Ignite Midnight
rsb.label: Damage (6x)
rsb.true_desc: Reduce the vision of enemies around itself by 30% for 3s. If this Unite Move is used again, Chandelure continuously fires a beam of fire in a designated direction, dealing damage to Pokémon it hits. The beam may be redirected while firing and its final blast deals increased damage.

name: Charizard

builds.name: Flame Blast
builds.explanation: Attack Weight may be replaced with Buddy Barrier, Focus Band for defensive option

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Charizard's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

rsb.name: Blaze

skills.name: Attack

boosted_rsb.name: Boosted
boosted_rsb.label: Damage - Additional (4x)
boosted_rsb.notes: Lifesteal will account for this damage.

skills.name: Flame Burst
skills.description: Attack with a bursting flame. When this move hits, it leaves enemies burned and increases the user's movement speed for a short time.

upgrades.name: Flamethrower
upgrades.description1: Attack with an intense blast of fire. When this move hits, it leaves enemies burned and increases the user's movement speed for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage and the damage caused by burning.

rsb.name: Flamethrower
rsb.label: Damage

upgrades.name: Fire Punch
upgrades.description1: Punch with a fiery fist, dealing damage and shoving enemies when it hits. Also leaves the enemies it shoves burned.

rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Cooldown reduces by .3s per target, every time Charizard damages an enemy with an auto attack (1.2s total for an entire auto attack animation on a single target).

skills.name: Fire Spin
skills.description: Encircles enemies in the area of effect in a vortex of fire. After this move hits, it deals damage over time and decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time.

rsb.name: Fire Spin
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charizard shoots a burst of fire forward, exploding on the first enemy hit or after traveling max distance, dealing damage over time every 0.5s and slowing enemies within the radius by 25% for 1s (refreshing on every damage tick).

upgrades.name: Fire Blast
upgrades.description1: Blasts intense, all-consuming fire, dealing damage over time to enemies while the flames continue to burn on the ground and decreasing the movement speed of enemies for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Fire Blast
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charizard shoots a blast of fire forward while moving, exploding on the first enemy hit or after a short distance, damaging enemies and leaving a fire area for 5s that deals damage over time every 0.5s and slows enemies within the radius by 35% for 1s (refreshing on every damage tick).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

upgrades.name: Flare Blitz
upgrades.description1: Charge forward cloaked in fire, granting the user a shield and throwing enemies hit.
upgrades.description2: Decreases movement speed of enemies for a short time when they are thrown.

rsb.name: Flare Blitz
rsb.label: Damage

rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also slows enemies by 40% for 3s after thrown.

skills.name: Seismic Slam
skills.buffs: 50% Movement Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Fly up into the air, allowing the user to move freely over obstacles. While this move is being used, basic attacks deal increased damage and leave enemies burned. In addition, when dealing damage to an enemy, recover HP. Using this move again on an enemy will grab it and slam it onto the ground.

rsb.name: Seismic Slam
rsb.label: Damage - Burning (2x)
rsb.true_desc: Grab an enemy and slam it onto the ground, damaging the target and nearby enemies and deal additional damage based on their max HP. Then, fly up into the air moving freely over obstacles for 7.5s and gaining Hindrance Resistance. While this move is active, auto attacks apply a burn to the target which lasts for 1s, dealing 2 instances of damage and is refreshed by each instance of damage from auto attacks. When dealing damage with auto attacks to an enemy (not from burn or additional damage), recover HP equal to 80% of the damage dealt. Natural lifesteal will apply to the burns applied by auto attacks made during this Unite.

name: Cinderace
notes: Only Blaze Kick and auto attacks can critically strike. Cinderace's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Blaze

Attacking a cindered enemy a certain number of times will cause the cinder to flare, dealing damage to the enemy. When at half HP or less, critical-hit rate is increased by 10% and basic attack speed is increased by 20% for a short time.

rsb.name: Blaze
rsb.label: Damage - Flare
rsb.true_desc: When at half HP or less, critical-hit rate is increased by 10% and auto attack speed is increased by 20% for 5s (30s cooldown). When hitting an enemy with an auto attack, a cinder is placed on that enemy for 5s. Boosted Attacks and moves apply 2 cinders. When the target receives its 5th cinder, they will all be consumed to deal additional damage to the enemy.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokémon: The additional damage from maximum HP is capped at 500.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits.

skills.name: Ember
skills.description: Shoot out a small flame, dealing damage to enemies, leaving them burned and decreasing their Attack for a short time.

rsb.label: Damage

upgrades.name: Pyro Ball
upgrades.description1: Kick a ball of flame in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies and leaving them burned for a short time when this move hits.
upgrades.description2: Reduces the cooldown of Flame Charge or Feint when this move hits.

rsb.name: Pyro Ball
rsb.label: Damage

rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces the cooldown of Flame Charge or Feint by 3.5s when this move hits.

upgrades.name: Blaze Kick
upgrades.description1: Perform a fiery flying kick. This move is always a critical hit, and it shoves enemies and leaves them burned for a short time. In addition, become immune to hindrances while using this move.
upgrades.description2: Increases basic attack speed for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Blaze Kick
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Perform a fiery flying kick, jumping towards a designated enemy, shoving and burning them. Cinderace can land in a targeted direction after this move hits. In addition, Cinderace is immune to hindrances during this move and is always a critical-hit. The burn lasts 3s ticking damage once every second and reduces enemy Attack and Sp. Attack by 5% for 2s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased auto attack speed by 65% for 3s after this move hits.

skills.name: Low Sweep
skills.description: Make a swift low sweep in the designated direction, dealing damage to any enemy it hits.

rsb.name: Low Sweep
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Cinderace makes a swift low sweep in the designated direction, damaging any enemy it hits.

upgrades.name: Flame Charge
upgrades.description1: Charge forward cloaked in flame, dealing damage to any enemy hit.
upgrades.description2: The next boosted attack after this move ends also decreases the movement speed of enemies hit for a short time.

rsb.name: Flame Charge
rsb.label: Damage

rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The next boosted attack after this move ends also slows enemies hit by 30% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Feint
upgrades.description1: Increases movement speed for a short time and become invincible.
upgrades.description2: After this move is used, basic attacks that hit enemies restore HP (up to 3 times).

rsb.name: Feint
rsb.true_desc: Cinderace dodges, increasing movement speed by 25% for 2s and becoming briefly invincible for 44 frames (.73s).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: After dodging, the next 3 auto attacks that hit restore HP equal to 30% of damage dealt.

skills.name: Blazing Bicycle Kick
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 35% Attack Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Create a giant ball of flame and kick it toward the designated location. The ball releases a fierce shock wave that deals damage to enemies in the area of effect. Also increases movement speed by 10% (stacks with the Unite Buffs) for 5s when it hits.

rsb.name: Blazing Bicycle Kick
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Become unstoppable and create a giant ball of flame and kick it toward the designated location. The ball releases a fierce shock wave that deals damage to Pokémon in the area of effect dealing additional damage the lower HP a Pokémon has. Also increases movement speed by 10% (stacks with the Unite Buffs) for 5s when it hits.

name: Clefable
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Clefable has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Magic Guard
skills.description: This Pokémon receives a shield when restoring an ally Pokémon's HP. The strength of this shield is proportional to the amount of HP restored.

rsb.name: Magic Guard
rsb.true_desc: This Pokémon receives a shield when restoring an ally Pokémon's HP. The strength of this shield is proportional to 50% of the amount of HP restored.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage.

skills.name: Heal Pulse
skills.description: Has the user immediately restore HP to itself and nearby allies.

rsb.name: Heal Pulse
rsb.label: Heal
rsb.true_desc: Immediately restores HP to itself and nearby allies.

upgrades.name: Moonlight
upgrades.description1: Clefable continually restores HP to themself and nearby allies for a short time. Clefable's movement speed is increased while this move is active.
upgrades.description2: Widens this move's area-of-effect and increases the duration of its effects.

rsb.name: Moonlight
rsb.label: Heal - per Tick (per half second)
rsb.true_desc: Continually restores HP to Clefable and nearby allies for 3s at one tick per half second excluding activation at 0s. Clefable’s movement speed is increased by 20% while this move is active.

upgrades.name: Draining Kiss
upgrades.description1: Clefable attacks nearby enemies with an energy-draining kiss. Each enemy hit by the kiss receives damage and releases an air kiss. These air kisses will travel to a nearby ally with the lowest HP and restore their HP. If no allies are nearby, the air kisses will return to the user and restore Clefable's HP instead.

rsb.name: Draining Kiss
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Attacks nearby enemies with an energy-draining kiss. Each enemy hit by the kiss receives damage and releases an air kiss. These air kisses will travel to a nearby ally with the lowest HP and restore their HP. If no allies are near, the air kisses will return to Clefable and restore its HP for 80% of the damage dealt.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Widens this move’s area-of-effect and increases the amount of HP restored to 100% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Disarming Voice
skills.description: Has the user let out a charming cry, dealing damage to nearby enemies and decreasing their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Disarming Voice
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Let out a charming cry, dealing damage to nearby enemies and decreasing their movement speed by 40% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Gravity
upgrades.description1: Has the user create a gravity zone centered on itself that persists for a set amount of time. Inside the gravity zone, Clefable's auto attacks change and deal increased damage. Enemies in the zone have their movement speed decreased which becomes stronger whenever a set amount of time passes. These enemies are also unable to use dash moves. If an enemy attempts to enter the zone with a dash move, the dash move is stopped and that enemy is left unable to act for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Widens the area-of-effect and increases the duration of its effects.

rsb.name: Gravity
rsb.label: Damage - Auto Attacks
rsb.true_desc: Create a gravity zone centered on Clefable that persists for a set amount of time. Inside the gravity zone, auto attacks change and deal increased damage. Enemies in the gravity zone have their movement speed decreased by 15% stacking up to 3 times gaining a stack whenever a set amount of time passes. These enemies are also unable to use Dash moves. If an enemy attempts to enter the gravity zone with a dash move, the dash move is stopped and that enemy is left unable to act for 1s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Widens this move’s area-of-effect and increases the duration of its effects.

rsb.name: Follow Me
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Clefable moves to the designated location while waving its finger receiving a 3s shield. Attention of enemies hit and enemies near the designated location are drawn. These drawn enemies are forced to approach the user and attack Clefable with their auto attacks.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases Clefable's Defense by 150 for 3s and Sp. Def by 100 for 3s when this move is used.

skills.name: Wonder Wish
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Wonder Wish
rsb.true_desc: Clefable waggles their finger, restoring HP to allies in the area-of-effect. The lower an ally's HP is, the more HP this move restores to that ally. Afterward, Clefable gets a random move that can be performed by using the Unite Move again within 10s.
rsb.notes: Note: Some random moves will activate immediately.

secondary_unite_rsb.name: Splash
secondary_unite_rsb.true_desc: Hops but nothing happens. Activates immediately and refunds 90% Unite Charge.

secondary_unite_rsb.name: Explosion
secondary_unite_rsb.label: Damage
secondary_unite_rsb.true_desc: Activates immediately, dealing massive damage in an area at the cost of 40% of your maximum HP. This cost is unmitigable and can KO you.

secondary_unite_rsb.name: Hydro Pump
secondary_unite_rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (3 Hits)
secondary_unite_rsb.true_desc: Spits a powerful stream of water hitting three times and shoving targets back.

secondary_unite_rsb.name: Hyper Beam
secondary_unite_rsb.label: Damage
secondary_unite_rsb.true_desc: Stands still and fires a targeted piercing beam dealing major damage. Firing rate is quick.
secondary_unite_rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokémon: The additional damage from max HP is capped at 2400.

Enemies that contact the wall are knocked back and stunned for 0.8s. Other abilities may not be activated during the block but existing moves may continue.

secondary_unite_rsb.name: Close Combat
secondary_unite_rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (7 Hits)
secondary_unite_rsb.true_desc: Launches a flurry of blows dealing damage and healing per target hit.

secondary_unite_rsb.name: Fly
secondary_unite_rsb.label: Damage
secondary_unite_rsb.true_desc: Leaps up into the air becoming untargetable, granted free movement, and increasing movement speed by 65% for 3s. After 3s or upon early activation, land in the area beneath dealing damage to enemies in the landing area.

name: Comfey
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Comfey has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

rsb.name: Triage
rsb.label: Self Healing - Attached (per second)
rsb.true_desc: Comfey gains one flower every 1.5 seconds. Comfey gains four flowers when entering tall grass on its own. This has an internal cooldown of 5s. Comfey can have a maximum of eight flowers. Also, Comfey moves 25% faster when near ally Pokémon that are at 50% remaining HP or less. Comfey can attach itself to an ally Pokémon when it uses Synthesis, Floral Healing, or Sweet Kiss, applying a base shield of 15% of Comfey's Max HP.
rsb.notes: While attached, Comfey is unable to be affected by attacks and gradually restores HP. When the ally Pokémon this Pokémon is attached to gains more Aeos energy than the maximum it can hold, Comfey takes the excess. When the ally Pokémon this Pokémon is attached to scores a goal, Comfey also scores with the same amount of energy. If Comfey uses a Move during the scoring charge up, Comfey's portion of the score will be cancelled. Comfey may Release from an ally Pokémon, then moves in the designated direction. If the ally Pokémon attached to was being granted a shield via Triage, the Triage portion of the shield is removed. After this Pokémon releases, its next basic attack becomes a boosted basic attack. Release direction is controlled by Right Stick on Switch and uses the D-Pad's down button on Switch or an individual button for Mobile.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack dealing increased damage and granting Comfey two flowers.

rsb.name: Synthesis
rsb.label: Healing
rsb.true_desc: If unattached, attach to the designated ally Pokémon and grants it a shield (see Triage). If attached, heal the attached ally Pokémon. All flowers are consumed when used. The more flowers that are consumed, the more HP that is restored.

rsb.name: Floral Healing
rsb.label: Healing
rsb.true_desc: If unattached, attach to the designated ally Pokémon and grant them a shield (See Triage). If attached, heal the attached ally Pokémon’s. All flowers are consumed when used. The more flowers that are consumed, the more HP that is restored. Any HP restored in excess of the ally Pokémon’s maximum is converted into a shield. This overheal shield can stack up to 4 times and lasts 5 seconds, refreshing duration on additional uses.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also increases the movement speed of the ally Pokémon attached to by 30% for 2s.

rsb.name: Sweet Kiss
rsb.label: Additional Shield
rsb.true_desc: If unattached, attach to the designated ally Pokémon and grant them a shield (see Triage). Additional shield is provided if attaching with Sweet Kiss. If attached to an ally Pokémon, charge power for up to 2.5s by holding and release to make opposing Pokémon in the area of effect infatuated. Charging beyond 2.5s cancels the move. Infatuated Pokémon approach Comfey against their will. The longer power is charged, the larger the area of effect reaching maximum charge after 1.5s. All flowers are consumed when using Sweet Kiss while attached. The more flowers that are consumed, the longer Pokémon are infatuated at a rate of 0.1s per flower with a minimum of 0.8s at 2 flowers (Note: It is impossible to use Sweet Kiss at less than 2 flowers due to cooldown cap and flower generation speed).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also increases the movement speed of the ally Pokémon attached to by 30% for 2s while charging.

rsb.name: Vine Whip
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Strikes out with whiplike vines in front of itself, dealing damage to Pokémon in the area of effect and slowing them by 40% for 2s. This move's range is increased while attached to an ally.

rsb.name: Magical Leaf
rsb.label: Damage - per leaf
rsb.true_desc: Launch three curious, scattering leaves each second for 5s. The leaves target opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and deal damage when they hit. These leaves can even deal damage to Pokémon hiding in tall grass. When Pokémon are damaged they are marked for 4s refreshing on being hit with another leaf. If a Pokémon receives six marks, that Pokémon will be stunned for 0.5s. If this move is used when the user is attached to an ally Pokémon, its area of effect is increased. Magical Leaf prioritizes enemy Pokémon.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the number of leaves launched each second to four.

rsb.name: Grass Knot
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Unleashes vines in the designated direction, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon it hits and rooting them. This move can hit up to two opposing Pokémon. If it hits two opposing Pokémon that are within 75% of the full range, Grass Knot pulls the second Pokémon to the first’s location and deals additional damage to both. This move's range is increased while attached to an ally.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases this move’s area of effect.

skills.name: Flowery Fields Forever
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Flowery Fields Forever
rsb.label: Heal - per tick
rsb.true_desc: Creates a large area of tall grass around itself for 6s. Pokémon in this tall grass cannot be seen, just as with other tall grass on the map. If ally Pokémon enter this tall grass, they will continually heal every 0.5s. Comfey gains special flowers from this tall grass. Flowers from this grass grant access to an empowered Floral Healing and Sweet Kiss.
rsb.add2_label: Empowered Floral Healing Healing - Additional Per Flower
rsb.add4_label: Empowered Floral Healing Overheal Shield - Additional Per Flower

name: Cramorant
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Cramorant has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Gulp Missile
skills.description: When Cramorant uses a move, it catches some form of prey in its mouth. Afterward, when Cramorant receives damage, it spits the prey out as a counterattack at an enemy. The type of prey and effect differ based on the user's HP.

rsb.name: Gulp Missile
rsb.true_desc: When Cramorant has prey in its mouth, it will counterattack upon taking damage from an enemy.  Alternatively, Cramorant can shoot the prey at his enemy as a boosted attack. The prey bounces to 1 nearby enemy.
rsb.notes: While above 50% HP, caught prey will be Arrokuda which deals damage and reduces enemy Defense by 20% and Sp. Def by 5% for 3s. While below 50% HP, the prey will be Pikachu which deals damage to the enemy and slows them by 50% for 1s.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every fourth attack. This boosted attack spits Arrokuda or other Pokémon at the enemy and deals area damage near the target when it hits.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every fourth attack. This boosted attack spits prey at the enemy and bounces to 1 nearby enemy.

skills.name: Whirlpool
skills.description: Creates a whirlpool that deals damage to enemies in the area of effect. The area of effect slowly shrinks, but the damage dealt slowly increases. Just before the whirlpool disappears, it decreases the movement speed of enemies in the area of effect for a short time. The user can also catch Arrokuda or other prey by entering the whirlpool.

rsb.name: Whirlpool
rsb.label: Damage - Initial (2 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: Cramorant creates a whirlpool at a designated location, damaging all enemies in the radius 10 times over a 1.8s duration. The area contracts over time to where enemies at the outer edge of the pool will only be hit three times. It also slows enemies by 50% for 0.2s, refreshing every damage tick. Cramorant can enter the whirlpool to catch prey for Gulp Missile (you can catch up to 2 prey).

upgrades.name: Surf
upgrades.description1: Attacks with a wave that deals damage to enemies. Once the wave has traveled its full distance, it returns the way it came, dealing damage to enemies once again and pulling them back with the wave. The user can also catch Arrokuda or other prey by entering the wave.
upgrades.description2: When the first wave hits enemies, it also decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Surf
rsb.label: First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Cramorant sends a wave in a designated direction, damaging enemies that make contact with the wave. The wave reaches its maximum distance after 0.8s and then returns to its starting point at the same speed. Enemies caught in the outgoing or returning wave are dealt damage up to two times. Enemies caught in the returning wave pulled in the direction of the returning wave, being incapacitated for the duration of the pull for 0.4s. Cramorant catches prey with the first wave, and can enter the wave that returns to catch prey for Gulp Missile.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The wave also slows by 40% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Dive
upgrades.description1: Changes the designated area into a puddle and has the user dive to that area, dealing damage to enemies and shoving them when they're hit. The user also catches Arrokuda or other wild Pokémon as they emerge from the puddle. A maximum of 3 uses can be kept in reserve for this move.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Dive
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Cramorant turns the designated area into a puddle, then dives to that area; becoming unstoppable for 0.5s, shoving and damaging enemies in the area for 0.5s. Cramorant catches prey for Gulp Missile as they emerge from the puddle and the next boosted attack deals additional damage but only for the next 5s; boosted attacks after this 5s are treated as regular boosted attacks. Holds 3 uses in reserve.
rsb.notes: There is a 1.5 sec cooldown between each use, which is reduced with cooldown reduction.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

skills.name: Feather Dance
skills.description: Decreases the Attack and movement speed of enemies for a short time.

rsb.name: Feather Dance
rsb.true_desc: Cramorant throws a circle of feathers at a designated area, slowing enemies by 20% in the radius and reducing their Attack by 30% for 4s.

upgrades.name: Hurricane
upgrades.description1: Creates a fierce wind, dealing damage to enemies that get caught in it and throws them.
upgrades.description2: Increases the user's movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Hurricane
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Cramorant creates a fierce wind at a location. After 0.5s enemies caught in the area are damaged and thrown for 1s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases Cramorant's movement speed by 20% for 3s.

upgrades.name: Air Slash
upgrades.description1: Shoot out many blades of air while moving backward to create distance. Deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and reduces this move's cooldown when it hits.
upgrades.description2: Restores the user's HP every time a blade of air hits an enemy.

rsb.name: Air Slash
rsb.label: Damage - per Blade (5 blades)
rsb.true_desc: Cramorant shoots 5 blades of air while moving backwards, dealing damage to enemies within the cone in a 0.33s time frame. This move's cooldown is reduced by .5s for each blade that hits (maximum 2.5s).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Heals Cramorant every time a blade of air hits an enemy.

skills.name: Gatling Gulp Missile
skills.buffs: 30% Max HP Shield granted at the start of the Move, 30% Movement Speed granted at the end of the turret.
skills.description: Creates a puddle at the user's current location. The user continuously uses its mouth to grab Arrokuda from the puddle and spits them out to attack the nearest enemy. The user cannot move or use other moves while this move is in effect.

rsb.name: Gatling Gulp Missile
rsb.label: Damage (10x)
rsb.true_desc: Cramorant becomes unstoppable and fires a series of prey at the nearest enemy up to 10 times, becoming immobile for up to 6.5s. The prey that is fired will be Arrokuda while above 50% HP and Pikachu while under 50% HP. Gatling Gulp Missile can be cancelled early. If a boosted attack is ready when starting this move, it will be shot out first as a regular boosted attack, followed by 10 Gatling Gulp Missiles.

name: Crustle
notes: Only auto attacks and X-Scissor can critically strike, but Crustle has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Sturdy
skills.description: Gains a stacking Def/SpDef buff for every 7% HP missing. Stacks up to 10 times.

rsb.name: Sturdy
rsb.label: Def & Sp. Def - Increase (Stacks 10x)
rsb.true_desc: Gain Defense and Sp. Defense for every 7% of Crustle's missing HP. Stacks 10 times.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed by 40% for 2s.

skills.name: Rock Slide
skills.description: Drops large rocks on the designated area. When this move hits, it deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaves them unable to act for a short time.

rsb.name: Rock Slide
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Crustle drops rocks in a small radius, stunning enemies hit for 1s.

upgrades.name: Rock Tomb
upgrades.description1: Splits open the ground toward the designated area, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and creating a barricade of rock. Activating this move again removes the barricade.
upgrades.description2: Decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Rock Tomb
rsb.label: Damage - Projectile
rsb.true_desc: Crustle emits a beam that deals damage to enemies hit and briefly slow their movement speed by 60% for 2s, then create a curved wall at the designated location. When the wall rises or despawns, nearby enemies are damaged and have their movement speed slowed by 60% for 2s. The wall lasts for 3s and can be cancelled early.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Movement speed reduction increased to 80%.

upgrades.name: Shell Smash
upgrades.description1: Convert a set percentage of Defense and Sp. Defense into Attack and Sp. Attack and increase movement speed for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increased conversion rate.

rsb.name: Shell Smash
rsb.true_desc: Crustle smashes their shell, setting Def and SpD to 0, gaining a boost to Atk and SpA equal to 40% of the Def and SpD lost, respectively. Additional Def and SpD from items and buffs (including Crustle's passive) are exempt. Crustle also gains 75% movement speed (decreasing by 5% every 1s) and becomes unstoppable for 0.8s while activating this move. This buff lasts for 4.5s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Def and SpD conversion is increased from 40% to 50%.

skills.name: Fury Cutter
skills.description: Slashes enemies with claws, dealing damage to them. Hitting the same enemy multiple times in succession with this move increases the damage dealt.

rsb.name: Fury Cutter
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Crustle attacks once with his claws. Enemies hit by Fury Cutter receive a debuff for 9s that causes subsequent Fury Cutter attacks to deal 20% additional damage. Maximum 3 debuff stacks. Additional damage from this debuff is always rounded up.

upgrades.name: Stealth Rock
upgrades.description1: Throws many small rocks. When a rock hits an enemy or when the rocks have flown their full distance, a zone of many levitating rocks is created dealing slowly-increasing damage over time to enemies in the area of effect.
upgrades.description2: Increases the duration of this move's effects and decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Stealth Rock
rsb.label: Damage (8 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: Crustle launches a pile of rocks in the designated direction. Upon hitting an enemy, a wall, or reaching maximum distance, create a radius in which rocks deal damage to enemies up to 8 times every 0.5s over 4s. Each hit applies a stack of a debuff which causes subsequent hits to deal 15% more damage for 1.5s, stacking up to 10 times. Additional damage from this debuff is always rounded up.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Duration of rocks increased by 1s. Number of hits increased from 8 to 10. In addition, slow enemy movement speed by 35% for 1s.

upgrades.name: X-Scissor
upgrades.description1: Dash forward with crossed claws, dealing damage to enemies multiple times and shoving them. Leaves enemies unable to act if they hit an object when shoved.
upgrades.description2: Reduced cooldown.

rsb.name: X-Scissor
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Crustle attacks three times with his claws, dealing increased damage with each hit and shoving enemies for .2s with each hit. Stuns for 1.5s if the enemy is against a wall when the third hit lands.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Cooldown reduced by 1s.

skills.name: Rubble Rouser
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 40% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Gain a shield for a short time and leave nearby enemies unable to act, dealing damage over time to them. If the user receives damage while this move is in effect, the move deals additional hits to nearby enemies.

rsb.name: Rubble Rouser
rsb.label: Damage - Revenge
rsb.true_desc: Summon a whirlwind of rocks. At the beginning leave nearby enemies stunned for 1s and gain a shield (40% max HP + 600 HP). Then deal damage to nearby enemies every 1s for 10s, and if Crustle receives damage while this move is in effect deal additional revenge damage (this cannot happen more than once every 2s).

name: Decidueye

builds.name: Shadow Shackle
builds.explanation: Scope Lens may replace third item to increase objective shred and auto attack damage

builds.name: Shackle Storm
builds.explanation: Third item may be replaced with Scope Lens for better auto attack damage. Move set best chosen in scenarios where team has low physical attackers count and enemy team has divers. High skill floor for Leaf Storm use

notes: Only Razor Leaf and auto attacks can critically strike. Decidueye's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Long Reach
skills.description: Deals increased damage to distant enemies.

rsb.name: Long Reach
rsb.true_desc: Deals 20% increased damage to distant enemies. Additional damage added per level from each move's damage formula is excluded from this bonus.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Increases the speed of basic attacks by 3% for a short time after one hits. This effect can stack up to 4 times, and with every third activation of this effect, basic attacks become boosted attacks for a short time. These boosted attacks fire more quills, but the damage dealt by each quill is decreased.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Increases the speed of auto attacks by 3% for 2.5s after one hits. This effect can stack up to 4 times, and with every third activation of this effect, auto attacks become boosted attacks for a short time. These boosted attacks fire more quills, but the damage dealt by each quill is decreased.

skills.name: Leafage
skills.description: Pelts leaves in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. For a short time after using this move, Decidueye’s Attack and basic attack speed are increased.

rsb.name: Leafage
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Pelts leaves in the designated direction, dealing damage in a cone to enemies hit (only hits once). For a short time after using this move, Decidueye’s Attack is increased by 10% (this also affects Leafage) and auto attack speed is increased by 25% for 3s.

upgrades.name: Razor Leaf
upgrades.description1: Summons whirling razor leaves. For a short time after using this move, Decidueye’s Attack and basic attack speed are increased, and basic attacks can target multiple enemies for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increases the basic attack damage the higher the enemies remaining HP is.

rsb.name: Razor Leaf
rsb.label: Damage - Main Target (Unboosted)
rsb.true_desc: Summons whirling razor leaves.  While active, Decidueye's auto attack is replaced by a new auto attack that targets up to 2 additional enemies in range, as well as increasing Attack by 10% and auto attack speed. This buff lasts for 5.5s.
rsb.add3_true_desc: Increases Attack Speed by 1% x (Level -1) + 21% for 5.5s.
rsb.enhanced_notes: Increases auto attack damage by 2% of the primary target's remaining HP and 1% for secondary targets. This damage only applies once per attack, not on each of the 3 boosted quills.
rsb.enhanced_rsb_info: Against All Enemies: The additional damage from remaining HP is capped at 240 on the primary target and 120 on secondary targets.

upgrades.name: Spirit Shackle
upgrades.description1: Charges power before firing quills in the designated direction. Damage dealt increases the longer power is charged, but movement speed is decreased while charging. If this move hits after power is charged to the maximum, it can stitch enemies to the ground. The affected Pokémon receives damage upon moving a set distance from that location, and their movement speed is decreased for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Deals increased damage to enemies with low remaining HP.

rsb.name: Spirit Shackle
rsb.label: Damage - Min Charge
rsb.true_desc: Charges power before firing a large arrow in the designated direction. Damage dealt increases the longer power is charged (with 6 breakpoints), but movement speed is decreased by 25% while charging. If this move hits after power is charged to the maximum, it can stitch enemies to the ground. The affected enemy has their movement speed decreased by 80% for a short time when exiting the area, and receives damage upon leaving the area. A maximum of 3 uses can be kept in reserve for this move. There is a 2s cooldown between uses.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Deals 15% increased damage to enemies with less than 50% remaining HP.

skills.name: Astonish
skills.description: Deals damage to enemies and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Astonish
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Deals damage to enemies and decreases their movement speed by 80% for a short time.

upgrades.name: Leaf Storm
upgrades.description1: Creates a tempest of sharp leaves, dealing damage to enemies it hits and decreases their movement speed for a short time. At point-blank range, it also shoves enemies hit.
upgrades.description2: Increases the length of time that the movement speed of enemies is decreased.

rsb.name: Leaf Storm
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Creates a tempest of sharp leaves, dealing damage to enemies it hits and decreases their movement speed by 45% for 2s. At point-blank range, it also shoves and stuns enemies hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Movement speed decrease now lasts 3s.

upgrades.name: Shadow Sneak
upgrades.description1: Creates a shadow that takes hold of one enemy in the area of effect, dealing damage and decreasing their movement speed and Defense for a short time. Also increases Decidueye’s movement speed for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Further decreases Defense.

rsb.name: Shadow Sneak
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Creates a shadow that stays with Decidueye for up to 5s and increasing Decidueye's movement speed by 70% for 2s with haste decreasing by 20% every 0.5s. If an enemy player is within the shadow's detection range, it will detach from Decidueye and latch on to the player, dealing damage and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 1s. If the shadow is attached to a Pokémon that is not Decidueye, the shadow decreases their Defense by 60% for 1.5s. Wild Pokémon may also be latched onto but Decidueye must be engaged in combat with that Wild Pokémon.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Defense reduction of enemies is increased to 80%.

skills.name: Nock Nock
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Fires quills in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies. The move ends by unleashing a particularly large quill that deals damage to all enemies it hits. This move deals increased damage if the enemies remaining HP is low. While using this move, Decidueye becomes immune to hindrances but is unable to move.

rsb.name: Nock Nock
rsb.label: Damage - per Quill (30 Quills)
rsb.true_desc: Fires quills in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies but does not pierce through them.
