The move ends by unleashing a large quill that deals damage to all enemies it hits (30% more damage if the target is below 50% HP). While using this move, Decidueye becomes immune to hindrances but is unable to move.

name: Delphox
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Delphox has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Blaze
skills.description: When using a move while at low remaining HP, deal additional damage with a fireball to enemies. This Ability goes on cooldown after it’s triggered.

rsb.name: Blaze
rsb.label: Damage - Fireball
rsb.true_desc: When using a move when below 50% max HP, that move deals additional damage with a fireball to enemies. This ability goes on a 15s cooldown when triggered.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits.

skills.name: Ember
skills.description: Shoot a small flame in front of itself, dealing damage to enemies hit.

rsb.name: Ember
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Shoot a small flame in front of itself, dealing damage to enemies hit.

upgrades.name: Fire Blast
upgrades.description1: Launch an intense, all-consuming fire in a forward direction; dealing damage to enemies hit. As the fire travels, it leaves behind a zone of flames in which a delayed explosion will occur, dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Fire Blast
rsb.label: Damage - Initial
rsb.true_desc: Delphox launches an intense, all-consuming fire in a forward direction; dealing damage to enemies hit. As the fire travels, it leaves behind a zone of flames in which a delayed explosion will occur; dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Damage increased.

upgrades.name: Mystical Fire
upgrades.description1: Unleash a special, hot ball of fire in a forward direction. If it hits an enemy, the fire will explode; dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect.
upgrades.description2: Also reduces cooldowns of all moves if this move hits. If it hits an enemy from the opposing team, cooldowns are reduced even further.

rsb.name: Mystical Fire
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Delphox unleashes a special, hot ball of fire in a forward direction. If it hits an enemy, the fire will explode; dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also reduces cooldowns of all moves if this move hits by 1s. If it hits an enemy from the opposing team, cooldowns are reduced even further (1.5s).

skills.name: Will-o-Wisp
skills.description: Conjure up three sinister flames and launch them toward the designated area. These flames then explode; dealing damage to enemies hit by the explosion and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 2s.

rsb.name: Will-o-Wisp
rsb.label: Damage - Flames
rsb.true_desc: Conjure up sinister flames and launch them toward the designated area. These flames then explode, dealing damage to enemies hit by the explosion and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 2s. An enemy will only be counted as being hit by one flame and one explosion, even if all 3 flames visually hit.

upgrades.name: Fire Spin
upgrades.description1: Create a vortex of fire in the designated area. The vortex automatically moves toward the nearest enemy, dealing damage-over-time to all enemies caught in the area for a short time and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 5s. After 4.5s passes or an enemy is caught in the center of the vortex; the flames increase in intensity. This increases the rate at which the flames deal damage and also leaves the enemies unable to act for 1s. This trapped damage ticks four times total. The Fire Spin will otherwise deal damage as it travels. Move placement on top of enemies will apply a "searching" tick and then apply "trapped" damage. A maximum of 9 ticks is possible.
upgrades.description2: Applies a debuff on trap activation that increases all damage dealt by Delphox by 15% while enemies are trapped. Debuff is only cleansable after the first tick of trap damage and does not re-apply the debuff.

upgrades.name: Flame Charge
upgrades.description1: Charge forward in the designated direction. If there are any enemies in range when the charge ends, summon three flames to attack. The flames deal damage and decrease enemy movement speed for a short time. This move can be used while also using Fire Blast or Mystical Fire.
upgrades.description2: Increases Delphox's movement speed for a short time when this move is used.

rsb.name: Flame Charge
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Delphox charges forward in the designated direction. If there are any enemies within auto attack range when the charge ends, summon three flames to attack. These flames deal damage and decrease enemy movement speed by 30% for 2s. This move can be used while also using Fire Blast or Mystical Fire. Each subsequent flame that hits deals 70% less.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases Delphox's movement speed by 30% for 1s when this move is used.

skills.name: Fanciful Fireworks
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Deals damage-over-time to enemies in the designated area-of-effect. Enemies that are hit have decreased movement speed and weakened HP recovery effects for a short time.

rsb.name: Fanciful Fireworks
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick
rsb.true_desc: Deals damage-over-time to enemies in the designated area for 8s. Enemies that are hit have 50% decreased movement speed and 50% reduced HP recovery effects for 1.75s. Recovery effects are weakened within the zone and cannot be cleansed while in the zone. Leaving the zone will have the weakened HP recovery effects linger for 1.75s and may be cleansed after leaving the zone. 8s duration (ticks at 0.5s intervals).

name: Dodrio
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike (but full sprint gauge boosted attacks cannot). Dodrio's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Run Away
skills.description: Movement speed is increased when enemies are nearby. While the Pokémon is moving, their sprint gauge charges. While the sprint gauge is full, movement speed is increased. If the Pokémon's movement speed decreases below a set speed, the sprint gauge will rapidly deplete. When this Pokémon scores a goal, the amount of Aeos energy deposited is evenly divided into equal portions for each head the Pokémon has.

rsb.name: Run Away
rsb.true_desc: This Pokémon receives a movement speed increase when within a radius of enemy Pokémon. While moving, the sprint gauge charges from 0 to 10 (2% increased movement speed per increment). At full, Dodrio runs at 20% increased movement speed. If movement speed is decreased below a threshold, the sprint gauge will rapidly deplete. When Doduo scores a goal, it evenly divides its collected Aeos energy into two portions and deposits them into the goal one at a time. As Dodrio, this is split into three portions to deposit in the goal one at a time. Only goals made by a full emptying of the Aeos Ball will count towards stacking items.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing consecutive blows with each of the user's heads. When the sprint gauage is full, basic attacks will cause the Pokémon to charge in the direction they're facing and consume all of the sprint gauge. If this charging attack hits an enemy, all of the user's move cooldowns are reduced.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. Attacking with a full sprint gauge turns the attack into a charge in the facing direction. If the sprint gauged attack hits an enemy, all cooldowns are reduced by 1s.

skills.name: Peck
skills.description: Move forward while jabbing with beaks. When the sprint gauge is full, instead charge forward while jabbing with beaks. Using this move fully consumes the sprint gauge.

rsb.name: Peck
rsb.label: Damage (No Gauge)
rsb.true_desc: Jabs forward with Doduo's beaks. When using the move, Doduo stops moving and loses sprint gauge due to dropping below the sprint gauge gaining threshold. When the sprint gauge is full, Doduo charges forward to jab the in the facing direction and fully consumes the sprint gauge.

upgrades.name: Tri Attack
upgrades.description1: Dodrio attacks with their beaks in a cone in front of themself, dealing damage to enemies and applying one of the following random effects to enemies hit: decrease Attack and deal damage-over-time for a set amount of time, deacrease auto attack speed, or decrease movement speed. When the sprint gauge is full, Dodrio instead shoots out 3 projectiles in a designated direction. If a projectile hits an enemy, the project deals damage and applies one of the aforementioned effects based on its color. After this move is used, Dodrio's next auto attack deals additional damage and restores HP. Holds 2 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 1s.
upgrades.description2: When the sprint gauge is full, this move's cooldown is reduced.

rsb.name: Tri Attack
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dodrio attacks with their beaks in a cone in front of themself, dealing damage to enemies and applying one of the following random effects to enemies hit: Burn, Paralyze, or Freeze. When the sprint gauge is full, Dodrio instead shoots out 3 projectiles in the facing direction. If a projectile hits an enemy, the projectile deals damage but only the first projectile of random colour/type applies one of the following enhanced random effects to enemies hit: Burn, Paralyze, or Freeze corresponding to the colour/type. After this move is used, Dodrio's next basic attack deals additional damage and restores HP. Holds 2 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 1s.
rsb.notes: Burn: 8% Attack decrease for 2s, 12% Attack decrease if Sprint empowered. Paralyze: 8% Attack Speed decrease and 10% Movement speeed decrease for 2s, 12% Attack Speed decrease and 15% Movement speed decrease if Sprint empowered. Freeze: 20% Movement speed decrease for 2s, 40% if Sprint empowered.
rsb.add3_true_desc: Also heals Dodrio for 7% max HP.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The next auto attack gains additional healing by 3% of max HP. When used with a full sprint gauge the charge time for this move is reduced by 1s.

upgrades.name: Drill Peck
upgrades.description1: Dodrio moves forward while striking with their sharp beaks multiple times, dealing damage to enemies hit. When the sprint gauge is full, Dodrio instead dashes forward while striking with their sharp beaks multiple times, dealing damage to enemies hit and shoving them. Using this move fully consumes the sprint gauge.
upgrades.description2: Reduces this move's cooldown. Also, when this move hits enemies, restore a portion of Dodrio's HP based on the amount of damage dealt.

rsb.name: Drill Peck
rsb.label: Damage - 3x (No Gauge)
rsb.true_desc: Dodrio strikes forward with their sharp beaks multiple times, dealing damage to enemies hit. If used with a full sprint gauge, consume the sprint gauge and dash forward while striking with their sharp beaks multiple times, dealing damage to enemies hit and shoving them. During this dash, Dodrio receives 20% reduced damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces base cd by 2s and restores a portion of Dodrio's HP equal to 30% of damage dealt by the flat damage (percent damage excluded).

skills.name: Quick Attack
skills.description: Dash forward, increasing the user's movement speed for a short time and deal damage to enemies hit. This move's cooldown is reduced if it hits an enemy.

rsb.name: Quick Attack
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dash forward, increasing the user's movement speed for a short time and dealing damage to enemies hit. This move's cooldown is reduced by 1s if it hits an enemy.

upgrades.name: Agility
upgrades.description1: Become immune to hindrances for a short time and fully charge the sprint gauge. Afterward, movement speed is increased for a short time, and the sprint gauge charges faster.
upgrades.description2: After this move is used, the sprint gauge becomes fully charged.

rsb.name: Agility
rsb.true_desc: Become immune to hindrances for a short time and adds to the sprint gauge. Afterward, movement speed is increased by 20% for 4s, and the sprint gauge charges faster.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Fully charges the sprint gauge on use.

upgrades.name: Jump Kick
upgrades.description1: Dodrio leaps forward while kicking. If this move makes contact with an enemy or obstacle, Dodrio leaps over it and stomps the ground when landing, dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time and the sprint gauge charges. If this move makes contact with an enemy, this move's cooldown is reduced.
upgrades.description2: When stomping the ground after leaping, enemies in the area are also left unable to act.

rsb.name: Drill Peck
rsb.label: Damage - Initial
rsb.true_desc: Dodrio leaps forward while kicking. If this move makes contact with an enemy or obstacle, Dodrio leaps over it and stomps the ground when landing, dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect, slowing by 25% for 2s, and the sprint gauge charges by 75%. If this move makes contact with an enemy, that enemy is stunned briefly from getting kicked in the head and this move's cooldown is reduced by 3s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Enemies in the area of the landing are also stunned for 1s.

skills.name: Triple Trample
skills.buffs: 80% Movement Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Dodrio runs to a designated location. While running, Dodrio is immune to hindrances. If Dodrio makes contact with an enemy while running, they are dealt damage and thrown into the air. When Dodrio arrives at the designated location, Dodrio gains increased Attack for a short time, is granted a shield, and the sprint gauge charges faster for a short time.

rsb.name: Triple Trample
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dodrio runs to a designated location. While running, Dodrio is immune to hindrances. If Dodrio makes contact with an enemy while running, they are dealt damage and thrown into the air for 1s. When Dodrio arrives at the designated location, Dodrio gains 30% increased Attack and loses 5% Sp. Attack for 3s, is granted a 10% Max HP shield for 3s, and the sprint gauge charges faster for 6s. Damage dealt at the designated location is affected by the 30% Attack bonus.

name: Dragapult
notes: Only auto attacks and Dragon Dance can critically strike. Dragapult's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Clear Body
skills.description: Reduces the duration of debuff effects inflicted on Dragapult by 50%

rsb.name: Clear Body
rsb.true_desc: Reduces the duration of debuff effects inflicted on the user.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Each time damage is dealt to enemies, boosted basic attack gauge increases. When the boosted basic attack gauge is full (after 8 instances of damage), the Pokémon's basic attacks become boosted attacks.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Each time damage is dealt to enemies, boosted basic attack gauge increases. When the boosted basic attack gauge is full (after 8 instances of damage), the Pokémon's basic attacks become boosted attacks.
rsb.notes: Boosted attacks deal increased damage and have an area-of-effect centered on the enemy they hit. The boosted basic attack gauge will begin decreasing rapidly if this Pokémon does not deal damage to enemies for 3s.

skills.name: Astonish
skills.description: Lets out a sound blast in a forward direction. The shout explodes when it hits an enemy or after traveling a set distance, dealing damage in the area and decreasing their movement speed for a short time

rsb.name: Astonish
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Lets out a sound blast in a forward direction. The shout explodes when it hits an enemy or after traveling a set distance, dealing damage in an area and decreasing enemy movement speed by 30% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Dragon Breath
upgrades.description1: Exhales a mighty gust in the designated direction, dealing damage to Pokémon in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed. The gust also leaves the ground burning for a set amount of time. Pokémon in this area of effect take damage over tim and have their movement speed decreased for a short time. If this move is used while the uesr is flying with Dragon Dance, the mighty gust is exhaled along Dragon Dance's flight path, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and the decreasing their movement speed for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Deals increased damage and further decreases their movement speed

rsb.name: Dragon Breath
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Exhales a mighty gust in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 2s. The gust also leaves the ground burning for 3s. Enemies in this area take damage-over-time and have their movement speed decreased for a short time. If this move is used while the user is flying with Dragon Dance, the mighty gust is exhaled along Dragon Dance's flight path, dealing damage to enemies in the area and decreasing their movement speed for a short time.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Deals increased damage and increases the slow to 45% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Shadow Ball
upgrades.description1: Hurls a shadowy blob in the designated direction, dealing damage to Pokémon it touches and applying a mark to them. When marked Pokémon are hit by Dragapult, they receive additional damage. The fourth time the marked Pokémon is hit, the mark is removed, but the damage dealt by the attack is further increased and the user recovers HP. After using this move, the user moves a short distance in a designated direction.
upgrades.description2: Increased Damage

rsb.name: Shadow Ball
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Hurls a shadowy blob in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit and applying a mark to them. When marked enemies are hit by Dragapult, they receive additional damage. After the fourth time the marked enemy is hit, the mark is removed, and additional damage is dealt and the user recovers 10% of max HP. After using this move, the user moves a short distance in a designated direction.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

skills.name: Quick Attack
skills.description: Dashes in the designated direction, increasing its basic attack speed for a short time

rsb.name: Quick Attack
rsb.true_desc: Dashes in the designated direction, increasing basic attack speed by 40% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Dragon Dance
upgrades.description1: Flies in a circular pattern in the designated direction. While flying, it continuously deals damage to nearby enemies with basic attacks that deal less damage but have increased attack speed. If this move is used again while the user is flying, the user stops flying and moves a short distance in the designated direction. If the user knocks out an enemy, this move's cooldown is reset. If the user assists in a knock out, this move's cooldown is reduced by half. When this move is used, Dragon's Breath's cooldown is reset
upgrades.description2: While the user is flying, its attacks also restores HP when they hit

rsb.name: Dragon Dance
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Flies in a circular pattern in the designated direction. While flying, continuously deal damage to nearby enemies with auto attacks that deal 10% less damage but have increased attack speed by 200%. This fly pattern takes 3.5s to complete. If this move is used again while the user is flying, the user stops flying and becomes briefly invulnerable while moving a short distance in the designated direction. If the user knocks out an enemy, this move's cooldown is reset. If the user assists in a knock out, this move's cooldown is reduced by half. When this move is used, Dragon Breath's cooldown is reset.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: While the user is flying, attacks gain an additional 25% lifesteal.

upgrades.name: Phantom Force
upgrades.description1: For a short time, increases the user's movement speed and enters stealth. While the user is in stealth, the boosted basic attakck gauge increases. When stealth ends, Dragapult's basic attack speed is increased for a short time. After this move is learned, if the user knocks out an enemy, this move's cooldown is reset and Dragapult's Attack is increased by 6 until the end of battle. This Attack increase can stack up to 8 times.
upgrades.description2: Reduces this move's cooldown by 0.5s when the user deals damage to enemies with basic attacks.

rsb.name: Phantom Force
rsb.true_desc: The user enters stealth and has 15% increased movement speed for 6s. While the user is in stealth, the boosted basic attack gauge increases. When stealth ends, Dragapult's basic attack speed is increased by 85% for 3s. After this move is learned, if the user knocks out an enemy, this move's cooldown is reset and Dragapult's Attack is increased by 6 until the end of battle. This Attack increase can stack up to 8 times.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 0.5s when the user deals damage to enemies with basic or boosted attacks.

skills.name: Dreep and Destroy
skills.buffs: Has an internal cooldown of 30s to activate Energy Amplifier; Has an internal cooldown of 60s to activate Buddy Barrier; 10% Max HP Shield, 10% Movement Speed for 3s
skills.description: Launches two Dreepy and each deals damage to different Pokémon in the area of effect. The lower the opposing Pokémon's remaining HP is, the more damage the Dreepy deal. If there is only one target in the area of effect, both Dreepy target that Pokémon and deal damage to it. A maximum of 2 uses can be kept in reserve for this move. Dreepy may be fired once every 2 seconds. Neither Cooldown Reduction nor gaining Aeos Energy reduce the cooldown of Dreep and Destroy.

rsb.name: Dreep and Destroy
rsb.true_desc: Launches two Dreepy and each deals damage to different enemies in the area-of-effect. The lower their remaining HP is, the more damage the Dreepy deal. If there is only one target in the area, both Dreepy target that enemy and deal damage to them. A maximum of 2 uses can be kept in reserve for this move.
rsb.notes: Dreepy may be fired once every 2s. Against Wild Pokemon: The additional damage from missing HP is capped at 1200.
rsb.add1_notes: Also deals 10% of enemy missing HP.

name: Dragonite
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Dragonite's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Marvel Scale
skills.description: Increases Defense by 100 for 1.5s when afflicted by a status condition (Dratini and Dragonair only).
skills.passive2_description: When damaged by an enemy player, gain a buff that reduces damage taken by 25% for 2.5 seconds. This ability has a 15 second cooldown.

skills.name: Attack - Dratini
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, blasting water in front of Dratini, dealing increased damage, reducing the cooldown of Dratini's moves by 1s, and recover 5% max HP when this hits.
skills.basic2_description: The boosted attack alternates between water and electric with every use of a boosted attack. If the water attack hits, it triggers the same effects as Dratini's boosted attack. If the electric attack hits, it leaves enemies unable to act for .6s and reduces the cooldown of Dragonair's moves by 1s when this hits.
skills.basic3_description: The boosted attack alternates between water, electric, and fire with every use of a boosted attack. If the water or electric attack hits, it triggers the same effects as Dragonair's boosted attack. If the fire attack hits, it deals additional damage equal to 10% of the enemy's remaining HP (capped at 1200 dmg against wilds) and reduces the cooldown of Dragonite's moves by 1s when this hits.

skills.name: Twister
skills.description: Creates a twister and releases it in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Twister
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Creates a twister and releases it in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit and decreases their movement speed by 50% for 1s.

upgrades.name: Dragon Dance
upgrades.description1: Dash in a designated direction, in one of three cycling patterns. After using this move, grant a buff increasing attack speed, movement speed, Attack by 8% (capping at 24%), as well as increasing the stage of Hyper Beam. This buff stacks up to 3 times, and the duration is reset to full on reuse. All stacks are removed after a few seconds. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of this ability by 1s.

rsb.name: Dragon Dance
rsb.true_desc: Dash in a designated direction, alternating each use between a left arc, right arc and a direct dash. After using this move, grant a buff increasing attack speed of the next 3 auto attacks by 80% for 4.5s, increasing movement speed by 30% for 1s, increasing Attack by 8% (capping at 24%), as well as increasing the stage of Hyper Beam. This buff stacks up to 3 times, and the duration is reset to full on reuse. All stacks are removed after a few seconds. Auto attacks reduce the cooldown of this ability by 1s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Further increases Dragonite's movement speed by 10% for 4.5s if there are enemies nearby when the dance ends.

upgrades.name: Extreme Speed
upgrades.description1: Dash toward the designated location stopping upon contact with an enemy, dealing damage and throwing them.

rsb.name: Extreme Speed
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dash toward the designated enemy, damaging and slowing all enemies in a small radius around the target upon impact by 50% for 2s, throwing the primary target and shoving others away.  Using this move resets the cooldown of Multiscale.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: If Dragonite's movement speed is currently decreased when this move is used, that movement speed decrease is negated before the move is used.

skills.name: Dragon Breath
skills.description: Exhale a mighty gust in the designated direction. If this move hits an enemy, the user's next attack becomes a boosted attack.

rsb.name: Dragon Breath
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Exhale a mighty gust in the designated direction. If this move hits an enemy, Dragonite's next attack becomes a boosted attack.

upgrades.name: Hyper Beam
upgrades.description1: Fires a beam of energy toward the targeted enemy after a delay, dealing damage to all enemies that it hits, as well as additional damage based on their Max HP. The move changes Stages based on the number of stacks of Dragon Dance that Dragonite has, from 0 to 3. The Max HP damage is 5%/10%/15%/20%, determined by the current Stage.  Dragonite cannot act during the duration of this move.
upgrades.description2: Reduces damage taken by 50% while charging this move.

rsb.name: Hyper Beam
rsb.label: Damage - Stage 0
rsb.true_desc: Fires a beam of energy toward the targeted enemy after a delay, dealing damage to all enemies that it hits, as well as additional damage based on their Max HP. The move changes Stages based on the number of stacks of Dragon Dance that Dragonite has, from 0 to 3. The max HP damage is 0%/5%/10%/20%, determined by the current Stage. Dragonite cannot act while releasing the beam.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokémon: The additional damage from max HP is capped at 600/1200/1800/2400 depending on the stage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces damage taken by 50% while charging this move.

upgrades.name: Outrage
upgrades.description1: Dragonite begins rampaging for 5s. This move starts with a ground stomp, dealing damage to enemies in an area around Dragonite. While rampaging, all of Dragonite's basic attacks become a melee boosted attack, alternating through the water, electric, and fire boosted attack types. When the rampage ends, Dragonite is left briefly unable to act.

rsb.name: Outrage
rsb.label: Damage - Stomp
rsb.true_desc: Dragonite stomps the ground, dealing damage to enemies in an area around Dragonite with the bonus effect of the last Boosted Attack that was used. Additionally, Dragonite gains a buff for 5.5s, increasing auto attack speed by 30% for 5.5s, converting all attacks during the duration of Outrage into melee Boosted Attacks, and alternating through the water, electric, and fire Boosted Attacks in order. When the buff ends, Dragonite is stunned for .7s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduce the duration of hindrances inflicted on Dragonite while rampaging by 40% for 5.5s.

skills.name: Draco Impact
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 35% Attack Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Briefly fly up in the air before crashing down with several comets on a designated area, dealing damage and throwing enemies in the area. The farther Dragonite flies, the more the Unite guage is consumed (25% at min disatance and 100% at max). Dragonite is unstoppable while using this move.

rsb.name: Draco Impact
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Briefly fly up in the air, becoming untargetable, before crashing down, approximately 2s after activating, with several comets on a designated area, dealing damage and throwing enemies in the area for 0.5s. The farther Dragonite flies, the more the Unite gauge is consumed (50% at min distance and 100% at max). Dragonite is unstoppable while using this move.

name: Duraludon
notes: Only auto attacks (and Cannon auto attacks) can critically strike. Duraludon's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Heavy Metal
skills.description: Prevents Duraludon from being thrown or shoved by the first attempt to shove or throw them. This ability goes on cooldown after it's triggered (50s cd).

rsb.name: Heavy Metal
rsb.true_desc: Prevents Duraludon from being thrown or shoved by the first attempt to throw or shove them. This ability goes on cooldown after it's triggered (50s cd).

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, shooting a long beam that deals a large amount of damage to all enemies hit.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, shooting a long beam that deals a large amount of damage to all enemies hit.

boosted_rsb.name: Boosted
boosted_rsb.label: Damage - Boosted
boosted_rsb.add1_true_desc: Deals 3% enemy max HP damage and can critically strike.
boosted_rsb.add1_notes: Against Wild Pokemon: The total damage is capped at 1800.

skills.name: Laser Focus
skills.description: Reduces damage received for a short time. Afterward, Duraludon's basic attacks deal additional damage to enemies hit. This buff expires after 8s or after 3 basic attacks.

rsb.name: Laser Focus
rsb.label: Damage - Bonus
rsb.true_desc: Reduces damage received by 20% for .6s. Afterward, Duraludon's auto attacks deal additional damage to enemies hit. This buff expires after 8s or after 3 auto attacks.

upgrades.name: Flash Cannon
upgrades.description1: Duraludon ruptures the ground in the designated direction; dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. Afterward, go into "Cannon Mode" rooting Duraludon for 6s or if a basic attack is not made for 2.5s. While in Cannon Mode, basic attacks have longer range, deal increased damage, and deal splash damage. Metal Claw, Stealth Rock, Dragon Tail, and boosted attacks can be used while in this mode and boosted attacks decrease the movement speed of enemies hit for a short time and also pierce.
upgrades.description2: Enemies in the ruptured ground's area of effect are also unable to act for 1s.

rsb.name: Flash Cannon
rsb.label: Damage - Rupture
rsb.add2_true_desc: This damage can critically strike. (Rupture Damage + 1% Max HP) * 3
rsb.add2_notes: This damage is capped at 800 on Wild Pokémon
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Enemies in the ruptured ground's area of effect are also unable to act for 1s.

upgrades.name: Dragon Pulse
upgrades.description1: Charges power before dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. Duraludon's movement speed is decreased while charging, but the longer power is charged, the wider the move's area of effect becomes and the more damage it deals. After learning this move, a damage marker will be attached to any enemy Duraludon damages. When Dragon Pulse hits a marked enemy, it deals additional damage to that target for each damage marker attached to it, then removes all of the damage markers. In addition, if this move knocks out an enemy, the cooldown is reduced by 50% and the next 3 basic attacks will each deal additional damage and further reduce this move's cooldown when they hit.
upgrades.description2: Also restores Duraludon's HP if this move knocks out an enemy player.

rsb.name: Dragon Pulse
rsb.label: Damage - Bonus (After KO)
rsb.true_desc: Charges power before dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. Duraludon's movement speed is decreased by 30% while charging, but the longer power is charged, the wider the move's area of effect becomes and the more damage it deals. After learning this move: a damage marker will be attached to any enemy when Duraludon damages them (additional boosted damage also adds an orb). Marks accumulate to 5 orbs and 1 ring. Marks last for 5s and refresh in duration when a new mark is applied (marks can be cleansed). When Dragon Pulse hits a marked enemy, additional damage is dealt for each damage marker attached to it, then all damage markers are removed. An opposing Duraludon can wipe your stacks on wilds if they Dragon Pulse, but they will not receive the additional damage from your marks. In addition, if this move knocks out an enemy, the cooldown is reduced by 1s and Duraludon receives a buff for 8s or 3 auto attacks. Under the effect of this buff, auto attacks will each deal additional damage as secondary ticks (and apply additional Dragon Pulse orb stacks) and further reduce this move's cooldown when they hit by 1.5s each.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also restores 8% of Duraludon's max HP if this move knocks out an enemy player.

skills.name: Metal Claw
skills.description: Strike with sharp claws; dealing damage to enemies hit and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. After this move is used, Duraludon's next basic attack becomes a boosted attack.

rsb.name: Metal Claw
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Send sharp claws forward; dealing damage to enemies hit and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. After this move is used, Duraludon's next auto attack becomes a boosted attack.

upgrades.name: Dragon Tail
upgrades.description1: Duraludon shoves enemies and moves itself backward a short distance. The next basic attack becomes a boosted attack. A maximum of two uses can be kept in reserve for this move. There is a 1.1s cooldown between uses. This move can penetrate through walls.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Dragon Tail
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Duraludon shoves enemies and moves itself backward a short distance. The next auto attack becomes a boosted attack. This move ignores obstacles. A maximum of 2 uses can be kept in reserve for this move. There is a 2.5s cooldown between uses.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Apply a mark that is consumed the next time Duraludon damages them, dealing additional damage.

upgrades.name: Stealth Rock
upgrades.description1: Hurl a stone at the designated area, creating an invisible field of stones. The field deals damage over time to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time. If the hurled stone hits an enemy before the designated area, the area of effect will instead be centered on where the stone hit that Pokémon. Once an enemy takes damage from the field, it will become visible to enemies.  If an enemy takes damage from this move 4 times, that enemy becomes unable to move for a short time. After this move is used, Duraludon's next basic attack becomes a boosted attack. A maximum of two uses can be kept in reserve for this move. There is a 1.1s cooldown between uses.
upgrades.description2: Increases the maximum number of uses that can be kept in reserve for this move.

rsb.name: Stealth Rock
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick (4 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: Hurl a stone at the designated area, creating an invisible field of stones for 60s or until triggered. The field deals damage over time to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed by 15% for 2s. If the hurled stone hits an enemy before the designated area, the field will instead be centered on where the stone hit that Pokémon. Once an enemy takes damage from the field, it will become visible to all enemies. If an enemy takes damage from this move 4 times, that enemy becomes unable to move for 1s. After this move is used, Duraludon's next auto attack becomes a boosted attack. A maximum of 2 uses can be kept in reserve for this move. There is a 1s cooldown between uses.
rsb.notes: A maximum of 2 Stealth Rocks may be on the game field at one time, but 2 more can still be kept in reserve.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Stores 3 uses in reserve instead.
rsb.enhanced_notes: A maximum of 3 Stealth Rocks may be on the game field at one time, but 3 more can still be kept in reserve.

skills.name: Revolving Ruin
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 35% Attack Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Fire a beam of light at the ground in a sweeping circle around Duraludon. If this beam hits an enemy, it deals damage to them, grants Duraludon a shield and increases their Attack by 8% for a short time. Both the shield effect and the Attack increase are strengthened for each enemy that is hit by the beam. Damage is dealt to any enemy in the area of effect after the beam of light is fired. A burning ring is also left where the beam of light touched the ground, and enemies that touch this ring take additional damage and have their movement speed decreased by 50% for 1s refreshing as damage continus to be taken from the burning ground.

rsb.name: Revolving Ruin
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit
rsb.true_desc: Fire a beam of light at the ground in a sweeping circle around Duraludon. If this beam hits an enemy, it deals damage to them, grants Duraludon a shield and increases Attack by 8% for a short time. Both the shield effect and the Attack increase are strengthened for each enemy that is hit by the beam. Damage is dealt to any enemy in the area of effect after the beam of light is fired. A burning ring is also left where the beam of light touched the ground; enemies that touch this ring take additional damage every 0.5s and have their movement speed decreased by 50% for 1s. Subsequent hits after the first have the Attack stat bonus from this move applied to them.

name: Eldegoss
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Eldegoss has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Cotton Down
skills.description: Damages an enemy and decreases its movement speed for a short time after receiving a certain amount of damage. When that happens, also recover HP and gain increased movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Cotton Down
rsb.label: Damage - Revenge
rsb.true_desc: When receiving at least 5% max HP as damage in a single attack; recover HP, deal revenge damage in an area around Eldegoss, and decrease the enemies movement speed in this area effect by 30% for 1.5s. This ability has a 10s cooldown.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, attaching a bit of cotton fluff to the enemy. The user's basic attacks against an enemy with cotton fluff on it deal increased damage and decreases the enemies movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, attaching a bit of cotton fluff to the enemy for 3s. Eldegoss's and allies' auto attacks against an enemy with cotton fluff on it deal increased damage and decreases their movement speed by 30% for 1.5s. This extra damage has an internal cooldown of 0.35s for each attacker. Allies use their own Sp. Atk for calculation of the proc.

skills.name: Leafage
skills.description: Pelt the target with leaves, decreasing the movement speed of enemies for a short time when it hits.

rsb.name: Leafage
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Eldegoss shoots a bundle of leaves that explode on the first enemy hit; damaging and slowing movement speed by 40% for 2s in an area.

upgrades.name: Pollen Puff
upgrades.description1: Throws a Pollen Puff, which attaches to an enemy. The Pollen Puff restores HP for allies and deals damage to enemies.
upgrades.description2: If a Pollen Puff attaches to enemies, it also deals them damage over time. If a Pollen Puff attaches to an ally, it also reduces the damage they receive.

rsb.name: Pollen Puff
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Eldegoss throws a puff of pollen. This puff attaches to any Pokémon that touches it within 0.5s of landing on the ground or directly to a Pokémon as aimed by Eldegoss. If attached the puff will explode after 2s, damaging enemies and healing allies around it. If the puff has not been attached to any Pokémon within the landing pick up window, the puff detonates after 1s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: If attached to an ally or Eldegoss, it will reduce the damage they receive by 20% for 2s. If attached directly to an enemy, the puff will deal damage over time. Enemies in contact with the small puff while attached to allies also take the damage over time.

upgrades.name: Leaf Tornado
upgrades.description1: Attack with a tornado of sharp leaves, leaving a path in its wake that increases ally movement speed for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Also decreases the accuracy of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Leaf Tornado
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Eldegoss conjures a tornado full of leaves launching it in a designated direction. The tornado damages enemies and creates a path of wind that increases the movement speed of allies that touch it by 55% for 1.5s, refreshing as long as they are on the path. When the tornado reaches max distance, the path damages enemies on the path a second time. The haste path lasts for 4s.
rsb.add1_true_desc: 25% of the damage of the first hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Enemies hit by the tornado will miss all of their auto attacks for 2.5s.

skills.name: Synthesis
skills.description: Restores the HP of the user and nearby allies.

rsb.name: Synthesis
rsb.label: Healing
rsb.true_desc: Eldegoss uses sunlight to heal themself and nearby allies.

upgrades.name: Cotton Guard
upgrades.description1: Protects the user and nearby allies with cotton. The cotton absorbs damage and when the move ends, the cotton restores some HP.
upgrades.description2: Also increases the user's movement speed while using this move.

rsb.name: Cotton Guard
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Eldegoss creates barriers out of cotton; granting Eldegoss and all nearby allies a shield for 3s. When the shield expires, it restores HP equal to 15% of the remaining shield value.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also increases allies and Eldegoss's movement speed by 30% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Cotton Spore
upgrades.description1: Gathers spores around the user, increasing the user's movement speed while this move is in effect. The spores burst after a short time, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect, throwing them, and decreasing their movement speed for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Reduced damage taken while using this move.

rsb.name: Cotton Spore
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Eldegoss channels for 2s, gathering spores while increasing its movement speed by 30% for 2s. At the end of the channel the spores are released; damaging and throwing nearby enemies into the air for 0.5s, then slowing their movement speed by 30% for 2s when they land.
rsb.notes: The 2s channel can be finished prematurely by using Cotton Cloud Crash.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Eldegoss gains 40% increased Defense and Special Defense while channeling.

skills.name: Cotton Cloud Crash
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Float into the air and become invincible. If used again, pound the ground, attacking and shoving enemies and restoring HP to allies in the area of effect.

rsb.name: Cotton Cloud Crash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Float into the air for 3s; becoming invincible and increasing movement speed by 10% for 6s. If used again or after 3s, pound the ground, attacking and shoving enemies for .7s while restoring HP to Eldegoss and allies in the radius.

name: Espeon
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Espeon has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Anticipation
skills.description: When Eevee would be affected by a hindrance, the hindrance is negated and Eevee becomes immune to hindrances for a short time (35s cd). Note: Hindrances include slows; multi-layered hindrance moves such as Pikachu's Volt Tackle will only have the very first launch negated.
skills.passive2_description: When Espeon would be affected by a hindrance, the hindrance is negated and Espeon becomes immune to hindrances for a short time. At the same time, this ability deals damage to the enemy that attempted to inflict the hindrance and applies a 30% slow for 1s (35s cd). Note: Hindrances include slows; multi-layered hindrance moves such as Pikachu's Volt Tackle will only have the very first launch negated.

skills.name: Attack - Eevee
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage.
skills.basic2_description: Becomes a boosted attack whenever a set amount of time passes (5s cd), firing a beam in front of the user. The beam deals increased damage and decreases the movement speed of targets hit by 30% for 1s.

rsb.name: Swift
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Eevee launches three stars at target location. Stars start in a horizontal line perpendicular to Eevee's facing. Stars continue to fly in the direction once past the target location until the maximum range is reached. When an enemy is hit by a star, subsequent stars deal 70% less damage.

rsb.name: Psyshock
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Espeon materializes psychic projectiles and launches them at a designated location; dealing damage to enemies hit by the projectiles and decreasing their movement speed for each projectile hit by 15% for 3s (maximum 75%). Orbs start in a horizontal line perpendicular to Espeon's facing and continue flying in the  designated direction until the maximum range of the move. Targets hit by all five projectiles are stunned for 1.25s. When an enemy is hit by a projectile, subsequent projectiles deal 70% less damage. When Psyshock is enhanced via Future Sight reset, it launches stronger psychic projectiles at a designated location. These projectiles at their point of convergence cause an explosion, dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect. There is no damage increase.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increase the speed at which projectiles travel.

rsb.name: Stored Power
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Unleash blasts of psychic power at random enemies within an area; dealing damage to enemies hit and decreasing their movement speed from each projectile hit by 10% for 2s (maximum 50%). Espeon stores one blast of psychic power every 2s, or after hitting an enemy with a boosted attack (gaining 1 stored blast per enemy hit). Up to five blasts can be stored at once. After this move is used, Espeon's movement speed is increased by 70% for 1.2s. Targets hit by a psychic blast will take 70% less damage from subsequent hits. When Stored Power is enhanced via Future Sight reset, it unleashes an increased number of psychic blasts (8 total) and restores Espeon's HP by 150 per blast.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also deals additional damage to enemies below 50% max HP.

rsb.name: Growl
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Growl at a designated enemy; dealing damage and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 2s.

rsb.name: Psybeam
rsb.label: Damage - Initial
rsb.true_desc: Fires a peculiar ray in the designated direction. If the beam hits an enemy, it will then split beyond the first enemy hit and deal damage to other enemies in range. The initial enemy hit and these split rays deal more damage based on the max HP of the first enemy hit by the ray. If the first enemy hit by the ray is slowed or is stunned, those same effects will be applied to the enemies hit by the split rays. The split rays will never go towards Espeon and will refract at a maximum of a 90 degree angle. Distance from initial target to split ray hit is 75% of the max range. Stun copied duration is the maximum duration of the stun causing the initial Pokémon to be stunned.
rsb.notes: For the split ray, the damage component from the initial target's max HP damage is capped at 1000 against Wild Pokémon and capped at 2000 against Player Pokémon.
rsb.add1_true_desc: 6% max HP of the first enemy hit as additional damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Deals additional damage to enemies that are unable to act. If Psybeam hits an unable to act initial target, the split rays will also deal the additional damage to other enemies hit and leaves them unable to act.
rsb.enhanced_add1_true_desc: 5% max HP of the enemy hit as additional damage if the initial target was stunned.

rsb.name: Future Sight
rsb.label: Damage - Initial
rsb.true_desc: Espeon locks-on to an enemy, dealing damage 2 seconds later in an area centered on the locked-on target. Deal more damage based on the locked-on targets missing HP. While locked-on to an enemy, Espeon's other moves will target that enemy whenever possible. If the center of Psyshock is within the area-of-effect of Future Sight when released, Psyshock will home in on the Future Sight affected target. Each time Espeon deals damage through Psyshock, Stored Power, auto attacks, Future Sight's cooldown is reduced by 0.8 seconds. If the locked-on target is on the opposing team and is knocked out before the area damage is dealt but not the percentage missing HP damage, a single powered-up use of Psyshock or Stored Power becomes available for a short time.
rsb.notes: Full Heal and other cleanses such as Blissey's Natural cure remove Future Sight.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Espeon deals 10% additional damage to locked-on targets.

skills.name: Psychic Solaire
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Psychic Solaire
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Espeon throws enemies in the area of effect into the air and suspends them using psychic power. After a delay, an explosion occurs that deals damage to all enemies in the area of effect and shoves them.

name: Garchomp
notes: Only auto attacks and additional damage from boosteds can critically strike. Garchomp's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Rough Skin
skills.description: When struck by a melee attack, a portion of the damage received is reflected back at the attacker.

rsb.name: Rough Skin
rsb.true_desc: When Garchomp takes a hit from a melee Pokémon; 30% of that damage is also dealt to the attacker. 2s cooldown and this damage is subject to defense reduction.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every fifth attack, dealing increased damage and restoring the user's HP. Every time a basic attack or move hits an enemy, basic attack speed is increased.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Any attack or move that hits provides a boosted stack. Stacks last 4s and decay together. At 5 stacks, all of Garchomp's auto attacks become boosted; dealing more damage, attacking faster, gaining 15% lifesteal, and dealing 10% of enemy remaining HP as damage.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokémon: Basic Attack damage is capped at 1000, Boosted Attack damage is capped at 1100, and additional damage from remaining HP is capped at 350.

skills.name: Sand Attack
skills.description: Hurls sand, narrowing the field of vision of enemies and decreases their movement speed for a short time. Also increases movement speed and basic attack speed.

rsb.name: Sand Attack
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp hurls sand toward a designated area; reducing enemy visibility by 50% and slowing them by 20% for 2s. Garchomp's movement speed is increased by 30% for 2s and auto attack speed is increased by 30% for 3s if an enemy is hit.

upgrades.name: Dig
upgrades.description1: Burrow underground and move quickly in the designated direction, jumping out when coming in contact with an enemy or when traveling the maximum distance. This jump deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and throws them.
upgrades.description2: Damage received is reduced for a short time after jumping out of the ground.

rsb.name: Dig
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp quickly dives underground in a short dash; then bursts from the ground at the end of the designated area or beneath the first enemy hit, dealing damage in a small radius and throwing enemies into the air for 0.5s. Defense and Sp. Def. are increased for 3s after jumping out of the ground.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased throw duration to 1s.

upgrades.name: Dragon Rush
upgrades.description1: Back up to create distance before diving to attack in the designated direction, shoving enemies. The user can use Dragon Claw while creating distance at the start of this move to create a combo attack. (This move can crit)
upgrades.description2: Decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when they are shoved the maximum distance.

rsb.name: Dragon Rush
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp jumps back and briefly channels before diving forward; dragging all enemies within a small radius to the designated area and reducing damage taken by 30% for .9s; then deals damage in a radius. Garchomp can use Dragon Claw during the first half of the channel to add the Dragon Claw hits as a combo attack, replacing the radial damage at the end of the move with a damaging stun and slow.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Become unstoppable during this move.

skills.name: Bulldoze
skills.description: Stomp down on the ground, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect.

rsb.name: Bulldoze
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp stomps the ground forcefully; dealing damage in a radius.

upgrades.name: Earthquake
upgrades.description1: Jump high into the air and crash forcefully to the ground, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect.
upgrades.description2: Decrease the movement speed of enemies for a short time if they are in this move's area of effect.

rsb.name: Earthquake
rsb.label: Damage - Initial
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp jumps and crashes forcefully to the ground; dealing damage in a wide radius and slowing enemies by 30% for 2s. After the initial damage, two aftershocks occur in the designated area; each dealing less damage than the initial move.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Slow increased to 45% near the center.

upgrades.name: Dragon Claw
upgrades.description1: Attack twice in front of itself using its claws. The first attack deals damage to enemies and throws them. The second attack deals increased damage. After the move ends, basic attack speed is increased for a short time. (This move can crit)
upgrades.description2: Increase damage dealt.

rsb.name: Dragon Claw
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp viciously claws everything in the designated area twice. The first attack deals damage and pushes enemies. The second attack deals increased damage and slows movement speed by 45%. When using Dragon Rush combo with this move, increase the slow to 60%.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

skills.name: Livid Outrage
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Has the user unleash a powerful chain attack while dashing forward. The final attack throws enemies but also leaves the user unable to act for a short time.

rsb.name: Livid Outrage
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp goes berserk, taking 30% less damage for 5s and unleashes a powerful, unstoppable chain attack. Garchomp dashes and deals damage in the designated area five times; taking a brief moment to aim before every attack. Every attack has a different designated area and does more damage than the last. The fifth and final attack stuns Garchomp for 0.5s and throws all enemies hit into the air. Enemies hit are slowed by 30% for 1s.

name: Gardevoir
notes: Synchronize, Confusion, auto attacks, Psychic, and Moonblast all have their damage increased by 15% after Gardevoir learns Teleport. Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Gardevoir has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Synchronize
skills.description: When an enemy inflicts decreased movement speed or a damge-over-time condition on the Pokémon, the same is inflicted on that opponent. This ability goes on cooldown after it's triggered.

rsb.name: Synchronize
rsb.label: Damage - DoT Applied (4x)
rsb.true_desc: When an enemy inflicts decreased movement speed on Gardevoir, that enemy receives a 40% slow for 3s. When an enemy inflicts a damage-over-time effect on Gardevoir, that enemy will receive a damage-over-time effect lasting 3s. This ability goes on a 8s cooldown when triggered.
rsb.notes: Damage dealt by Synchronize ignores enemy Special Defense.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their Sp. Defense by 10% for a short time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their Sp. Defense by 10% for 2s.

skills.name: Confusion
skills.description: Attacks straight in the designated direction.

rsb.name: Confusion
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gardevoir fires a piercing bolt; damaging enemies and slowing them by 35% for 1s.

upgrades.name: Psychic
upgrades.description1: After hitting an enemy or traveling its maximum distance, deals damage over time to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed and Sp. Defense by 20%, stacking up to 3 times.
upgrades.description2: Reduced cooldown.

rsb.name: Psychic
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gardevoir fires a blast; damaging enemies in an area on impact. The blast creates a lingering field that damages and slows enemies by 50% for 1s. Each time Psychic deals damage it reduces the target’s Special Defense by 20% for 4s, up to 60%.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Cooldown reduced by 1s.

upgrades.name: Moonblast
upgrades.description1: Has the user attack while moving back to create distance. When the move's blast hits, it deals damage to enemies in a cone and leaves the enemy closest to the user unable to act for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Also grants a shield when this move is used.

rsb.name: Moonblast
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gardevoir moves back while firing a blast; stunning the first enemy hit for 1.2s and damaging all enemies in a cone behind it.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Grants Gardevoir a shield for 3s.

skills.name: Teleport
skills.description: Has the user warp to the designated area, increasing the damage dealt by one basic attack after warping.

rsb.name: Teleport
rsb.true_desc: Gardevoir teleports to a targeted area and gains a boosted attack.

upgrades.name: Psyshock
upgrades.description1: Attacks the designated location three times. This move's cooldown is reduced each time one of these attacks hits an enemy.
upgrades.description2: Increase the damage this move deals each time one of its attacks hits.

rsb.name: Psyshock
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gardevoir channels three attacks at the targeted area; damaging enemies. Gardevoir's moves' cooldowns are reduced by 15% each time Psyshock hits an enemy.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Each hit of Psyshock also increases the damage of the next hit.

upgrades.name: Future Sight
upgrades.description1: Sets a delayed explosion. When the explosion hits an enemy, it reduces this move's cooldown.
upgrades.description2: Reset this move's cooldown when the explosion hits an enemy.

rsb.name: Future Sight
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gardevoir creates a delayed explosion at the targeted area; damaging enemies. If Future Sight hits an enemy player (not wild), the cooldown is reduced by 75% and Gardevoir gains 40% movement speed for 1.5s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Cooldown is reset on successful hits.

skills.name: Fairy Singularity
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Warps Space in the designated area, drawing in enemies to the center. Shoves and deals damage to enemies the instant the warped space disappears.

rsb.name: Fairy Singularity
rsb.label: Damage - Final Tick
rsb.true_desc: Gardevoir warps space in a large area, creating a field, damaging all enemies in the radius and pulling them towards the center 4 times. When it expires, the field damages and shoves enemies.

name: Gengar
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Gengar has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels. At level 5, Gengar gains 12.5% spell vamp (restores HP when dealing Special Attack damage).

skills.name: Levitate
skills.description: Increases movement speed when out of combat. (7s after leaving combat)

rsb.name: Levitate
rsb.true_desc: Increases movement speed by 10% when out of combat for 5s.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, lunging at an enemy and dealing damage.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, teleporting to an enemy (even through walls) and dealing increased damage.

skills.name: Will-o-Wisp
skills.description: Shoot multiple sinister flames, dealing damage to enemies and leaving them burned when it hits.

rsb.name: Will-o-Wisp
rsb.label: Damage - First Flame
rsb.true_desc: Shoot 3 sinister flames in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit and leaving them burned for 2s. This burn reduces enemy Attack and Sp. Attack by 10% for 4s. The first wisp to hit a target deals full damage, and subsequent flame hits deal 50% damage.

upgrades.name: Shadow Ball
upgrades.description1: Hurl a shadowy blob at the target, decreasing the movement speed and Sp. Defense of enemies for a short time when it hits.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Shadow Ball
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gengar hurls a shadowy ball forward in a line; damaging, slowing their movement speed by 90% for 1s, and reducing the Sp. Defense of enemies hit for 3s. This ball pierces through wild Pokémon.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

upgrades.name: Sludge Bomb
upgrades.description1: Hurl unsanitary sludge to the designated area, leaving enemies poisoned when it hits.
upgrades.description2: Increased poison duration.

rsb.name: Sludge Bomb
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gengar hurls unsanitary sludge to the designated area, damaging enemies and poisoning them for 5s.  Poison deals 1% of the Pokemon's max HP per tick.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokémon: The poison damage is capped at 120 per tick.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased area duration by 1s (adds 2 additional ticks)

skills.name: Lick
skills.description: Attacks with the user's tongue and pulls enemies toward the user.

rsb.name: Lick
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gengar attacks forward in a line with their tongue, damaging enemies hit, and pulling them to Gengar. The next auto attack is boosted.

upgrades.name: Dream Eater
upgrades.description1: Puts enemies to sleep when it hits. If used again while a nearby enemy is asleep, the user appears behind the target and attacks, restoring HP and reducing the cooldown of Shadow Ball or Sludge Bomb.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage and HP restored.

rsb.name: Dream Eater
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gengar shoots forward a mysterious orb, sleeping enemies for 1s when it hits. If used again when a nearby enemy is affected by Dream Eater, Gengar teleports behind them and attacks; dealing damage to the enemy, healing Gengar, and reducing the cooldown of Will-o-Wisp, Shadow Ball or Sludge Bomb by 2s. Before and after teleporting, the next auto attack is boosted. If Gengar knocks out an enemy player, the cooldown of this move is reset.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage and healing.

upgrades.name: Hex
upgrades.description1: Disappear and move to the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect when the user reappears. If this hits an enemy that is afflicted by a status condition, it deals increased damage and its cooldown is reduced.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Hex
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gengar vanishes and teleports to a designated location, damaging enemies in a radius where Gengar appears. If this hits an enemy afflicted with a status condition, damage dealt is doubled and Hex cooldown is reduced by 85%. The next auto attack is boosted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

skills.name: Phantom Ambush
skills.buffs: 80% Movement Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Jump to the designated area and start sneaking with increased movement speed. If this move is used again, it deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Phantom Ambush
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Jump to the designated area and start sneaking for 7s - gaining 30% increased movement speed, become invisible, and the next auto attack is boosted. Moves and auto attacks can be used while invisible, but bring you above the ground. While above the ground, become visible to the enemies. If this move is used again, deal damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed by 50% for 1.5s.

name: Glaceon
notes: Auto attacks, Ice Shard, and Icy Wind can critically strike. Glaceon's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9. At level 4, Glaceon gains 12.5% spell vamp (restores HP when dealing Special Attack damage).

skills.name: Run Away
skills.description: When Eevee would be affected by a hindrance, the hindrance is negated and becomes invincible for 1s. This Ability goes on cooldown after it’s triggered (70s cd).
skills.passive2_description: When Glaceon would be affected by a hindrance, the hindrance is negated. Glaceon then starts sneaking and becomes invincible for 0.5s. This Ability goes on cooldown after it’s triggered (70s cd) and is reset after respawning.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage and giving Glaceon 2 ice crystals when the boosted attack hits. Ice crystals last 5s and the duration is refreshed upon gaining additional crystals. Glaceon can hold a maximum of 8 ice crystals at a time.

skills.name: Swift
skills.description: Creates 4 stars around the user. For a short time afterward, each time the user hits an enemy with a basic attack, one of the stars (or 2 stars in the case of a boosted attack) will shoot out and deal additional damage to that enemy.

rsb.name: Swift
rsb.label: Damage - per Star
rsb.true_desc: Creates 4 stars around the user. For a short time afterward, each time the user hits an enemy with a basic attack or boosted attack, one or two of the stars respectively will shoot out and deal additional damage to the target.

upgrades.name: Icicle Spear
upgrades.description1: Has the user launch all of their stored ice crystals in rapid succession at the designated enemy. If no ice crystals are stored when this move is used, 2 ice crystals are instantly created and all crystals are launched. The crystals shatter when they hit the designated target, dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect. Launched ice crystals can hit enemies on the opposing team that are not the designated target of this move. If this occurs, the ice crystals will still shatter on impact and deal damage in an area in the same way. Ice crystals launched by this move deal increasing damage each time they hit the same enemy. After this move is used, the cooldown of Ice Shard or Freeze-Dry is reduced.
upgrades.description2: Each launched ice crystal also deals additional damage to enemies hit, equal to a set percentage of their max HP.

rsb.name: Icicle Spear
rsb.label: Damage - per Ice Crystal
rsb.true_desc: Glaceon gains an increase in movement speed by 50% for 0.5s then launches all of its stored ice crystals in rapid succession at the designated enemy. If Glaceon has no ice crystals when this move is used, 2 ice crystals are instantly created and are launched. Launched ice crystals can hit enemies on the opposing team that are not the designated target of this move. The crystals shatter when they hit any enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in the area. Ice crystals launched by this move deal  5% increased damage each time they hit the same enemy (capped at 35%). When this move is used, Ice Shard's cooldown is reduced by 2s and Freeze Dry's cooldown is reduced by 2.5s. A maximum of 12 ice crystals may be launched.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Each launched ice crystal also deals additional damage to enemies hit equal to 2% of their remaining HP.
rsb.enhanced_notes: Against Wild Pokémon: This additional damage is capped at 300.

upgrades.name: Icy Wind
upgrades.description1: Jump a short distance in the designated direction. Glaceon's next basic attack launches all stored ice crystals at an enemy, dealing damage to them. Glaceon then regains the same number of ice crystals that were launched. If Glaceon hits the same enemy with 1 or more ice crystals, that enemies movement speed is decreased for a short time. The more ice crystals that hit that target, the stronger this movement speed-decrease effect. If Glaceon has no ice crystals when this move is used, gain 2 ice crystals.
upgrades.description2: Each launched ice crystal also deals additional damage to the enemy hit, equal to a set percentage of their max HP.

rsb.name: Icy Wind
rsb.label: Damage - per Ice Crystal
rsb.true_desc: Jump a short distance in the designated direction; Glaceon's next auto attack within 5s gains increased range and launches all stored ice crystals at an enemy, dealing damage to them. Glaceon then regains the same number of ice crystals that were launched. If an enemy is hit by 4 or more ice crystals, their movement speed is decreased by 8% per shard (stacking up to 6 times) for 1s. If Glaceon has no ice crystals when this move is used, gain 2 ice crystals.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Each launched ice crystal also deals additional damage to enemies hit equal to 1.5% of their remaining HP.
rsb.enhanced_notes: Against Wild Pokémon: This additional damage is capped at 300.

skills.name: Tail Whip
skills.description: The user wags their tail at an enemy, dealing damage and decreasing their Defense, Sp. Def, and movement speed for a short time. The user's next basic attack after using this move becomes a boosted attack.

rsb.name: Tail Whip
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Has the user wag its tail at an enemy, dealing damage and decreasing their Defense and Sp. Def by 30% for 2s, and movement speed by 20% for 1.5s. The next auto attack after using this move becomes a boosted attack.

upgrades.name: Ice Shard
upgrades.description1: Increase movement speed for a short time. Afterward, Glaceon's basic attack speed increases for a short time, and basic attacks change into attacks that hurl chunks of ice. These chunks of ice deal damage to enemies hit and decrease their movement speed for a short time. Every time a chunk of ice hits, the user gains 1 ice crystal. The user gains 2 ice crystals if this move is used while launching ice crystals with Icicle Spear, or if it's used after Icy Wind has been used, but before the user has launched all ice crystals with the next basic attack.
upgrades.description2: Also increases basic attack speed for the duration of this move's effect.

rsb.name: Ice Shard
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Glaceon's basic attack speed is increased by 50% for 2.5s, and basic attacks change into attacks that hurl chunks of ice for 2.5s. These chunks of ice deal damage to enemies they hit and decrease their movement speed by 30% for 1s. Each time a chunk of ice hits, Glaceon gains 2 ice crystals. Gain 2 ice crystals if this move is used while launching crystals with Icicle Spear, or if this move is used after Icy Wind but before launching all crystals with the next auto attack.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases basic attack speed further to 65% for 2.5s.

upgrades.name: Freeze Dry
upgrades.description1: Glaceon shoots out a freezing burst of air in a forward direction, increasing Sp. Atk for a short time. . This burst explodes upon hitting an enemy or after traveling a set distance; dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect. For each enemy hit by the explosion, Glaceon gains 1 ice crystal. The explosion also leaves behind an ice zone. Enemies that enter this ice zone will have their movement speed decreased. If they remain in the ice zone for a set amount of time, they become frozen for a short time.
upgrades.description2: For each enemy hit by this move's explosions; gain 1 ice crystal.

rsb.name: Freeze Dry
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Shoot out a freezing burst of air in a forward direction. This burst explodes upon hitting an enemy or after traveling a set distance; dealing damage to all enemies in the area. Upon hitting an enemy, increase Glaceon's Sp. Atk by 50% for 3s. For each enemy hit by the explosion, Glaceon gains 2 ice crystals. The explosion also leaves behind an ice zone which slows enemies that enter by 20% for 3s. If they remain in the ice zone for 2.5s, they become frozen for 0.6s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: For each enemy hit by this move's explosions, Glaceon gains 1 additional ice crystal.

skills.name: Glacial Stage
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 35% Attack Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Leap up high, creating an ice zone in front of Glaceon that deals damage to enemies in the area-of-effect. While Glaceon is in the ice zone, movement speed is increased and Glaceon gains 1 ice crystal whenever a set amount of time passes. The movement speed of enemies in the ice zone is decreased.

rsb.name: Glacial Stage
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Glaceon leaps up high, creating an ice zone in front of themself that deals damage to enemies in the area-of-effect. While Glaceon is in the ice zone, their movement speed is increased by 50% for 6s, and Glaceon gains 1 ice crystals every second while in the zone. The movement speed of enemies in the ice zone is decreased by 50% for 1s.

name: Goodra

builds.name: Muddy Whip
builds.explanation: Muscle Band for https://unite-db.com/boost-emblems?build=045A,049A,048A,012A,242A,145A,016A,113A,249A,202A OR https://unite-db.com/boost-emblems?build=045A,049A,048A,012A,242A,145A,016A,113A,249A,248A ; Rapid Fire Scarf for https://unite-db.com/boost-emblems?build=004A,005A,006A,244A,242A,145A,226A,146A,144A,249A

builds.name: Dragon Whip
builds.explanation: Path Tank must run EXP share; X Speed may be run instead of either Eject Button or Potion for both builds respectively. Dragon Pulse is bugged where movement can cancel the fourth tick of Dragon Pulse. For Muscle Band use https://unite-db.com/boost-emblems?build=045A,049A,048A,012A,242A,145A,016A,113A,249A,202A. For EXP share, use https://unite-db.com/boost-emblems?build=004A,005A,006A,244A,242A,145A,226A,146A,144A,249A

builds.name: Muddy Spray
builds.explanation: Emphasis on using Unite as recovery. Emblemed for attack speed to balance out the loss in attack speed item. https://unite-db.com/boost-emblems?build=004A,005A,006A,244A,242A,145A,226A,146A,144A,249A

builds.name: Dragon Spray
builds.explanation: Path Tank must run EXP share; X Speed may be run instead of either Eject Button or Potion for both builds respectively. Dragon Pulse is bugged where movement can cancel the fourth tick of Dragon Pulse. For Muscle Band use https://unite-db.com/boost-emblems?build=045A,049A,048A,012A,242A,145A,016A,113A,249A,202A. For EXP share, use https://unite-db.com/boost-emblems?build=004A,005A,006A,244A,242A,145A,226A,146A,144A,249A

notes: Only auto attacks and additional damage from boosteds can critically strike, but Goodra has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

rsb.name: Gooey
rsb.label: Damage (Slime)
rsb.true_desc: When this Pokémon is hit by an attack, there is a chance it will spread slime around itself. The slime deals damage to Pokémon and applies a Gooey debuff for a short time. The Gooey debuff slows Pokémon by 8% for 6s, can stack up to 4 times per Pokémon and decreases attack speed by 30% for 2s. Gooey is a debuff that is applicable to Wild Pokémon and enemy players only.
rsb.notes: When this Pokémon enters tall grass, it continually recovers HP for up to 3s, until it leaves the tall grass or makes a boosted attack. When this Pokémon recovers HP due to Gooey, its attack gauge is progressed towards a boosted attack. This HP recovery goes on a 12s cooldown after being triggered.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage. Hitting a Pokémon afflicted with a Gooey effect with a basic attack reduces all of this Pokémon's move cooldowns by 1.5s.
rsb.notes: Boosted attacks spew slime and if the slime hits Pokémon from a distance, a Gooey debuff is applied to those Pokémon. If the boosted attack is used on a Pokémon in regular attack melee range, the attack deals increased damage.

boosted_rsb.name: Boosted
boosted_rsb.label: Damage - Boosted
boosted_rsb.add1_true_desc: 5% Max HP damage (Capped at 500 on Wild Pokémon)

rsb.name: Bubble
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Cover itself in a bubble, granting it a shield for 3s. When the shield’s effect duration ends or if this move is used again, the bubble shield pops, dealing damage to nearby opposing Pokémon and slowing them by 30% for 2s.

rsb.name: Muddy Water
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Splashes muddy water around itself, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and applying an effect to them that decreases the amount of damage they deal by 10% for 3s. If the user deals damage to opposing Pokémon with this move, the user’s Defense and Sp. Def are increased for 2s. If Muddy Water is used within 6 seconds, the defense bonus effect is increased in intensity. The defenses bonus effect can stack up to four times.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Further increases the user’s Defense and Sp. Def when this move deals damage to opposing Pokémon.

rsb.name: Dragon Pulse
rsb.label: Damage (Center - per hit up to 4 hits)
rsb.true_desc: Unleashes a shock wave in the designated direction, dealing damage to Pokémon it hits up to 4 times. If the center of the shock wave hits enemy Pokémon, it deals increased damage to them and restores the user’s HP. More HP is restored when the center of the pulse deals damage to enemy Pokémon that have a Gooey slowing effect applied to them.
rsb.notes: The fourth tick of damage can be animation cancelled by inputs (attack or movement). It is undetermined if this is a bug or not.
rsb.add1_label: Damage (Side - per hit up to 4 hits)
rsb.add2_label: Healing (Per hit up to 4x based on number of Center hits)
rsb.add3_label: Healing (Gooey Center- Per hit up to 4x based on number of Center hits)
