rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Restores more HP if the center of the shock wave hits Pokémon, and even more on Pokémon that have a Gooey debuff applied to them.
rsb.enhanced_add1_label: Healing (Per hit up to 4x based on number of Center hits)
rsb.enhanced_add2_label: Healing (Gooey Center- Per hit up to 4x based on number of Center hits)

rsb.name: Tackle
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charges at a Pokémon, dealing damage and throwing it. If this move hits, the user bounces back a short distance.

rsb.name: Power Whip
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Lashes out with its horns in the designated direction, dealing damage to Pokémon in the area of effect and slowing them by 50% for 2s. If this move hits distant Pokémon, those Pokémon are pulled toward Goodra.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also applies a Gooey slowing effect when this move hits.

rsb.name: Acid Spray
rsb.label: Damage (Initial)
rsb.true_desc: Spits acidic fluid at target Pokémon, dealing damage to Pokémon in an area of effect centered on the target slowing them by 40% for 2s. If this move is used again, Goodra charges in the designated direction and deals damage to opposing Pokémon it hits. If this charge hits a Pokémon that has been marked by acidic fluid, that Pokémon is thrown, and damage is also dealt to nearby opposing Pokémon.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also applies a Gooey slowing effect to opposing Pokémon that receive damage from either the acidic fluid or the charge.

skills.name: Right as Rain
skills.buffs: 40% Max HP Shield, 30% Movement Speed

rsb.name: Right as Rain
rsb.label: Healing (13 ticks)
rsb.true_desc: Causes rain to fall around the user, gradually restoring the user’s HP over 6s. While this move is active, all of the user’s basic attacks become boosted attacks.

name: Greedent
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Greedent has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Cheek Pouch
skills.description: When Greedent eats a berry, recover HP after receiving the effects of the berry. At the same time, Greedent stashes another berry in its tail. Being hit by a single attack or combination of attacks will cause a berry to drop from Greedent's tail.

rsb.name: Cheek Pouch
rsb.true_desc: When Greedent eats a berry, recover HP after receiving the effects of the berry. At the same time, Greedent stashes an Oran berry in its tail. Being hit by a single attack or combination of attacks will cause an Oran berry to drop from Greedent's tail (4.5s cd). Berries stay on the ground for 10s.
rsb.notes: If any ally or enemy eats an Oran Berry, they heal for 45 + 2% max HP (unless the enemy is Greedent). Greedent enemies that eat an Oran Berry heal for 45 + 5 x (Level -1) + 2% max HP

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits and causing one berry to drop from Greedent's tail.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits and causing one Oran berry to drop from Greedent's tail.

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: Leap to the designated area, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed for a short time. If this move is used while Covet is active, no area can be designated for the user to leap to. Instead, while the user is running, damage is dealt in an area to enemies in front of Greedent. If Greedent has any berries stashed, consume all of them, reducing Tackle's cooldown for each berry consumed.

rsb.name: Tackle
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Leap to the designated area, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed by 20% for 1s. If this move is used while Covet is active, no area can be designated for Greedent to leap to. Instead, while running, damage is dealt in an area to enemies in front of Greedent. If Greedent has any Oran berries stashed, consume all of them, reducing Tackle's cooldown by 1s for each berry consumed.

upgrades.name: Bullet Seed
upgrades.description1: Spit berry seeds in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed for a short time. The more berries Greedent has stashed, the more damage this move deals.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Bullet Seed
rsb.label: Damage - per Seed
rsb.true_desc: Spit berry seeds in the designated direction for 6s; dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 1s. Greedent fires more seeds for each Oran berry stashed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

upgrades.name: Belch
upgrades.description1: Deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed for a short time. If Greedent has any berries stashed, consume all of them, reducing Belch's cooldown for each berry consumed.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Belch
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed by 15% for 1s. If Greedent has any Oran berries stashed, consume all of them, reducing Belch's cooldown by 1s for each berry consumed (capping at 4s). This move's cooldown cannot be reduced beyond 1s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

skills.name: Defense Curl
skills.description: Grants Greedent a shield for a short time. In addition, a berry will drop in front of Greedent.

rsb.name: Defense Curl
rsb.true_desc: Grants Greedent a shield (10% max HP) for 3s. In addition, an Oran berry will drop in front of Greedent.

upgrades.name: Stuff Cheeks
upgrades.description1: Greedent drops several berries, which can be eaten to recover HP. Any HP recovered that exceeds Greedent's max HP will be converted to a shield. If Greedent catches sight of a berry while using this move, movement speed is increased for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increase the number of berries dropped.

rsb.name: Stuff Cheeks
rsb.true_desc: Greedent drops 5 Oran berries, which can be eaten to recover HP. Any HP recovered from an Oran berry eaten within 5s that exceeds Greedent's max HP will be converted to a shield for 1.8% max HP per berry. If Greedent catches sight of a berry while using this move, movement speed is increased by 70% for 6s, but decreasing by 15% every 1s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increase the number of Oran berries dropped by 1.

upgrades.name: Covet
upgrades.description1: Greedent runs with all its might, becoming unstoppable and dealing damage to enemies hit and throwing them. While running, Greedent drops berries. Eating a dropped berry increases movement speed for a short time. The more berries eaten, the more movement speed is increased. In addition, Belch or Bullet Seed can also be used while running.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage dealt and increased frequency of berries dropping.

rsb.name: Covet
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Greedent runs with all its might for 6s; becoming resistant to hindrances (for 6.1s), dealing damage to enemies hit and throwing them. While running; Greedent drops Oran berries every 1s. Eating a dropped berry increases movement speed by 22% for 1s (stacking up to 5 times). In addition, Tackle, Belch or Bullet Seed can also be used while running and using this move will reset the cooldown of Tackle or Belch.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage and increased frequency of Oran berries dropping (8 berries over 6s).

skills.name: Berry Belly Flop
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 40% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Greedent eats a berry to recover HP and then leaps to the designated area, dealing damage and throwing enemies within the area of effect. Greedent then eats a special berry, allowing an unlimited amount of berries to be stored for a short time and resets cooldowns of all moves.

rsb.name: Berry Belly Flop
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Greedent eats a special berry to recover 15% max HP and then leaps to the designated area; becoming briefly unstoppable,  dealing damage, and throwing enemies within the area of effect. Greedent then eats another berry, allowing an unlimited amount of Oran berries to be stored for 8s and resets cooldowns of all moves.

name: Greninja

builds.name: Surf Screen (Ranged)
builds.explanation: Emphasize ranged attacks to lower into Surf reset range

builds.name: Surf Screen (Speedster)
builds.explanation: Emphasize Unite OHKO combination

builds.name: Surf Screen (Hybrid)
builds.explanation: In between of Surf Screen Ranged and Speedster set ups

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Greninja's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Torrent
skills.description: While HP is at 50% or less, Attack and movement speed are increased.

rsb.name: Torrent
rsb.true_desc: While HP is at 50% or less, Attack is increased by 5% and movement speed is increased by 12%.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. At long range, a boosted attack deals increased damage to enemies and decreases their movement speed for a short time. At close range, a boosted attack deals more damage the lower the enemies remaining HP is.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: At range, Greninja's auto attacks reduce the cooldown of Surf, Water Shuriken, or Bubble by 0.5s and boosted attacks reduce enemy movement speed by 25% for 0.5s. In melee, Greninja's auto attacks instead deal bonus damage equal to 5% missing HP (calculated as auto attack damage and subject to auto attack effects). Boosted melee attacks also dash through the primary target and increases the missing HP damage to 10%.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokémon:  The total damage of melee attacks is capped at 500.

skills.name: Bubble
skills.description: Attack with a spray of bubbles, decreasing the movement speed of enemies when it hits.

rsb.name: Bubble
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (2 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Greninja launches 2 bubbles which pop when they hit an enemy, damaging and slowing them by 25% for 1s.

upgrades.name: Water Shuriken
upgrades.description1: Throw shurikens made of water in quick succession. Decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time and restores the user's HP when it hits. Also increases the user's movement speed while using this move.
upgrades.description2: Increases the number of shurikens thrown.

rsb.name: Water Shuriken
rsb.label: Damage - per Shuriken
rsb.true_desc: Greninja throws 4 shurikens made of water which explode when they hit an enemy, damaging and slowing enemies by 25% for 1s in a small area while healing Greninja. While using this move, Greninja's movement speed is increased by 15% for 3s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Throws 5 shurikens instead.

upgrades.name: Surf
upgrades.description1: Ride a wave, dealing damage to enemies and restoring the user's HP. If this move knocks out an enemy, its cooldown is reset. In addition, this move deals increased damage to enemies with low HP.
upgrades.description2: Increases the amount of HP restored.

rsb.name: Surf
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Greninja dashes on a wave, damaging enemies and healing themself for each enemy hit. Enemies below half health are dealt bonus damage, and if this move KOs an enemy the cooldown is reset.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokémon: The first hit is capped at 1200 and the second hit is capped at 600.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased healing.

skills.name: Substitute
skills.description: Leaves behind a substitute doll for the user while it's moving forward.

rsb.name: Substitute
rsb.true_desc: Greninja dashes while leaving behind a targetable decoy. Greninja is unstoppable while dashing.

upgrades.name: Double Team
upgrades.description1: Quickly moves the user away from the current position, creating illusory copies of it to aid in battle.
upgrades.description2: Reduced cooldown.

rsb.name: Double Team
rsb.true_desc: Greninja briefly vanishes before dashing and sending clones in different directions. The clones attack nearby targets, have the same HP and defenses as Greninja (but incoming damage is increase to 500%), deal 18% of Greninja's damage (clones use Surf or Water Shuriken - whichever is learned by Greninja), and last for 3s. Greninja is unstoppable while dashing.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Cooldown reduced by 1s.

upgrades.name: Smokescreen
upgrades.description1: Creates a smokescreen and has the user roll away from its current location. Immediately afterward, the user begins sneaking and has its movement speed increased for a short time. This also makes its next basic attack a boosted attack.
upgrades.description2: Increased attack for a short time when the user stops sneaking.

rsb.name: Smokescreen
rsb.label: Damage - Boosted (Replacement)
rsb.true_desc: Greninja becomes invisible for 3s, gaining 10% bonus movement speed, and leaving behind a cloud of smoke. Enemies that stay in the smoke cloud have their vision range reduced by 60%. Greninja's next attack is boosted and deals increased damage, melee and ranged bonus effects apply. Greninja is unstoppable while dashing.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also increases Greninja's attack by 20% for 2s when leaving stealth.

skills.name: Waterburst Shuriken
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 35% Attack Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Throw a giant water shuriken toward the designated area, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time when this move hits. The water shuriken then immediately explodes, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and throws them. Once this move ends, the user may jump in a designated direction.

rsb.name: Waterburst Shuriken
rsb.label: Damage (2x)
rsb.true_desc: Throw a giant water shuriken toward the designated area, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and those in the line shown by arrowed reticule but are outside Greninja's melee attack range. Pokémon damaged by the designated circular area have their movement speed decreased by 50% for 2s when this move hits. The water shuriken then immediately explodes, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and throws them in the air. Once this move ends, Greninja may jump in a designated direction.

name: Hoopa
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Hoopa has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Magician
skills.description: In battles where the map is divided into an ally team side and an opposing team side, this ability creates a hole under one of the berries on the opposing team's side (chosen at random) and warps it in front of Hoopa. If there are no berries, but there is Aeos Energy on the ground, then some energy is warped in front of Hoopa instead. In the event that no berries from the opposing team's side are warped, the cooldown of this ability is reduced.

rsb.name: Magician
rsb.true_desc: In battles where the map is divided into an ally team side and an opposing team side, this ability creates a hole under one of the berries on the opposing team's side (chosen at random) and warps it in front of Hoopa (40s cooldown). If there are no berries, but there is Aeos Energy on the ground, then some energy is warped in front of Hoopa instead. In the event that no berries from the opposing team's side are warped, the cooldown of this ability is reduced to 20s.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage to enemies by unleashing a beam of light. When Hoopa is unbound, every attack becomes a boosted attack and deals damage to up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage to enemies by unleashing a beam of light.

skills.name: Astonish
skills.description: Deals damage to enemies in the designated area of effect, leaving them unable to act for a short time.

rsb.name: Astonish
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Deals damage to enemies in the designated area of effect, leaving them unable to act for .75s.

upgrades.name: Phantom Force
upgrades.description1: Hoopa creates a portal ring under itself and warps to a designated location, dealing damage to nearby enemies at that location and shoving them. Hoopa then shoots two sinister flames that deal damage to enemies hit and decreases their movement speed for a short time. This move can be used a second time within a set amount of time. If used a second time, Hoopa can return to the initial location they warped from. When using this move, if there is a nearby ally that is linked by Trick, that ally can also warp to the initial ring's location. The ally that warps in this way will recover HP.
upgrades.description2: Become invincible for a short time when this move is used.

rsb.name: Phantom Force
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Hoopa creates a portal ring under themself and warps to a designated location, dealing damage to nearby enemies at that location and shoving them. Hoopa then shoots two sinister flames that deal damage to enemies hit and decreases their movement speed by 40% for 2s. This move can be activated a second time within 5s and if activated, Hoopa can return to the initial ring's location. If there is a nearby ally that is also linked by Trick, that ally can warp to the initial ring's location and recover 30% max HP.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Become invincible for .6s when this move is used.

upgrades.name: Shadow Ball
upgrades.description1: Unleash a shadowy blob in front of Hoopa, dealing damage to enemies hit and decreases their movement speed and Sp. Def for a short time. If Hoopa then hits the same enemy with a move or boosted attack within a set amount of time, it deals additional damage and leaves the enemy unable to act for a short time. When using this move, if there is a nearby ally linked by Trick, this move will also unleash a shadowy blob at the same target from that ally's location.
upgrades.description2: The shadowy blob will now explode before disappearing. Enemies hit by the explosion are affected as if they were hit by the shadowy blob itself.

rsb.name: Shadow Ball
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Unleash a shadowy blob in front of Hoopa, dealing damage to enemies hit and decreasing their movement speed by 50% for 1s and Sp. Defense by 30% for 3s. If Hoopa then hits the same enemy with a move or boosted attack within 4s, deal additional damage and leave the enemy unable to act for .8s. When using this move, if there is a nearby ally linked by Trick, this move will also unleash a shadowy blob at the same target from that ally's location.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The shadowy blob will now explode before disappearing. Enemies hit by the explosion are affected as if they were hit by the shadowy blob itself.

skills.name: Confusion
skills.description: Unleash a telekinetic force in the designated direction, dealing damage to the first enemy hit. The telekinetic force clings to that enemy and then causes a delayed explosion. The explosion deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Confusion
rsb.label: Damage - Initial
rsb.true_desc: Unleash a telekinetic force in the designated direction, dealing damage to the first enemy hit. The telekinetic force clings to that enemy and then causes a delayed explosion. The explosion deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

upgrades.name: Hyperspace Hole
upgrades.description1: Hoopa creates a large ring at the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. After a set amount of time, Hoopa and any allies in the area of effect will return to their base, and their movement speed will be increased for a short time. These allies can also warp back to where the ring was created. An intact ally forward goal zone can also be designated as the location where the ring is created. Creating the ring on this forward goal zone of the top path will also create a ring on the forward goal zone of the bottom path, and vice versa. All allies, including Hoopa, can use these rings to warp between the two goal zones, and their movement speed will be increased for a short time after warping. After an ally warps, there is a set cooldown before that ally can use these rings again. If a path's forward goal zone is destroyed, the middle goal zone on the same path will take its place. This move cannot be used on base goal zones.
upgrades.description2: Also increases the movement speed of allies near the ring when they are heading towards it.

rsb.name: Hyperspace Hole
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Hoopa creates a large ring at the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. After 3s, Hoopa and any allies in the area of effect will return to their base, and their movement speed will be increased for a short time. These allies can also manually warp back to where the ring was created within 3s. An intact ally forwardmost goal zone can also be designated as the location where the ring is created. Creating a ring on the goal zone of the top path will also create a ring on the forwardmost goal zone of the bottom path for 6.5s, and vice versa. All allies (including Hoopa) can use these rings to manually warp between the two goal zones, and their movement speed will be increased for a short time after warping. After an ally or Hoopa warps, there is a 10s cooldown before that Pokémon can manually warp again. If a path's forwardmost goal zone is destroyed, the middle goal zone on the same path will take its place. This move cannot be used on base goal zones. Hyperspace Hole's portal usage cooldown applies only to Hyperspace Hole teleports, and is reset upon usage of ult if there are multiple effects that would allow you to teleport (ie Phantom Force and Rings Unbound), Rings Unbound will take priority. Hyperspace Holes can be seen by enemies on the minimap.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also increases the movement speed of allies near the ring when they are heading towards it.

upgrades.name: Trick
upgrades.description1: Hoopa creates a link between itself and an ally using a ring, increasing both of their movement speeds and granting them each a shield for a short time. When Hoopa uses Shadow Ball or performs a basic attack, the ring on the linked ally also unleashes the same move or attack. Hoopa can also use this move on themself, increasing movement speed and granting a shield for a short time. Additionally, it increases the damage dealt by Shadow Ball.
upgrades.description2: Also restores the linked ally Pokémon's HP when it deals damage to enemies.

rsb.name: Trick
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Hoopa creates a link between itself and an ally, increasing both of their movement speeds by 70% for 2s and granting them each a shield for 3s. For the next 7s, when Hoopa uses Shadow Ball or performs an auto attack, the ring on the linked ally also unleashes the same move or attack and if both attacks hit the same target, the second deals 50% damage. Hoopa can also use this move on themself, increasing movement speed and granting a shield for a short time. Additionally, increase the damage dealt by Shadow Ball while Trick is active.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Hoopa and the linked ally each heal for 25% of their own damage dealt. This effect lasts for 3s.

skills.name: Rings Unbound
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Transforms Hoopa into Hoopa Unbound for a short time, increasing max HP and creating a ring at the designated location. Each ally can warp to the ring's location one time. As Hoopa Unbound, moves change to Hyperspace Fury and Psybeam. Hoopa Unbound cannot score goals or activate the Magician ability.

rsb.name: Rings Unbound
rsb.true_desc: Hoopa becomes invincible for 0.6s while transforming into Hoopa Unbound, then becomes unstoppable for 0.3s as it opens a large portal ring at a designated location. Hoopa Unbound lasts for 15s, increasing max HP by 40% and changes Hoopa's regular moves to Hyperspace Fury and Psybeam. Hoopa Unbound cannot score goals or activate the Magician ability.
rsb.notes: The portal ring created stays open for 10s, and allies can warp to that location once within the duration of the ring. This portal is indicated on the mini map where all players may see where it is.

secondary_unite_rsb.name: Auto Attack
secondary_unite_rsb.label: Damage
secondary_unite_rsb.true_desc: Basic attacks change and become boosted attacks that deal damage to up to 2 nearby enemies. If only one target is in range then both beams hit the same target, but 1 beam deals 50% damage.

secondary_unite_rsb.name: Psybeam
secondary_unite_rsb.label: Damage
secondary_unite_rsb.true_desc: Fire a peculiar ray in front of Hoopa in a horizontal sweeping motion, dealing damage to enemies hit. Hoopa Unbound becomes immune to hindrances while using this move. (9s cooldown).

secondary_unite_rsb.name: Hyperspace Fury
secondary_unite_rsb.label: Damage (7x)
secondary_unite_rsb.true_desc: Unleash 7 attacks in the designated area with Hoopa Unbound's many arms, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leave them unable to act for 1s. (7s cooldown).

name: Lapras

builds.name: Bubble Pulse
builds.explanation: Competitive tank- No emblems or https://unite-db.com/boost-emblems?build=049A,048A,045A,043A,012A,189A,145A,242A,249A,016A (Pidgey or Chansey interchangeable)

builds.name: Bubble Pulse
builds.explanation: Major cooldown focus for Bubble Beam for tanking

builds.name: Bubble Pulse
builds.explanation: Major Bubble Beam focus

builds.name: Bubble Pulse
builds.explanation: Competitive All Rounder- No emblems or see link (Pidgey or Chansey usable)

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Lapras has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

rsb.name: Shell Armor
rsb.true_desc: If Lapras would take a single instance of damage that would be greater than 10% of Lapras's maximum HP, this damage will be reduced by 25%.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, shooting water through the target and dealing increased damage to Pokémon hit by the spray. The boosted attack also heals Lapras.

rsb.name: Whirlpool
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Create a whirlpool centered on Lapras that lasts for 3s, dealing damage over time to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect. The time between hits is shorter the farther opposing Pokémon are from the whirlpool’s center.

rsb.name: Water Pulse
rsb.label: Damage (First Pulse)
rsb.true_desc: Release a pulse of water centered on itself that spreads out, dealing damage to Pokémon it hits and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 2s. For each opposing Pokémon hit by a pulse from this move, an additional pulse will be released the next time this move is used within 8 seconds, up to a total of 3 pulses. If the first pulse after activating this move hits a Pokémon, the user’s next basic attack becomes a boosted attack.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the maximum number of pulses to 4.

rsb.name: Perish Song
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Sing an eerie melody that echoes around yourself, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon it hits. This move can be used up to three times consecutively within 5s of its last use. Pokémon hit all three times take additional damage equal to one Perish Song hit. If the additional damage would bring an enemy Pokémon below 10% percentage of their max HP, that enemy Pokémon will take 40% of their maximum HP as True Damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The next basic attack after using this move becomes a boosted attack.

rsb.name: Ice Shard
rsb.label: Damage - per Chunk
rsb.true_desc: Hurl 5 chunks of ice in a forward direction, dealing damage to Pokémon they hit and leaving them frozen for 0.6s. If this move hits a Pokémon that is already frozen, it deals damage to it and shoves in the direction of the ice shards for 0.4s.

rsb.name: Bubble Beam
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Create a bubble shield on Lapras for up to 4s or until the shield is broken, then spray 5 bubbles with a beam in the designated direction. Pokémon hit by the bubbles take damage and are enveloped by it, leaving them unable to act for 1s. After the bubbles fly a set distance, they slowly float for 3s. Pokémon hit by a floating bubble are enveloped by it and left unable to act for 1s, but will not be damaged.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the strength of the shield granted by this move.

rsb.name: Ice Beam
rsb.label: Damage - Beam and Ground Damage over time
rsb.true_desc: Unleash an icy-cold beam of energy in the designated direction, dealing damage to Pokémon it hits and freezing the ground for 3s. Pokémon on the frozen ground take damage equal to the beam's damage every 0.5s they remain on it and have their movement speed decreased by 15% for 2s stacking up to 6 times. Pokémon become frozen for 1s if they remain on the frozen ground for 1.5s. When Lapras is on the frozen ground, Lapras's movement speed is increased by 20%, lingering for 0.5s if Lapras leaves the frozen ground.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increase the duration Pokémon are Frozen for to 1.5s.

skills.name: Lapras Express
skills.buffs: 20% Max HP Shield on activation, 40% Max HP shield manually stopping and releasing a wave. 30% Movement speed after stopping.

rsb.name: Lapras Express
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Ride a wave quickly and continuously forward becoming Unstoppable for up to 15s. Lapras’s movement speed increases every second while riding but decreases if the user hits an obstacle. If this move is used again, the user stops and launches a wave that continues moving forward, dealing damage to Pokémon it hits and throwing them for 1.5s. If the user hits an enemy Pokémon while still riding, the user stops in place, dealing damage to and throwing the opposing Pokémon for 1.5s. While the user is riding the wave, one nearby ally Pokémon of the user’s choice within range may be picked up and can ride on its back. Ally Pokémon riding on the user’s back can dismount whenever they choose.

name: Lucario
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Lucario's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Steadfast
skills.description: While at low HP, gain a shield and increased movement speed. (30s cooldown)

rsb.name: Steadfast
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: When dropping below 50% HP, gain a shield and increased movement speed for 5s (60s cooldown).

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, performing a combo attack with a bone. Deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and throws them.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, striking twice. The first attack is a normal basic attack and the second is an additional attack that can critically hit, has increased attack range, and throws enemies into the air.

skills.name: Quick Attack
skills.description: Has the user lunge forward at a speed that makes it almost invisible, dealing damage to enemies it comes in contact with.

rsb.name: Quick Attack
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Lucario dashes forward, damaging all enemies hit.

upgrades.name: Extreme Speed
upgrades.description1: Charge forward with breathtaking speed. If this move hits an enemy from point-blank range, its cooldown is reset and it restores the user's HP. However, the cooldown cannot be continually reset by using this move on the same enemy multiple times in succession.
upgrades.description2: Increases Attack for a short time when this move is used.

rsb.name: Extreme Speed
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Lucario dashes forward, damaging all enemies hit and healing Lucario for each enemy hit. The first enemy hit will reset the cooldown of Extreme Speed. This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every 10s. Attacking immediately after the dash will perform a unique attack in an area dealing 75% Atk and can critically hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases Lucario's damage by 7.5% for 2s. This buff activates regardless if an enemy was hit, and is applied the moment this move is activated.

upgrades.name: Power-Up Punch
upgrades.description1: Charges power before unleashing a powerful attack. While the user is charging power, its movement speed is decreased but its Attack slowly increases and the damage it receives is reduced. The user then charges in the designated direction and releases this move, dealing more damage the lower the enemies remaining HP is. The next basic attack becomes a boosted attack if the move hits. This move's cooldown is reduced every time one of the user's moves hits.
upgrades.description2: Become immune to hindrances while charging power.

rsb.name: Power-Up Punch
rsb.label: Damage - Uncharged
rsb.true_desc: Lucario begins charging power, slowing themself and reducing damage taken by 30% while preparing to unleash a devastating punch. Upon release, Lucario lunges – damaging the first enemy hit and briefly stunning them. Power-Up Punch does bonus damage based on their missing HP, and will cause Lucario's next attack to be boosted. The cooldown for Power-Up Punch is reduced by 1s whenever Lucario lands a move.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokémon: The additional damage from missing HP is capped at 1000.
rsb.add2_true_desc: 10% of Enemy Missing HP (caps at 1000 dmg).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Lucario is unstoppable while charging the punch.

skills.name: Meteor Mash
skills.description: Blast forward with a punch like a comet, dealing damage to enemies and shoving them.

rsb.name: Meteor Mash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Lucario punches with the force of a meteor, damaging and knocking enemies back.

upgrades.name: Bone Rush
upgrades.description1: Performs a combo attack with a bone, dealing multiple damaging blows to enemies and shoving them. The final attack sends the bone flying. If used again while the bone is traveling, the user rushes to the location of the bone, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
upgrades.description2: Using this move again will reset the cooldown for Extreme Speed or Power-Up Punch.

rsb.name: Bone Rush
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (4-7 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Lucario rapidly strikes with a bone, damaging enemies hit up to 6 times. Enemies in long range will be hit 3 times and at close range they will be hit 6 times. Lucario then throws the bone after the final strike, shoving enemies and causing the bone to land a short distance away. Lucario can activate Bone Rush again to teleport to the bone, damaging enemies in a small area around it. Landing one of Bone Rush's initial strikes will reset the cooldown timer for Extreme Speed on that target.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Teleporting to the bone will reset the cooldown of Extreme Speed or Power-Up Punch.

upgrades.name: Close Combat
upgrades.description1: Unleash a combo attack, dealing multiple blows to enemies and shoving them.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Close Combat
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (11 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Lucario rapidly punches, damaging enemies in the area in front of them 11 times over the duration, restoring HP per hit, and becomes Unstoppable while punching. For 5s after this move is used, Lucario's next basic attack gains increased range and causes Lucario to dash to the target.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

skills.name: Aura Cannon
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Deals damage to enemies in the area of effect. Increases the damage dealt by the user's next Power-Up Punch after using this move.

rsb.name: Aura Cannon
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick
rsb.true_desc: Channel aura power into a spherical projectile launched in a designated direction. The projectile picks up speed as it travels. Pokémon hit by the projectile are dealt damage. Aura Cannon does not have a limit to the number of times it can hit one target. At close range, a still enemy can be hit up to 4 times and when the cannon is at max speed, a still enemy will only be struck once. Damage of the next Power-Up Punch is increased by roughly 20%, and enemies hit by the cannon have their internal cooldown for Extreme Speed reset.

name: Machamp
notes: Only auto attacks and Cross Chop can critically strike. Machamp's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Guts
skills.description: Increases Attack when afflicted by a status condition.

rsb.name: Guts
rsb.true_desc: Increases Attack by 10% for 5s when afflicted by any debuff.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits. This boosted attack also decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits. This boosted attack also decreases the movement speed of enemies by 50% for 1s.

skills.name: Karate Chop
skills.description: Attack opposing Pokémon with a sharp chop.

rsb.name: Karate Chop
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Machamp attacks in a straight line dealing damage to enemies hit.

upgrades.name: Close Combat
upgrades.description1: Unleash a series of punches in the designated direction, dealing increased damage with the last punch. The user can move while using this move and becomes immune to hindrances.
upgrades.description2: Deals increased damage to enemies that are afflicted by a status condition.

rsb.name: Close Combat
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (4 hits)
rsb.true_desc: Machamp unleashes a barrage of blows in a targeted direction for 1s, hitting multiple times and finishing with a single large strike. Machamp is unstoppable for the duration and can move while using Close Combat.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Deals 25% additional damage if the target is affected by a status condition.

upgrades.name: Cross Chop
upgrades.description1: Has the user deliver a double chop with forearms crossed while dashing forward. This increases the user's critical-hit rate.
upgrades.description2: Increases Attack with each basic attack, up to a set max.

rsb.name: Cross Chop
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Machamp dashes forward, dealing damage to enemies hit. Cross Chop may critically hit and has a 5% higher Critical-Hit Rate. Cross Chop further increases Critical-Hit Rate by 5% for 3s on hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Machamp’s auto attacks increases Atk by 2 per target hit, permanently stacking up to 40 times.

skills.name: Bulk Up
skills.description: Become immune to hindrances for a short time. Increases movement speed, basic attack speed, and Attack. The next basic attack also becomes a boosted attack.

rsb.name: Bulk Up
rsb.true_desc: Machop buffs themselves for 3s becoming unstoppable, increasing attack by 15%, attack speed by 40% and movement speed by 30% inititally, diminishing gradually every 1s. Machop's next attack is boosted.

upgrades.name: Dynamic Punch
upgrades.description1: Jump to the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them unable to act when it hits. After using this move, the user becomes immune to hindrances, their movement speed and basic attack speed is increased. The next basic attack also becomes a boosted attack.
upgrades.description2: Increased Attack and movement speed.

rsb.name: Dynamic Punch
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick (4 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: Machamp jumps to target location, becoming unstoppable for 0.5s, stunning enemies hit for 0.5s, slowing them by 40% for 3s, and dealing damage four times in quick succession to the landing radius. Machamp’s Atk is increased by 15% for 5s and gains bonus movement speed of 40% inititally, diminishing gradually, for 3s when using Dynamic Punch. Machamp’s next auto attack is boosted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Further increases movement speed by 30% and Atk bonus by 5%.

upgrades.name: Submission
upgrades.description1: Increases movement speed and become immune to hindrances. When the next basic attack hits, the attack deals increased damage and slams the enemy onto the ground, leaving it unable to act. Once this move ends, the user's critical-hit rate and basic attack speed are increased for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increased critical-hit rate and basic attack speed.

rsb.name: Submission
rsb.label: Damage (2x)
rsb.true_desc: Machamp becomes unstoppable for 5s and gains 70% increased movement speed (diminishing every 1s by 20%) or until the next auto attack. Machamp’s next auto attack during submission is enhanced, hitting twice and slamming the target down behind Machamp. If this attack hits, Machamp also gains 5% increased Critical-Hit Rate and 50% Attack Speed for 3s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Further increases Critical-Hit Rate by 5% and Attack Speed by 10%.

skills.name: Barrage Blow
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 35% Attack Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Increases Machamp's movement speed by 5%, Attack by 30%, Defense by 200, and Sp. Defense by 200 for 10s. If used again, unleash a combo attack, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and shoving them. The final blow deals double the damage of the previous hits.

rsb.name: Barrage Blow
rsb.label: Damage (6x)
rsb.true_desc: Increases Machamp's movement speed by 5%, Attack by 30%, Defense by 200, and Sp. Defense by 200 for 10s. If used again, unleash a combo attack, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and shoving them. The final blow deals double the damage of the previous hits.

name: Mamoswine
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Mamoswine has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Thick Fat
skills.description: When Mamoswine deals damage, Defense and Sp. Def are increased for 3s, stacking up to 3 times. When Mamoswine uses Ice Shard, Icicle Crash or Ice Fang, the next basic attack is boosted. If any of these moves creates a freezing area of effect inside an ally goal zone, the goal-scoring speed of enemies is decreased.

rsb.name: Thick Fat
rsb.label: Defense & Sp. Defense
rsb.true_desc: When Mamoswine deals damage, Defense and Sp. Def are increased for 3s, stacking up to 3 times. When Mamoswine uses Ice Shard, Icicle Crash or Ice Fang, the next auto attack is boosted. If any of these moves creates a freezing area of effect inside an ally goal zone, the goal-scoring speed of enemies is decreased by 30%.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage and freezing enemies for a short time when it hits. Mamoswine's basic attacks deal increased damage for a short time to enemies recently frozen with one of Mamoswine's moves.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage and freezing enemies for 0.5s when it hits. Mamoswine's auto attacks deal increased damage for a short time to enemies recently frozen with one of Mamoswine's moves.

skills.name: Ice Shard
skills.description: Hurls 3 chunks of ice at the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. If an enemy is hit by all three chunks, they're left frozen for a short time.

rsb.name: Ice Shard
rsb.label: Damage - per Shard (3 shards)
rsb.true_desc: Hurls 3 chunks of ice at the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. If an enemy is hit by all three chunks, they're left frozen for 0.5s.

upgrades.name: Icicle Crash
upgrades.description1: Drops icicles on the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. The final icicle shatters after a set amount of time or when hit by Mamoswine's other moves or boosted attacks, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them frozen. If the icicle is shattered by Tackle or High Horsepower, the ground is covered in ice, which increases the movement speed of allies that run over it. The next basic attack is boosted.
upgrades.description2: The final icicle leaves enemies hit unable to act for a short time.

rsb.name: Icicle Crash
rsb.label: Damage - Small Icicles (3x)
rsb.true_desc: Drops icicles on the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. The final icicle shatters after a set amount of time or when hit by Mamoswine's other moves or boosted attacks, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them frozen for 1s. If the icicle is shattered by Tackle or High Horsepower, the ground is covered in ice, which increases the movement speed of allies that run over it. The next auto attack is boosted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The final icicle leaves enemies hit unable to act for .2s.

upgrades.name: Ice Fang
upgrades.description1: Uses cold-infused fangs to throw the opposing Pokémon closest to the user, dealing damage and leaving them frozen for a short time. The user can then designate a direction to slam the thrown Pokémon forward or backward, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them frozen for a short time. The next basic attack is boosted.
upgrades.description2: Increases the area of effect in which enemies are left frozen after the slam attack.

rsb.name: Ice Fang
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Uses cold-infused fangs to throw the enemy closest to Mamoswine, dealing damage and leaving them frozen for 1.75s. Mamoswine can then designate a direction to slam the thrown Pokémon forward or backward, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them frozen for 0.5s. The next auto attack is boosted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the area of effect in which enemies are left frozen after the slam attack.

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: Mamoswine rushes recklessly in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies they hit and throws them in the air.

rsb.name: Tackle
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Mamoswine rushes recklessly in the designated direction; dealing damage to enemies hit and throws them in the air for 0.5s.

upgrades.name: High Horsepower
upgrades.description1: Mamoswine rushes recklessly in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies they hit and shove them. Mamoswine then stomps their feet, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaves them unable to act for a short time. This stomping deals increased damage to frozen enemies.
upgrades.description2: Increases the reckless rush's speed and the length of time enemies are left unable to act.

rsb.name: High Horsepower
rsb.label: Damage - Charge
rsb.true_desc: Mamoswine rushes recklessly in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies they hit and shoving them. Mamoswine then stomps their feet, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaves them unable to act for 1.4s. This stomping deals increased damage to frozen enemies.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the reckless rush's speed and the length of time enemies are left unable to act by .2s.

upgrades.name: Earthquake
upgrades.description1: Mamoswine leaps up in the designated direction and lands forcefully, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and pulling them toward Mamoswine.
upgrades.description2: Decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits and increases the move's pulling power.

rsb.name: Earthquake
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Mamoswine leaps up in the designated direction and lands forcefully, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and pulling them toward Mamoswine. Enemies that are hit cannot act for 1.5s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Decreases movement speed of enemies by 30% for 2.5s when this move hits and increases the move's pulling power.

skills.name: Mammoth Mash
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 40% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Mamoswine jumps to the designated location and becomes immune to hindrances - then repeatedly stomps the ground, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time with each stomp. The final stomp throws enemies in the air.

rsb.name: Mammoth Mash
rsb.label: Damage - First Stomp
rsb.true_desc: Mamoswine jumps to the designated location and becomes immune to hindrances - then repeatedly stomps the ground, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed by 20% for 0.5s with each stomp. The final stomp throws enemies in the air.

name: Mew
notes: Only basic attacks can critically strike (not boosted attacks), but Mew has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Synchronize
skills.description: Each time Mew uses a move, Mew and nearby allies have their movement speed increased by 15% for 2s.
skills.passive2_description: When Mew reaches level 5, the Move Reset icon can be used to reset Mew's moves and learn new moves. This ability goes on a 25s cooldown after it's used. Each time Mew knocks out or makes an assist on an enemy player, or scores a goal, the Move Reset cooldown is reduced (Knockout: 40%, Assist: 20%, Goal: 5%). Using Move Reset adds 5000 Unite Move energy to Mystical Mirage.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Each time Mew uses a move, they gain a boost counter. A maximum of 3 boost counters can be stored. After 3 counters are stored (they have to be consumed within 8s or they disappear), Mew's next basic attack becomes a boosted attack that consumes all counters and launches a ball of psychic energy at an enemy. During the lock-on animation Mew can use moves. The further the ball travels, the more damage it deals (5% more damage per threshold, stacking additively). This ball pierces through wild Pokémon, but will stop traveling upon contact with the first enemy player.

rsb.name: Electro Ball
rsb.label: Damage (No Light Screen Boost)
rsb.true_desc: Hurl an electric orb, dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect and leaving them paralyzed (40% slow) for 2s. This move deals more damage the lower the enemies' remaining HP is.
rsb.notes: Through Light Screen: Damage dealt and area-of-effect radius are increased.
rsb.add2_true_desc: 9% of enemy missing HP. Against Wild Pokemon: The execute damage is capped at 1200.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Strengthens the effect of the paralysis inflicted by this move to 60%.

rsb.name: Solar Beam
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick
rsb.true_desc: Blast a bundled beam of light, dealing damage 3 times to enemies in the area-of-effect. If this move hits an enemy, Mew gains an additional boost counter.
rsb.notes: Through Light Screen: Damage dealt and area-of-effect radius are increased.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduce this move's cooldown by 0.7s for each enemy hit.

rsb.name: Surf
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charge forward on a wave, shoving enemies for 0.5s and leaving them unable to act for 0.5s. Mew gains a shield for 3s and becomes immune to hindrances while using this move. At the end of this move, Mew can jump in a designated direction and becomes immune to hindrances for a short time. If this move hits an enemy, Mew gains an additional boost counter.
rsb.notes: Through Light Screen: Distance the wave travels is increased and Light Screen attaches to Mew.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Strengthens the shield effect of this move.

rsb.name: Coaching
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Teleport to an ally, granting them a shield for 3s and increasing basic attack speed by 40% for 2s. If this move is used on an ally who hasn't been coached within 7s, the cooldown of this move is reduced by 90%. If this move is used on an ally who has been recently coached, this move goes on cooldown. The cooldown of Electro Ball, Solar Beam, and Surf is reduced by 1s each time this move is used.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduce this move's cooldown by 1s and reduces the timer of recently coached on allies to 6s.

rsb.name: Light Screen
rsb.true_desc: Create a translucent wall in the designated location for 4s that prevents enemies from passing and shoves them for 0.5s if they make contact with the wall. If Mew's Electro Ball, Solar Beam, or Surf passes through the wall, the effects of those moves will be enhanced (such as increased damage, range, and area-of-effect). If this move is used again within 4s, the wall is pulled towards Mew and follows them as they move for an additional 4s. While the wall moves with Mew, enemy attacks that pass through it will deal 25% reduced damage but will not prevent enemies from passing and does not shove them anymore.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the size of the wall.

rsb.name: Agility
rsb.true_desc: Move quickly in a designated direction, increasing Mew's movement speed by 5% for 2s. Holds 2 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 2s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the distance Mew moves in the designated direction.

skills.name: Mystical Mirage
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Mystical Mirage
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Mew floats in the air for 1s, becoming invincible for 6s or until using an attack or move and creating a field around their location for 5s. This field travels with Mew. Mew and all allies within the area become stealthed for 4s. After the field expires, this move deals damage to enemies within the area-of-effect.

name: Mr.Mime
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Mr. Mime has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Filter
skills.description: Reduced damage received for a short time after using a move.

rsb.name: Filter
rsb.true_desc: Upon casting a Move, Mr. Mime takes 10% less damage for 2s.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage and throwing enemies when it hits.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Gains a Boosted Attack every 5s, dealing increased damage and throwing enemies in the air for 0.5s.

skills.name: Fake Out
skills.description: Slap its hands together, shoving enemies in front of it.

rsb.name: Fake Out
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Mr. Mime claps, damaging and knocking back enemies hit.

upgrades.name: Confusion
upgrades.description1: Attacks straight in front of the user, dealing damage to enemies and shoving them. If an enemy shoved by this move hits an obstacle, it receives increased damage from this move and is left unable to act for a short time. If the enemy is currently guard-swapped, it is not shoved but receives increased damage from this move and is left unable to act for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Confusion
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Mr. Mime fires a wave of psychic energy, damaging and knocking enemies back. Enemies hit into a wall take bonus damage and are stunned for 1.5s. Enemies debuffed by Power Swap take bonus damage and are stunned, but are not knocked back.
rsb.notes: Normal damage will apply to targets that are unstoppable or unstunnable. (Example: Drednaw & Zapdos)
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

upgrades.name: Psychic
upgrades.description1: Centers one telekinetic blast each on the user, any guard-swapped enemies, and any Light Screen or Barrier walls created by the user, damaging all enemies caught in the blasts and lowering their Sp. Defense for a short time. If an enemy is hit by multiple overlapping blasts, that enemy is also left unable to act for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Also decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time.

rsb.name: Psychic
rsb.label: Damage - per Pulse
rsb.true_desc: Mr. Mime pulses energy, dealing damage in an area around themself, any target affected by Power Swap, and any Barriers or Light Screens. After three pulses, a final pulse will damage enemies and stun them for 1s. Enemies hit by the pulses have their SpDef lowered by 5% for 3s with each hit (maximum 8 stacks).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Enemies hit by the pulses are additionally slowed by 30%.

skills.name: Light Screen
skills.description: Create a wall of light in the designated area that prevents enemies from passing.

rsb.name: Light Screen
rsb.true_desc: Mr. Mime creates a wall that prevents enemies from passing. If an enemy is near the location where the wall is created, they are shoved and left unable to act for a short time.

upgrades.name: Barrier
upgrades.description1: Create a translucent wall in the designated location that prevents enemies from passing. A maximum of two uses can be kept in reserve for this move and cannot be used more than once every 2s.
upgrades.description2: Increases the max number of uses that can be kept in reserve.

rsb.name: Barrier
rsb.true_desc: Mr. Mime creates a wall that prevents enemies from passing. If an enemy is near the location where the wall is created, they are shoved and left unable to act for a short time. Holds 2 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 2s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Stores 3 uses in reserve instead.

upgrades.name: Power Swap
upgrades.description1: Swaps the user's Defense and Sp. Defense stats with those of another Pokémon for a short time when it hits. Swapping with an enemy deals damage over time and decreases their movement speed while increasing the user's movement speed for a short time. Swapping with an ally increases the movement speed of that ally and the user for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Also continually restores the HP of the user and the ally while this move is in effect.

rsb.name: Power Swap
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick
rsb.true_desc: Creates a link between Mr. Mime and the target this move hits. While the link holds, Mr. Mime's movement speed increases by 8% and their HP is continually restored. The link will continue to hold for as long as the linked target stays in range or until another target is Power Swapped. Damage and healing ticks at a rate of 0.5s.
rsb.notes: If the linked target is an ally, this move increases their movement speed by 8%, increases the amount of damage they deal by 15%, and continually restores their HP. If the linked target is an enemy, this move decreases their movement speed by 8%, decreases the amount of damage they deal by 8% and deals damage over time to them. Power Swap can be cleansed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the amount of damage dealt by allies to 20% and decreases the amount of damage dealt by enemies to 12%.

skills.name: Showtime
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Jump to the designated location and start a pantomime performance, dealing damage over time to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them unable to act for a short time.

rsb.name: Showtime
rsb.label: Damage - First 3 Hits
rsb.true_desc: Mr. Mime leaps forward and begins a performance; stunning enemies for 0.5s, dealing damage in a large area around him 4 times, and becomes unstoppable for the duration. The final hit deals double damage.

name: Ninetales
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Ninetales has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Snow Warning
skills.description: Causes snow to fall on an enemy, dealing damage to it and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for .75s. Boosted attacks, Snow Warning, and all moves (except Aurora Veil) sling snow; hitting the same target with snow 4 times will freeze them for 1s. This ability has an 8s cooldown.

rsb.name: Snow Warning
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Causes snow to fall on an enemy, dealing damage to it and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for .75s. This ability has an 8s cooldown. Boosted attacks, Snow Warning, and all moves (except Aurora Veil) sling snow; hitting the same target with snow 4 times will freeze them for 1s.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to nearby enemies and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to nearby enemies and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

skills.name: Powder Snow
skills.description: Attack with a chilly gust of powdery snow, decreasing the movement speed of enemies for a short time when it hits.

rsb.name: Powder Snow
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Ninetales attacks with a chilly gust of powdery snow; dealing damage to enemies hit and decreasing their movement speed by 50% for 1s.

upgrades.name: Avalanche
upgrades.description1: Attack with a gush of chilly ice toward the designated area. The ice forms a wall that cannot be passed through on land. After a short time this wall melts and collapses, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect.
upgrades.description2: Also decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Avalanche
rsb.label: Damage - Wind or Wall
rsb.true_desc: Ninetales attacks with a gust of chilly ice toward the designated direction. The ice damages enemies and forms a wall that can't be walked through. After a short time, this wall melts and collapses; further damaging enemies in a radius around the wall.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also decreases the movement speed of enemies by 50% for 1s when this move hits.

upgrades.name: Dazzling Gleam
upgrades.description1: Attack with a powerful cone of blinding light, leaving enemies unable to act when this move hits.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage dealt and stun duration.

rsb.name: Dazzling Gleam
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Ninetales attacks with a powerful cone of blinding light; damaging and stunning enemies hit for .8s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage and stun duration to 1s.

skills.name: Icy Wind
skills.description: Attack with a gust of freezing air, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time when it hits.

rsb.name: Icy Wind
rsb.label: Damage (x2)
rsb.true_desc: Attacks with a gust of freezing air; damaging, and slowing Pokémon hit by 20% for 1s. Icy Wind shoves Pokémon hit in the direction of the wind for a short distance unless they are already at the maximum range of the move.

upgrades.name: Blizzard
upgrades.description1: Summons a howling blizzard in two blasts in front of the user. The first blast deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time. The second blast deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and shoves them. If the second blast hits an obstacle, it also deals damage to enemies near the point of impact.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Blizzard
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Blast
rsb.true_desc: Ninetales blasts twice in a line. The first blast penetrates walls and slows enemies. The second blast deals double damage, shoves enemies back, and if it hits a wall it creates a frost area at the impact location for 4s; dealing damage every 0.5s and slowing enemies in the area by 35% for 1s on each tick.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Deals twice the damage of the first hit.
rsb.enhanced_add1_true_desc: Deals twice the damage of the first hit.

upgrades.name: Aurora Veil
upgrades.description1: Create an aurora around the user, reducing damage received by the user and nearby allies in the area of effect. While the user is inside the aurora, its movement speed is increased and its basic attacks become boosted attacks.
upgrades.description2: Further reduces damage allies receive.

rsb.name: Aurora Veil
rsb.label: Heal - per Boosted Attack
rsb.true_desc: Ninetales dashes a short distance and creates an aurora centered on their position for 5s; reducing damage received by Ninetales and allies within the veil by 30%, healing Ninetales with each boosted attack, and increasing Attack Speed by 15%. While Ninetales is inside the aurora, movement speed is increased by 10% and all auto attacks are boosted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Damage reduction increased to 35% and cooldown reduced by 2s.

skills.name: Snow Globe
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Attacks with a chilly blast of snow and ice, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect when it hits. Deals increased damage to enemies that are frozen.

rsb.name: Snow Globe
rsb.label: Damage - Frozen Enemies
rsb.true_desc: Attack with a chilly blast of snow and ice; dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect around Ninetales when it hits. Deals increased damage to enemies that are frozen.

name: Pikachu
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Pikachu has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels. At level 9, Pikachu gains 12.5% spell vamp (restores HP when dealing Special Attack damage).

skills.name: Static
skills.description: Paralyzes all enemies nearby for a short time when receiving damage. This ability goes on cooldown after it's triggered.

rsb.name: Static
rsb.true_desc: Paralyzes (slow by 30% for 2.5s and reduce Attack Speed by 10% for 2s) all enemies nearby when receiving damage. This ability goes on a 30s cooldown after it's triggered.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage. This boosted attack also paralyzes enemies for a short time when it hits.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage. This boosted attack also paralyzes (slow by 30% for 1s and reduce Attack Speed by 10% for 1s) enemies when it hits.

skills.name: Thunder Shock
skills.description: Release electricity, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. Also paralyzes enemies for a short time.

rsb.name: Thunder Shock
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Pikachu releases electricity to a designated area, damaging enemies in the radius. Also paralyzes (slow by 30% for 2s and reduce Attack Speed by 10% for 2s) enemies hit.

upgrades.name: Electro Ball
upgrades.description1: Hurl an electric orb, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them paralyzed for a short time. This move's damage increases the lower the enemies remaining HP is.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Electro Ball
rsb.label: Damage - Area
rsb.true_desc: Pikachu hurls an electric orb at the targeted enemy, damaging and paralyzing (slow by 50% for 2s and reduce Attack Speed by 10% for 2s) all enemies in a small radius around the target upon impact. Deals bonus damage based on enemy missing HP.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokémon: The execution damage is capped at 1200.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

upgrades.name: Thunder
upgrades.description1: Drop wicked thunderbolts, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect.
upgrades.description2: Increases the number of times this move attacks.

rsb.name: Thunder
rsb.label: Damage - Area (5x)
rsb.true_desc: Pikachu drops wicked thunderbolts at a designated area for 2.5s, damaging enemies in the radius every 0.5s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the number of times this move strikes to 7. Does not increase the duration of the area.

skills.name: Electroweb
skills.description: Attacks and captures enemies using an electric net, leaving them unable to move.

rsb.name: Electroweb
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Pikachu attacks and captures enemies using an electric net, rooting them for 1.5s.

upgrades.name: Volt Tackle
upgrades.description1: Has the user electrify itself and charge ahead, throwing opposing Pokémon.
upgrades.description2: Reduced cooldown.

rsb.name: Volt Tackle
rsb.label: Damage (5x)
rsb.true_desc: Pikachu charges the targeted enemy, becoming unstoppable, damaging and throwing the target in the air for 1.4s. Pikachu then leaps back a set distance from the target from the same direction it approached from.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Cooldown reduced by 2s.

upgrades.name: Thunderbolt
upgrades.description1: Attack with a strong electric blast, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them unable to act.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Thunderbolt
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Pikachu attacks with a strong electric blast at a designated area; damaging and stunning enemies in the area for 1.25s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

skills.name: Thunderstorm
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 30% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Attacks enemies near the user with tremendous bolts of lightning.

rsb.name: Thunderstorm
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Briefly become unstoppable and summon bolts of lightning 4 times over 3s in a radius around Pikachu. The first strike targets all enemy players in the radius and the next 3 strikes target a single random enemy player within the radius. Targets that are struck by bolts deal damage to their allies in a small area around them. Enemies in the area of multiple bolts during the first strike are only damaged once.
rsb.notes: All moves can be used during this Thunderstorm.

name: Sableye
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Sableye has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Prankster
skills.description: When Sableye is outside the visual range of Pokémon from the opposing team, it enters stealth and its movement speed increases. When Sableye enters the visual range of a Pokémon from the opposing team, it does not immediately become visible but instead remains in stealth for a short time. This stealth lasts longer when approaching enemy Pokémon from behind. The Pokémon with this Ability exits stealth when it attacks.

rsb.name: Prankster
rsb.true_desc: When Sableye is outside the visual range of enemy players, Sableye enters stealth and gains 10% increased movement speed. When Sableye enters the visual range of enemy players, Sableye does not immediately become visible but instead remains in stealth for 1.8s. Sableye exits stealth when attacking.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon it hits and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. If Sableye is in stealth when it hits an opposing Pokémon with a boosted attack, it will deal damage and apply a fear effect. Opposing Pokémon affected by fear will be forced to move away from Sableye. When the user enters stealth, it will charge boosted attack immediately and hold it.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage to enemies hit and decreasing their movement speed by 20% for 2s. If Sableye is in stealth when hitting an enemy with a boosted attack, Sableye will deal damage and apply a fear effect for 1s. Enemies affected by fear will be forced to move away from Sableye with 40% reduced movement speed. When Sableye enters stealth, they will ready a boosted attack immediately and hold it.

skills.name: Thief
skills.description: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to any Pokémon it hits and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. If this move hits an enemy Pokémon, it steals a small amount of their Aeos energy. If those Pokémon do not have any Aeos energy, they will be left unable to act for a short time.

rsb.name: Thief
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to any Pokémon hit and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. If this move hits an enemy, Sableye received 5 energy and removes up to 5 energy from the enemies hit. If those enemies did not have any Aeos energy, they will be left unable to act for 0.5s.

upgrades.name: Knock Off
upgrades.description1: Dashes in the designated direction and then back again while attacking around itself, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon hit by the attacks and leaving them unable to act for a short time. For a short time afterward, this move can be used again. If it is, the user attacks in front of itself with its claws, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon it hits and throwing them. When either the first or second stage of this move hits opposing Pokémon, those Pokémon will drop some of their collected Aeos energy, and for a short time, they’ll be unable to pick up Aeos energy. When either stage of this move hits opposing Pokémon that do not have Aeos energy, those Pokémon will be left unable to act—and for a longer duration. While using this move, the user receives reduced damage.
upgrades.description2: For a short time after this move is used, the next time the user picks up Aeos energy, the user recovers HP and has its movement speed increased.

rsb.name: Knock Off
rsb.label: Damage (per Hit)
rsb.true_desc: When either activation of this move hits enemies that do not have Aeos energy (or are wild Pokémon), those enemies will be left unable to act for longer periods of time. Sableye dashes in the designated direction and then back again while attacking around themself, dealing damage to enemies hit and leaving them unable to act for 0.4s or 0.6s if they have no Aeos energy. This move can be used again within 6s attacking in front of Sableye with their claws, dealing damage to enemies hit, pushing them away and leaving them unable to act for 0.6s or 1s if they have no Aeos energy. When either the first or second activation of this move hits an enemy, they will drop 5 Aeos energy (total 15: 10 from first activation, 5 from second) and be left unable to pick up Aeos energy for 4s. While using this move, Sableye receives 40% reduced damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Aeos energy picked up within 5s of using this move recovers 9% Max HP (one time per activation) and increases movement speed by 40% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Shadow Sneak
upgrades.description1: For a short time, increases the user’s movement speed and has it enter stealth. While this move is active, the user’s next boosted basic attack deals additional damage. While this move is active, if the user exits stealth and is not immobilized by a hindrance, it will be able to enter stealth again.
upgrades.description2: Increases the duration of this move’s effects. While this move is active and the user is in stealth, it will also gradually recover HP.

rsb.name: Shadow Sneak
rsb.label: Damage - Additional
rsb.true_desc: Apply a 6.5s duration buff that stealths Sableye after 1.5s increasing Sableye's movement speed by 10%. If the initial stealthing is interrupted by a hindrance, Sableye will not enter stealth. When the buff first stealth's Sableye, Sableye is granted a readied boosted attack that deals additional damage. While the buff is still active, if Sableye exits stealth and is not immobilized or incapacitated by a hindrance, they will enter stealth again after 2s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the duration of this move’s effects to 7.5s. While this move is active and Sableye is in stealth, Sableye will also restore 1% max HP every 0.5s.

skills.name: Astonish
skills.description: Attacks in a cone in front of itself, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. If this move hits opposing Pokémon from behind, it deals increased damage and applies a greater decrease in movement speed.

rsb.name: Astonish
rsb.label: Damage (Front)
rsb.true_desc: Sableye attacks in a cone in front of themself, dealing damage to enemies hit and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 2s. If this move hits enemies from behind, this move deals increased damage and applies a greater decrease in movement speed to 60%.

upgrades.name: Feint Attack
upgrades.description1: Has the user throw dummy Aeos energy to a designated location. While dummy Aeos energy remains at a location, that location and the area around it will be visible to the user. Dummy Aeos energy can remain at up to five locations at a time. If an opposing Pokémon picks up dummy Aeos energy, that energy explodes, dealing damage over time to that Pokémon and decreasing its movement speed for a short time. A maximum of three uses can be kept in reserve for this move.
upgrades.description2: If an opposing Pokémon is knocked out while taking damage over time from this move, it will drop more Aeos energy than it normally would.

rsb.name: Feint Attack
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick (9 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: Throw dummy Aeos energy to a designated location. While dummy Aeos energy remains at a location, that location and the area around it will be visible to the user. Dummy Aeos energy can remain at up to five locations at a time. If an enemy walks on top of dummy Aeos energy, that energy explodes, dealing damage-over-time 9 times over 4s in an area and decreases the movement speed of enemies hit for 4s by 70% initially and decreasing gradually. Holds 3 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 1s.
rsb.notes: Note: Placing the dummy energy does not break stealth. Stealth is only broken when an enemy takes damage from the dummy energy.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: If an enemy is knocked out while affected by this move, they will drop more Aeos energy than they normally would.

upgrades.name: Confuse Ray
upgrades.description1: Fires a sinister ray in the designated direction, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon it hits. If this move hits Pokémon from the opposing team, it also leaves them confused. While confused, Pokémon are left unable to act and start continuously attacking nearby Pokémon with basic attacks. Confused Pokémon will target nearby Pokémon in the following order of priority: first, their ally Pokémon; then, wild Pokémon; last, Pokémon on Sableye's team.
upgrades.description2: Also increases the movement speed and basic attack speed of Pokémon from the opposing team while this move has left them confused.

rsb.name: Confuse Ray
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Fires a sinister ray in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. If this move hits enemy players, they are also left confused for 2s. While confused, enemies are  unable to act and continuously attack nearby enemies with basic attacks. Confused enemies will target nearby enemies in the following order of priority: first, their allies; then, wild Pokémon; last, Pokémon on Sableye's team. Knock outs for wild Pokémon will be attributed to Sableye, stealing the effects of the wild Pokémon being knocked out as well as the Aeos energy.
rsb.notes: While confused, outgoing damage is decreased for auto attacks and move 1 by 50%.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also increases movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 50% from enemies of the opposing team while this move has left them confused.

skills.name: Chaos Glower
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Shoot light from both eyes, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in an cone in front of itself. Pokémon from the opposing team hit by this move who are facing the user are left unable to act and start preparing to return to base. If they take damage before returning to base, the return effect is cancelled, and they are left unable to act for a short time. Opposing Pokémon hit by this move who are not facing the user have their movement speed decreased for a short time.

rsb.name: Chaos Glower
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Sableye becomes unstoppable for 1.2s and shoots light from both eyes, dealing damage to enemies in a cone in front of themself. Enemy players hit by this move who are facing Sableye are left unable to act for 3s and start preparing to return to base. If they take damage before returning to base, the return effect is cancelled, and they are left unable to act for 1.5s.
