Enemies hit by this move who are not facing Sableye have their movement speed decreased by 50% for 2s.

name: Scizor

builds.name: Swords Punch
builds.explanation: Energy Amplifier is meant to be a cross over build with Scyther to have evolution flexibility

builds.name: Double Bullet
builds.explanation: Double Hit is used to maintain stickiness. Look to use attacks after Double Hit's leap sparingly to use as an additional gap close.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Scizor's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9. Scyther will evolve into Scizor only if Bullet Punch is learned.

skills.name: Technician
skills.description: After using a move, the next basic attack will change to deal 2 attacks instead. The second attack deals reduced damage.

rsb.name: Technician
rsb.label: Damage - Second Hit
rsb.true_desc: After this Pokémon uses a move, the next auto attack will deal two consecutive auto attacks instead. The second of these deals decreased damage. Technician lasts 5s and has no internal cooldown.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, decreasing enemy movement speed by 30% for 2s when it hits and increasing Scizor's Defense by 40% for 6s. This Defense increase can stack additively up to 3 times and the duration refreshes when gaining another stack.

rsb.name: Fury Cutter
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Slashes twice dealing damage with its scythes in a cone. The second slash deals more damage than the first.

rsb.name: Bullet Punch
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Punch
rsb.true_desc: Dash in the designated direction and strike enemies, reducing this move's cooldown by 40% of its current cooldown if the attack connects and recovering a portion of HP with each hit. If Bullet Punch is used again within 8s, the number of punches increases. The number of punches increases from 3 to a maximum of 5.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also grants a shield for 3s if this move hits an enemy.

rsb.name: Quick Attack
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dashes in designated direction dealing damage to enemies hit along the way.

rsb.name: Double Hit
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Jumps in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies during the jump and applying a mark to that enemy until they leave combat. After hitting an enemy, jump again. An enhanced auto attack is prepared on landing that charges at the enemy being attacked. This enhanced attack is available for 5s.
rsb.notes: If a marked enemy is knocked out, all of the user's move cooldowns are reset. The mark may be cleansed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces cooldown by 1s.

rsb.name: Swords Dance
rsb.label: Damage - Eighth Attack
rsb.true_desc: Dashes a short distance, increasing Attack by 12% for 5s. While Swords Dance's attack buff is active, after basic attacks or abilities make contact 8 times, the user launches an area-of-effect attack that pierces through enemies in a line.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces the damage the user receives by 50% while dashing (0.3s).

skills.name: Red Illusion Dive
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Red Illusion Dive
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Punch, Ground Punch, & Copy Contact
rsb.true_desc: Target an enemy and punch them, dealing an initial hit of damage, decreasing their movement speed by 40% for 3s. Then create 5 copies that dash away from Scizor. If a copy hits an enemy while dashing out, it deals damage, decreases their movement speed by 40% for 3s, then disappears. For 8s after activation, this move may be used again, dashing in a designated direction dealing damage to enemies hit. The enemies hit are also grabbed and carried while Scizor continues dashing. At the end of the dash, Scizor punches the ground dealing damage in an area-of-effect. If a grabbed enemy makes contact with an illusory copy, they will be dealt damage and be left incapacitated for 2s.
rsb.add1_label: Damage - Main Target (Copy Dash x5), Grab

name: Scyther
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Scyther's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9. Scyther will not evolve into Scizor if Dual Wingbeat is learned.

skills.name: Technician
skills.description: After using a move, the next basic attack will change to deal 2 attacks instead. The second attack deals reduced damage.

rsb.name: Technician
rsb.label: Damage - Second Hit
rsb.true_desc: After this Pokémon uses a move, the next auto attack will deal two consecutive auto attacks instead. The second of these deals decreased damage. Technician lasts 5s and has no internal cooldown.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, striking twice. The first attack is a normal basic attack and the second of these deals decreased damage, can critically hit, and increases Scyther's movement speed by 35% for 2s.

rsb.name: Fury Cutter
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Slashes twice dealing damage with its scythes in a cone. The second slash deals more damage than the first.

rsb.name: Dual Wingbeat
rsb.label: Damage - Slash
rsb.true_desc: Slashes in front with scythes, dealing damage in an X-shaped area-of-effect. If the second slash deals damage to an enemy in the center, restore the user's HP. If this move hits an enemy, it can be activated again within a set amount of time. If this move is used again, the user dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. The dash deals more damage the lower their HP is.
rsb.add2_true_desc: 20% of enemy missing HP. Against Wild Pokemon: The total damage is capped at 1200.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the damage dealt by this move.

rsb.name: Quick Attack
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dashes in designated direction dealing damage to enemies hit along the way.

rsb.name: Double Hit
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Jumps in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies during the jump and applying a mark to that enemy until they leave combat. After hitting an enemy, jump again. An enhanced auto attack is prepared on landing that charges at the enemy being attacked. This enhanced attack is available for 5s.
rsb.notes: If a marked enemy is knocked out, all of the user's move cooldowns are reset. The mark may be cleansed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces cooldown by 1s.

rsb.name: Swords Dance
rsb.label: Damage - Eighth Attack
rsb.true_desc: Dashes a short distance, increasing Attack by 12% for 5s. While Swords Dance's attack buff is active, after basic attacks or abilities make contact 8 times, the user launches an area-of-effect attack that pierces through enemies in a line.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces the damage the user receives by 50% while dashing (0.3s).

skills.name: Green Illusion Dive
skills.buffs: 80% Movement Speed, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Green Illusion Dive
rsb.label: Damage - Initial, Dash, & Copy Dash
rsb.true_desc: Target an enemy, slashing through them dealing an initial hit of damage and creating 5 copies a set distance away. Copies deal damage to enemies they make contact with and apply a mark to them for 5s. After 5s, the copies return to Scyther, dealing damage to enemies they make contact with and healing Scyther for each hit. This move may be used again within 5s of activating as a dash in a designated direction dealing damage to enemies hit. The copies then dash to the end location of the user's dash. If a copy makes contact with an enemy while returning to Scyther, the copy deals damage to that enemy and disappears. If a marked enemy is knocked out, all of Scyther's move cooldowns are reset. Subsequent copies hitting the same target take 70% reduced damage.

name: Slowbro

builds.name: Items Only - all 4 combinations playable
builds.explanation: Buddy Barrier may also be used instead of an offensive item

builds.name: Attacker Bro
builds.explanation: Telekinesis may be used for pick potential

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Slowbro has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Oblivious
skills.description: When Slowbro receives damage, the HP loss is gradual. When damaging an opponent with a move, restore some of the remaining gradual HP loss and decrease the target's Sp. Defense.

rsb.name: Oblivious
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro stores up lost HP for a short time (blue HP). Slowbro's Oblivious health remains for 6s and then decreases by 3% max HP every second. When dealing damage to an enemy with Water Gun, Scald, Surf, or Slowbeam - decrease their Sp.Def by 4% for 5s, stacking up to 5 times.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, deal damage to nearby opposing Pokémon and decrease their movement speed.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, deal damage to nearby enemies and decrease their movement speed by 30% for 1s.

skills.name: Water Gun
skills.description: Slowbro channels a fierce stream of water which deals damage and lowers movement speed. Increase the area of effect and damage the longer this move is channeled.

rsb.name: Water Gun
rsb.label: Damage - Uncharged
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro fires a stream of water, damaging and slowing enemies hit by 35% for 1s. This move can be channeled to increase its range and damage. Slowbro's movement speed is reduced while channeling. Restore some of Slowbro's Oblivious health (blue HP) once, after hitting an enemy.

upgrades.name: Scald
upgrades.description1: Deal damage to opposing Pokémon and create steam when it hits. Opposing Pokémon inside the steam's area are left burned and have their movement speed decreased.
upgrades.description2: Increased area of effect.

rsb.name: Scald
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (3 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro fires a stream of boiling water; damaging enemies hit, slowing them by 80% for 0.5s and creating a cloud of steam centered on the first enemy hit, which slows by 30% for 3s and applies a burn to all enemies inside. This burn reduces Attack by 40% for 3s. Restore 10% of Slowbro's Oblivious health (blue HP) once per stream instance after hitting an enemy (maximum 3 times).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the size of the steam cloud.

upgrades.name: Surf
upgrades.description1: Charge forward on a wave, dealing damage in an area and knock opponents back. This is followed by two more waves that deal damage and decrease enemy movement speed.
upgrades.description2: The second and third waves become larger and also knock enemies back like the first wave.

rsb.name: Surf
rsb.label: Damage - per Wave (3 Waves)
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro rides on a wave, damaging, knocking enemies back, and throwing them in the air for .4s. Two more waves follow after the first, damaging and slowing enemies by 25% for 1s. Restore 10% of Slowbro's Oblivious health (blue HP) per wave, when hitting at least one enemy (maximum 3 times).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The second and third waves will now also throw enemies in the air for .75s, and the second wave will knock them back.

skills.name: Slack Off
skills.description: Lay down and take a rest, continuously regaining health. Damage taken will reduce the recovery effect.

rsb.name: Slack Off
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro begins channeling a nap and gains a heal over time, healing 1.5% max HP every 0.5s for 3s. While Slowbro remains channeling its nap, all self-healing is doubled (including Slack Off healing). Slowbro can be manually or forcibly woken up from their nap.

upgrades.name: Amnesia
upgrades.description1: Nullify some damage before it takes effect. For a short time after using this move, become immune to hindrances and gain increased defense. Also increase the damage dealt by the next use of Scald or Surf.
upgrades.description2: Increases Sp. Attack.

rsb.name: Amnesia
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro briefly becomes unstoppable, gaining +300 Defense for 4s and restoring 22.5% of Slowbro's Oblivious health (blue HP) every second for 4s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also increases Slowbro's Sp. Defense by 150.

upgrades.name: Telekinesis
upgrades.description1: Make opposing Pokémon float with psychic power. If used again, pull the opposing Pokémon toward the user.
upgrades.description2: Increased range and firing speed.

rsb.name: Telekinesis
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro shoots a beam, causing the first enemy hit to float in the air for 2.3s, restoring 15% of Slowbro's Oblivious health (blue HP) every second for 5s. Slowbro can reactivate the ability to pull the enemy to themself, but otherwise cannot act for the duration.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the range and speed of the beam.

skills.name: Slowbeam
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 40% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Stare at an enemy and attack continually, dealing damage and rooting them. Grants a shield and makes the user immune to hindrances while using this move.

rsb.name: Slowbeam
rsb.label: Damage (x6)
rsb.true_desc: Stare at an enemy and attack continually, dealing damage every .5 seconds for 3s and applying 'Bound' to them. This ability counters unstoppable. Grants a shield (10% max HP) and makes Slowbro immune to hindrances while using this move.

name: Snorlax
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Snorlax has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Gluttony
skills.description: Increases the effects gained from eating Berries.

rsb.name: Gluttony
rsb.true_desc: Increases the effects gained from eating berries. 25% increased movement speed when near berries and doubles the amount healed from the Sitrus berry (yellow berry).

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to nearby enemies and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals increased damage to nearby enemies and decreases their movement speed by 20% for 1s.

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: Charge forward belly first, dealing damage when it hits and shoving the first enemy it comes in contact with. After this move, the user's next basic attack becomes a boosted attack.

rsb.name: Tackle
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Snorlax dashes a short distance forward, dealing damage, stunning the first target hit for 1s, and slightly throwing them. Snorlax’s next auto attack is boosted.

upgrades.name: Heavy Slam
upgrades.description1: Has the user slam its heavy body down, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and throwing them.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Heavy Slam
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Snorlax jumps to the target location, dealing damage and throwing enemies within the landing radius into the air for 1s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

upgrades.name: Flail
upgrades.description1: Has the user flail about, increasing the user's basic attack damage the lower the user's HP is.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage. If the user has low HP while using this move, its basic attacks that hit enemies will restore the user's HP.

rsb.name: Flail
rsb.true_desc: Snorlax buffs themselves for 5s causing auto attacks to deal increased damage and slow enemies hit. Damage increase is strengthened for every 20% HP Snorlax is missing. Snorlax also gains a short burst of increased movement speed by 70% for 2s, decreasing every .4s by 14%, and slows nearby enemies by 50% for 1.5s when Flail is activated.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage. In addition, if Snorlax is below 40% HP,  auto attacks will also gain 30% lifesteal.

skills.name: Rest
skills.description: Has the user fall asleep on the spot and restores its HP. Blocks the movement of all enemies while this move is in effect.

rsb.name: Rest
rsb.true_desc: Snorlax falls asleep for 3s, becoming unstoppable, and healing 3 times for 8% Max HP. While asleep enemies cannot pass through Snorlax’s hitbox.

upgrades.name: Block
upgrades.description1: Has the user spread its arms wide to create a wall and grants it a shield. Prevents enemies from passing through the wall and shoves them if they run into it.
upgrades.description2: Reduces the damage the user receives while this move is in effect.

rsb.name: Block
rsb.true_desc: Snorlax creates and holds a wall in a targeted direction for 4s and gains a shield. The shield lasts 3.5s even if Block is cancelled early. Enemies that contact the wall are knocked back and stunned for .45s. This knockback can occur every 1s (max 4 times). Snorlax is unstoppable and cannot attack or use abilities while Blocking but can move with a 45% reduced movement speed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The Block becomes larger and the knockback and stun occurs every 0.5s (max 8 times). While blocking, Snorlax’s Def and SpDef are increased by 25%.

upgrades.name: Yawn
upgrades.description1: Has the user let loose a huge yawn that lulls enemies into a sleepy haze, putting enemies hit by this move to sleep.
upgrades.description2: Decrease the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Yawn
rsb.true_desc: Snorlax sends out a slow short-range projectile that puts all targets hit to Sleep for up to 3s. Taking damage while sleeping will reduce the duration up to a minimum duration.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Enemy movement speed reduced by 35% for 3s upon waking up.

skills.name: Power Nap
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 40% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Go to sleep and begin snoring, dealing damage over time to enemies in the area of effect and throw them. While sleeping, become immune to hindrances and continually restore HP.

rsb.name: Power Nap
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Go to sleep and begin snoring, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and throws them in the air for 1s. While sleeping enemies cannot pass through Snorlax’s hitbox, Snorlax becomes immune to hindrances, deals damage over time to nearby enemies, slow enemies hit by 30% for 1s, and continually restore 7% of max HP, 9 times. This move can be recasted to flip over, dealing an extra instance of the DoT damage and throwing enemies in the air for 1s.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Deals 50% of the initial damage, 3 times.

name: Sylveon
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Sylveon has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels. At level 7, Sylveon gains 12.5% spell vamp (restores HP when dealing Special Attack damage).

skills.name: Adaptability
skills.description: Every time Eevee deals or receives damage, increase Sp. Attack by 5% for 1.5s, stacking up to 4 times.
skills.passive2_description: Every time Sylveon deals or receives damage, increase Sp. Atk and Sp. Defense by 2.5% for 1.5s, stacking up to 6 times.

rsb.name: Adaptability
rsb.true_desc: Every time Eevee deals or receives damage, increase Sp. Attack by 5% for 1.5s, stacking up to 4 times.

skills.name: Attack - Eevee
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage.
skills.basic2_description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage. In addition, increase movement speed by 75% for 1s when this boosted attack hits.

skills.name: Swift
skills.description: Shoots star-shaped rays at enemies, dealing damage to them.

rsb.name: Swift
rsb.label: Damage - per Star
rsb.true_desc: Shoots 4 star-shaped rays at enemies, dealing damage to them.

upgrades.name: Mystical Fire
upgrades.description1: Create four small flames while leaping in the designated direction. The flames shoot toward enemies one by one, dealing damage and decreasing their Sp. Attack by 15% for 4s, stacks up to 4 times. Each time a flame hits, reduce the cooldown of this move and after the first flame hits, subsequent flames deal 25% damage.
upgrades.description2: Increases the number of flames by one.

rsb.name: Mystical Fire
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Create four small flames while leaping in the designated direction. These flames shoot towards enemies one by one, dealing damage and decreasing their Sp. Attack by 15% for 1s, stacking up to 4 times. Each time a flame hits, reduce the cooldown of this move by 15% of the current cooldown. After the first flame hits, subsequent flames on the same target deal 25% damage. Wild Pokémon will only be prioritized if no enemy players are in range.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the number of flames by one.

upgrades.name: Hyper Voice
upgrades.description1: Unleashes an attack of multiple sound waves that deal damage when they hit. The damage dealt increases the farther the target is from Sylveon. Every time a sound wave hits, enemy Sp. Defense is reduced by 50 and the next sound wave's damage increases.
upgrades.description2: Increases the number of sound waves by one.

rsb.name: Hyper Voice
rsb.label: Damage - Near (6x)
rsb.true_desc: Unleashes an attack of multiple sound waves that deal damage when they hit. The damage dealt increases the farther the target is from Sylveon. Every sound wave reduces enemy Sp. Defense by 20% for 1.5s (capping at 80%).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the number of sound waves by one.

skills.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
skills.description: Stare at an enemy with baby-doll eyes, dealing damage and decreasing their Attack and movement speed for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Stare at an enemy with baby-doll eyes, dealing damage and decreasing their Attack by 15% and decreasing their movement speed for a short time when this move hits.

upgrades.name: Draining Kiss
upgrades.description1: Blow a kiss at an enemy that goes back and forth between Sylveon and the target multiple times. When the kiss touches Sylveon, restore  HP. When it hits the enemy, deal damage and decrease their movement speed for a short time. If Sylveon and the enemy move too far away from each other, the kiss will disappear faster than normal.
upgrades.description2: Increases the amount of HP this move restores.

rsb.name: Draining Kiss
rsb.label: Damage (3x)
rsb.true_desc: Blow a kiss at an enemy that goes back and forth between Sylveon and the target multiple times. When the kiss touches Sylveon, restore  HP. When it hits the enemy, deal damage and decrease their movement speed by 20% for a short time. If Sylveon and the enemy move too far away from each other, the kiss will disappear faster than normal.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased healing.

upgrades.name: Calm Mind
upgrades.description1: Sylveon quietly focuses their mind and calms their spirit, increasing movement speed, Sp. Attack by 40% and Sp. Defense by 10% for a short time.
upgrades.description2: One time only while using this move, if Sylveon is hit by an Enemy's move, the damage is completely nulliffied and Sylveon is granted a shield.

rsb.name: Calm Mind
rsb.true_desc: Sylveon quietly focuses their mind and calms their spirit, increasing movement speed, Sp. Attack by 40% and Sp. Defense by 10% for 3s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Up to 3s after using this move, if Sylveon is hit by an enemies move, the damage is completely nullified and Sylveon is granted a shield.

skills.name: Fairy Frolic
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Jump into the air and become briefly invincible. The moment Sylveon lands, deal damage to enemies in the area of effect and restore Sylveon's HP. For 10s afterward, 50% of damage dealt by Sylveon is converted into HP (basic attacks are excluded).

rsb.name: Fairy Frolic
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Jump into the air, removing most statuses and becoming invincible. The moment Sylveon lands, lose invincibility and immediately gain Fairy Frolic buff, while dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. Fairy Frolic buff: for 10s, 50% of the damage dealt by Sylveon is converted into HP. No HP is recovered if the damage is dealt to shields.

name: Talonflame
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Talonflame's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Gale Wings
skills.description: While at high HP, movement speed is increased.

rsb.name: Gale Wings
rsb.true_desc: While above 85% HP; movement speed is increased by 10%.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack every third attack, creating a fiery whirlwind that deals damage to enemies in the area of effect. This boosted attack remains readied even after leaving combat for a prolonged period of time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack every third attack, creating a fiery whirlwind that deals damage to enemies in the area of effect. This boosted attack remains readied even after leaving combat.

skills.name: Peck
skills.description: Fly toward an enemy and attack 3 times.

rsb.name: Peck
rsb.label: Damage (3x)
rsb.true_desc: Talonflame flies toward a target Pokémon and attacks it three times.

upgrades.name: Flame Charge
upgrades.description1: Fly in the designated direction while cloaked in flame, attacking enemies in the path. This also increases the movement speed for a short time.
upgrades.description2: For a short time after this move hits, Talonflame's abilities and basic attacks partially ignore the enemies defense.

rsb.name: Flame Charge
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Talonflame dashes forward; damaging Pokémon in its path. Talonflame gains 30% movement speed for 1.5s after hitting a Pokémon .
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: For 3s after this move hits; Talonflame's abilities and auto attacks partially ignore the enemies' defense (capped at 0) and enemies hit are slowed by 30% for 5s.

upgrades.name: Aerial Ace
upgrades.description1: Fly at the designated enemy, dealing damage. Also makes the next basic attack a boosted attack.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Aerial Ace
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Talonflame dashes through a targeted enemy; damaging them and healing Talonflame. Talonflame's next auto attack is boosted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

skills.name: Acrobatics
skills.description: Fly toward the designated area and attack multiple times. Escape in a direction of your choice after using this move.

rsb.name: Acrobatics
rsb.label: Damage (3x)
rsb.true_desc: Talonflame flies toward a targeted area; attacking all Pokémon in the area up to three times. Talonflame can choose a direction to dash after the move ends.

upgrades.name: Fly
upgrades.description1: Fly up into the sky. Using this move again will cause you to dive to the designated area and attack, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. Your next basic attack becomes a boosted attack. This move's cooldown is reduced by 40% if it hits an enemy.
upgrades.description2: Also throws enemies when this move hits.

rsb.name: Fly
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Talonflame flies up into the sky; becoming untargetable and increasing movement speed by 65%. After 3s, Talonflame dives at the targeted area, damaging all enemies in the area. Fly can be recast to dive early.  If this move hits an enemy player, it reduces the cooldown of this move by 40% of the current cooldown. After using this move, the next attack becomes a boosted attack.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Enemies hit are also thrown in the air for 0.4s.

upgrades.name: Brave Bird
upgrades.description1: Dive to the designated location while cloaked in flame, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. Also deals recoil damage to the user when it hits. Performing a boosted attack within a set amount of time after this move hits will reset the cooldown of Flame Charge or Aerial Ace.
upgrades.description2: Deals less recoil damage when this move hits.

rsb.name: Brave Bird
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Talonflame dives at the targeted area; taking 5% of remaining HP as recoil damage and damaging all enemies in the area. If Talonflame uses a boosted attack on an enemy hit by Brave Bird within 4s, the cooldown of Flame Charge or Aerial Ace is reset. The cooldown of Flame Charge and Aerial Ace can only be reset once per target hit by Brave bird.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Talonflame takes 15% less damage per enemy hit for 5s when this move hits. This damage reduction stacks up to 3 times (capped at 45%).

skills.name: Flame Sweep
skills.buffs: 80% Movement Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Perform an aerial somersault before charging forawrd, dealing damage to enemies in this move's path and shoving them.

rsb.name: Flame Sweep
rsb.label: Damage (2x)
rsb.true_desc: Talonflame charges forward; damaging and shoving all enemies in its path. Flame Sweep deals damage up to 2 times and Talonflame takes 50% less damage during the sweep.

name: Trevenant
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Trevenant has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

rsb.name: Natural Cure
rsb.label: Heal - 8 Ticks
rsb.true_desc: When Trevenant deals or receives damage while at or below 35% max HP, a continuous HP recovery effect is triggered every 0.5s for 4s. This effect also reduces the cooldowns of Trevenant's moves by 1s every 1s. When this HP recovery effect ends, there is a 100s cooldown. However, this cooldown is reduced by 1s each time one of Trevenant's moves damage an enemy. This cooldown reduction cannot be triggered more than once every 0.5s.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage to enemies and heal for 5% max HP when this boosted attack hits.

rsb.name: Will-o-Wisp
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Shoot 3 sinister flames in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit and leaving them burned for 3s. This burn reduces enemy Attack and Sp. Attack by 5% for 3s. The first wisp to hit a target deals full damage, and subsequent flame hits deal 50% damage.

rsb.name: Wood Hammer
rsb.label: Damage - Both Hits
rsb.true_desc: Trevenant pulls back its arms and attacks, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and pulls them in front of Trevenant, leaving them unable to act for 0.5s. If this attack deals damage to at least one enemy, a follow-up attack will be available for 5s. This follow-up attack slams down a giant wooden hammer in front of Trevenant, dealing damage to any enemy it hits, and leaving them unable to act. The lower Trevenant's HP, the longer the enemy will be left unable to act. Every time this move is used, it consumes 5% of Trevenant's current HP.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Damage dealt by enemies hit by the second hammer reduced by 20% for 3s.

rsb.name: Curse
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick
rsb.true_desc: Trevenant creates a cursed zone in exchange for 3% max HP per second for 6s, dealing damage over time to enemies in the area of effect every 0.5s for 6s and decreasing their movement speed for 1s, refreshing with each tick. The lower Trevenant's HP is, the greater the decrease in movement speed. While using this move, Trevenant builds up Curse gauge every time it deals or receives damage. Curse will deal additional damage to enemies in the area of effect when the Curse releases at the end of 6s or by manually detonating the Curse. If the Curse gauge is at maximum when it’s released, the cooldowns of Branch Poke, Horn Leech, and Pain Split are reset.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased radius.

rsb.name: Branch Poke
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Trevenant jabs in the designated direction; dealing damage, decreasing their movement speed by 40% for 2s, and healing Trevenant for 9% max HP (over 3 ticks as 1 tick per second) when hitting an enemy.

rsb.name: Horn Leech
rsb.label: Damage - 2 Hits
rsb.true_desc: Charge forward, becoming unstoppable, dealing damage to enemies and shoving them while dashing in the designated direction for the duration of the dash. At the end of the charge, enemies that were shoved are dealt additional damage and then thrown. Colliding with an enemy while charging recovers Trevenant's HP 3 times, and the lower Trevenant's remaining HP the more HP that is recovered. After this move hits an enemy, Trevenant's next three auto attacks deal more damage and reduce this move’s cooldown by 0.5s when they hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: After using this move, Trevenant's movement speed is increased by 30% for 1.5s.

rsb.name: Pain Split
rsb.label: Damage - per conditional tick
rsb.true_desc: Creates a link between Trevenant and a designated enemy for 6s. While the link holds, a percentage of damage that Trevenant would take is mitigated and instead redirected to the linked enemy as True damage. The lower Trevenant's remaining HP, the greater the percentage of damage that is redirected. If Trevenant's percentage of remaining HP is lower than the linked enemy, this move continuously deals damage and recovers Trevenant's HP every 0.5s. If Trevenant and the linked enemy are too far apart, the link will disappear. Using this move increases Trevenant's movement speed by 35% for 2s decaying by 7.5% per half second.
rsb.add5_true_desc: Trevenant heals for 120% of damage dealt on each tick.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Duration increased to 8.5s.

skills.name: Phantom Forest
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Phantom Forest
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Creates a cursed forest, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and marking them, throwing them, and decreasing their movement speed by 50% for 2s. Trevenant and allies deal increased basic (and boosted) attack damage to enemies that were marked by this move (0.5s cd for each attacker). The mark lasts for 6s. Trevenant is also granted a shield for 6s when this move hits an enemy with the shield being strengthened for each enemy hit, up to 5 times. While Trevenant is shielded by this shield, HP recovery effects applied to Trevenant are increased by 50%.

name: Tsareena

After gaining 3 stacks, the Queenly Majesty buff is applied to Tsareena for a short time, which allows one of Tsareena's moves to be reused (these uses do not share the same cooldown as the base moves), dealing increased damage and applying an additional effect based on the move used.

upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.label: Damage - per Hit

In addition, all damage dealt by auto attacks or Triple Axel during the buff is increased by 5% per stack (caps at 6 stacks).
rsb.notes: Queenly Majesty Effect: Restores HP each time a kick hits.

rsb.notes: Queenly Majesty Effect: Restores HP when this move hits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

rsb.notes: Queenly Majesty Effect: Grants Tsareena a shield for 3s when this move is used.
rsb.add3_label: Damage - DoT (7 Ticks - Queenly Majesty buff)
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.
rsb.enhanced_add3_label: Damage - DoT (7 Ticks - Queenly Majesty buff)

upgrades.name: Grassy Glide

This is followed by an attack in the opposite direction, dealing damage and shoving enemies hit. Queenly Majesty effect: Grants Tsareena a shield when this move is used.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Grassy Glide
rsb.label: Damage (2x)
rsb.true_desc: Tsareena slides in the designated direction; dealing damage to enemies hit. This is followed by an attack in the opposite direction, dealing damage and shoving enemies hit.
rsb.notes: Queenly Majesty Effect: Grants Tsareena a shield for 3s when this move is used.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

skills.name: Queen Ascendant
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Tsareena leaps toward an enemy from the opposing team and kicks it high into the air before showering it with a series of kicks while airborne, dealing damage to them. The moment Tsareena lands on the ground, recover HP. While airborne, the enemy that is being kicked and Tsareena are not affected by other moves.

rsb.name: Queen Ascendant

name: Tyranitar

rsb.name: Basic

rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Exhale a mist of darkness in a horizontal sweeping motion, dealing damage to any enemy hit. If the remaining HP of an enemy hit by this move falls below 50%, they become immobilized for 0.6s. If this move hits an enemy again within a set amount of time, it deals additional damage.
rsb.notes: If this move is used while Tyranitar's piercing strength is activated by Ancient Power, the 8s duration of piercing damage is refreshed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

rsb.name: Stone Edge
rsb.label: Damage - Melee Range
rsb.true_desc: Deals damage to enemies in a 90 degree cone, dealing more damage the closer the enemies are to the user. This move can be used up to 3 times with the cone widening to 135 and 180 degrees.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Rock Polish
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charge ahead in the designated direction, dealing damage to any enemies hit. If this move hits any enemy, all damage is increased by 15% for 3s.

rsb.name: Ancient Power
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Hit

While charging power: Tyranitar becomes resistant to hindrances for 4s, movement speed is increased by 20% for 3s (stacking 3 times), and Tyranitar gains a shield (stacking 3 times and lasting up to 5s). If any enemies are hit by the shock wave, Tyranitar is granted piercing strength allowing damage dealt to ignore enemy Defense and shield effects for 8s.
rsb.notes: If this move hits an enemy, a second shock wave can be released in front of Tyranitar; dealing damage to enemies and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 2s. If this second shock wave hits successfully, Tyranitar is granted another shield. The strength of this shield increases for each enemy hit, capping at 3 stacks.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Strengthens the effect of the shields granted by this move.

rsb.name: Sand Tomb
rsb.label: Damage - Leap
rsb.true_desc: Leap in a designated direction; dealing damage to any enemies hit and leaving them unable to act for 1s. When Tyranitar lands, the shock from landing creates a cloud of dust at the point of impact for 6s; dealing damage-over-time every 0.5s and decreasing movement speed of enemies hit by 25% for 1s every second.
rsb.notes: If this move is used again while Tyranitar is in the cloud of dust, enemies in front of Tyranitar will be pulled closer to it. Furthermore, while the user is in the cloud of dust, they take 25% reduced damage and can ignore the Defense and shield effects of enemies.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the length of time the cloud of dust remains at the point of impact to 8s.

skills.name: Tyrannical Rampage
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Tyrannical Rampage
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Explode with anger and go on a rampage for 10s. While rampaging, Tyranitar also gains 50% Tenacity and the basic attack pattern changes, dealing increased damage. If the HP of an enemy hit by these basic attacks is below 20% it is immediately knocked out (enemy players only).
rsb.notes: Attacks during this move cannot critically-hit.

name: Urshifu
notes: Auto attacks, Wicked Blow, and Surging Strikes's third chain use can critically strike. Urshifu's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Inner Focus
skills.description: Reduces the duration of hindrance effects on Kubfu.
skills.passive2_description: When Urshifu deals damage to an enemy with a shield effect, 30% of the damage done to shield is additionally dealt directly to the target's HP.

skills.name: Attack - Kubfu
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage.
skills.basic2_description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage and granting Urshifu a shield for 3s when it hits.
skills.basic3_description: Deals increased damage with two consecutive blows and reduces Surging Strikes, and Liquidation, Liquidation+ or Headbutt's cooldown by 2s.

rsb.name: Rock Smash
rsb.label: Damage (1st Level Charge)
rsb.true_desc: Charges power before punching in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies. The longer the power is charged, the more damage this move deals. The user receives 20% reduced damage while charging.

rsb.name: Wicked Blow
rsb.label: Damage (Uncharged)
rsb.true_desc: Charge power before striking in the designated direction with a fierce blow. Urshifu's next basic attack after hitting an enemy with this move becomes a boosted attack. While charging, movement speed is decreased but Urshifu receives 20% reduced damage and becomes immune to hindrances. If Urshifu charges power for a set amount of time or longer before striking, this move deals damage to enemies in an area-of-effect. The lower the enemies' remaining HP is, the more damage is dealt. Enemies in the center of the area receive a critical hit and are shoved.
rsb.notes: If Urshifu does not charge power for that set amount of time, this move deals damage to enemies in an area-of-effect, decreasing their movement speed. If an enemy is hit with the uncharged punch, this move's cooldown is reduced by 50%.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Damage is always a critical and deals additional damage equal to 10% of the enemies missing HP. Against Wild Pokemon: This additional damage is capped at 1200.
rsb.add2_true_desc: Deals additional damage equal to 5% of the enemies' missing HP. Against Wild Pokemon: This additional damage is capped at 600.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Damage reduction that Urshifu receives while charging this move is increased to 40%. When Urshifu strikes after charging power, enemies in the center of the area-of-effect are also stunned with the shove.

rsb.name: Surging Strikes
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit
rsb.true_desc: Dash in the designated direction and strike with a flowing motion, dealing damage to enemies hit. This move can be used an additional two times. The third time it is used, the enemy is thrown and the damage dealt will be critical. Urshifu's next basic attack after using this move becomes a boosted attack and if the boosted attack hits, Urshifu's HP is restored.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: While using this move, Urshifu receives 30% damage reduction.

rsb.name: Headbutt
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charge in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit and leaving them unable to act for a short time.

upgrades.name: Throat Chop
upgrades.description1: Dash in the designated direction and strike with a flowing motion, dealing damage to enemies hit. This move can be used an additional two times and the third time it is used, any hits are always critical hits and the enemy is thrown. Urshifu's next basic attack after using this move becomes a boosted attack and if the boosted attack hits, Urshifu's HP is restored.

rsb.name: Throat Chop
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.alert: This move must be selected if Wicked Blow was learned.
rsb.true_desc: Dash in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit and leaving them stunned for 0.7s. Urshifu's next basic attack after using this move becomes a boosted attack.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: This move's cooldown is reduced by 2s when Wicked Blow hits.

upgrades.name: Liquidation
upgrades.description1: Deal damage to and decrease the defense of enemies in the area around Urshifu by 30% for 2s. When this move hits, Urshifu is granted a shield whose strength is based on the number of enemies hit.
upgrades.description2: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

rsb.name: Liquidation
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.alert: This move must be selected if Surging Strikes was learned.

rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

skills.name: Ebon Fist
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Ebon Fist
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.alert: This move must be selected if Wicked Blow was learned.
rsb.true_desc: Dash at the designated enemy and designate a direction or not. If no direction is designated, this move instead deals damage and throws the singular enemy, leaving them unable to act when they land. If a direction is designated, this move deals a more powerful blow to the target and shoves them in the designated direction. The shoved enemy then also deals damage to and throws other enemies they hit. Using this move will reset Wicked Blow's cooldown.

skills.name: Flowing Fists
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Flowing Fists
rsb.label: Damage (Initial Hit)

If this move is used again, Urshifu unleashes five consecutive blows upon the designated enemy, dealing damage and shoving them. In the time between activating Flowing Fists and the follow-up attack, every 2 times Urshifu deals damage to an enemy, the number of consecutive blows the follow-up attack will deal is increased by 1 up to 10 times maximum. While dealing the consecutive blows, Urshifu receives 30% reduced damage and becomes immune to hindrances. After the consecutive blows have finished, Urshifu deals damage and shoves enemies in an area-of-effect in front of themself.

skills.name: Defense Curl
skills.description: Perform a quick roll, granting the user a shield and throwing any enemies hit by the roll. Hitting an obstacle while rolling will change the direction the user is moving and reset the cooldown of Pound, Double Slap, or Dazzling Gleam.

upgrades.name: Sing
upgrades.description1: Wigglytuff begins singing, slowing enemies around them by 10% for 2s per "Note" and increasing Wigglytuff's movement speed by 30% for 2.5s. Enemies that stay inside the song's effect will be put to sleep (when reaching 4 Notes) for 1.5s, and have their Defense and Special Defense reduced by 25% for 1.25s.
upgrades.description2: Increases the amount of time enemies are asleep to 1.75s and the duration of Defense and Sp. Defense reduction to 1.5s.

skills.name: Starlight Recital
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Begin performing a recital, granting the user and nearby allies a shield as well as removing all status conditions from the affected allies and make them immune to hindrances for a short time.

rsb.name: Starlight Recital
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Begin performing a recital and become unstoppable for 3s, granting Wigglytuff and nearby allies a shield for 2.5s as well as removing all status conditions from Wigglytuff and the affected allies and granting them immunity to hindrances for as long as the shield is active.

name: Zacian
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Zacian's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 2, 5 and 9.

rsb.name: Intrepid Sword
rsb.true_desc: If the goal scoring button is held down, Zacian charges its sword  with Aeos energy. For a short time, its basic attacks become boosted attacks. In addition, during this time, Zacian can use a boosted version of one of its moves once. The longer the goal scoring button is held down, the more Aeos energy is charged into the sword, lengthening the duration of the boost effect on basic attacks and moves. This Ability goes on an 8s cooldown after it’s triggered. When this Pokémon knocks out or assists (within 4 seconds) in knocking out a Pokémon on the opposing team, that Pokémon will drop an additional 5 more Aeos energy than it normally would.
rsb.notes: Minimum 5 energy is required to charge with a maximum of 10 (except for Unite Move). Duration for buff window is 3s for 5 energy, 6s for 8 energy, 10s for 10 energy. Charging occurs at a rate of 1 energy per 0.1s.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Stage One
rsb.true_desc: When basic attacks are performed consecutively within 2s, additional effects are applied depending on the stage of the consecutive attack. If a Move is used, the time to perform the next consecutive attack is extended.
rsb.add3_true_desc: Dashes towards the target, reducing all Move cooldowns by 15% of their current cooldown.

boosted_rsb.name: Boosted
boosted_rsb.label: Stage One - Boosted
boosted_rsb.rsb_info: Boosted basic attacks have an increased area of effect and deal additional damage proportional to the opposing Pokémon’s HP. Stage 1 deals additional 3% Max HP. (Additional damage capped at 400 on Wild Pokémon)
boosted_rsb.add1_true_desc: Applies 20% Slow for 2s & deals additional 4% Max HP (Additional damage capped at 600 on Wild Pokémon)
boosted_rsb.add2_true_desc: Heals 5% Max HP & deals additional 4% Max HP damage (Additional damage capped at 600 on Wild Pokémon)
boosted_rsb.add3_true_desc: Dashes towards the target, reducing all Move cooldowns by 15% of their current cooldown. Also deals additional 5% Max HP damage. (Additional damage capped at 750 on Wild Pokémon)

rsb.name: Slash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Slashes target Pokémon and deals a small amount of damage to nearby Pokémon. When this move is boosted with Aeos energy, its area of effect is increased, deals increased damage and also slows of Pokémon hit by 60% for 0.5s.

rsb.name: Metal Claw
rsb.label: Damage (Shockwave & Charge)
rsb.true_desc: Releases a shock wave in the designated direction, dealing damage to Pokémon, decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 3s. As the shock wave moves forward, projectiles from non-allied Pokémon it hits are negated. After releasing the shock wave,  Zacian charges in that direction and deals damage to Pokémon. If the charge hits an enemy, Zacian's attack speed is increased by 100% for 4s or 6 attacks, whichever comes first. When this move is boosted with Aeos energy, the shock wave's size and travel distance are increased and the intensity of the slow is increased to 45% for 3s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

rsb.name: Sacred Sword
rsb.label: Damage - Circle Draw
rsb.true_desc: Has the user slash around itself as if drawing a circle with the tip of its sword, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and slowing them by 30% for 3s. During this slash, Zacian briefly becomes unstoppable and reduces damage taken by 50%. The user then unleashes a slashing attack inside the circle, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon it hits and leaving them unable to act for 0.6s. After a flurry attack hits an opposing Pokémon, the user’s Attack is increased by 20% for 3s, and damage dealt by the user’s moves and basic attacks ignores 15% of the opposing Pokémon’s Defense. When this move is boosted with Aeos energy, its area of effect is increased, and the time until the slashing attack is unleashed is reduced.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduce the time until the flurry of slashes is unleashed to 1.2s for the base Sacred Sword+ and 0.45s for Boosted Sacred Sword+

rsb.name: Quick Attack
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Zacian charges in the designated direction, stopping at the first Pokémon it hits and dealing damage. When this move is boosted with Aeos energy, it also leaves opposing Pokémon unable to act for 1s.

rsb.name: Agility
rsb.label: Boosted Shield (3s)
rsb.true_desc: Dashes in the designated direction and increases the user’s movement speed by 30% decaying every 1s by 10% down to a minimum of 7.5% for 3s. Dealing or taking any damage extends the haste duration by 1 second per attack up to 6 seconds and bypasses the movement speed decay. When this move is boosted with Aeos energy, the user is granted a shield.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Further increases movement speed gain to 40% on use.

rsb.name: Play Rough
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Leaps in the designated direction stopping at the first Pokémon hit. The Pokémon hit is dealt damage and is stunned for 0.7s. Zacian lands near that Pokémon it hits and deals damage to nearby Pokémon stunning them as well. If Play Rough connects, Zacian receives 25% reduced damage for 3s after landing. When this move is boosted with Aeos energy, Zacian leaps further and through all Pokémon hit along the leap’s path. Pokémon hit will receive damage and be left stunned for the same amount as the base stun duration.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the stun duration to 1s.

skills.name: Sovereign Sword
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Sovereign Sword
rsb.label: Damage (<10 Energy Charged)
rsb.true_desc: Has the user ready its giant sword, charge the sword with Aeos energy, and then slash in front of itself. The user becomes Unstoppable, applying a 10% self slow while the Unite Move button is held down and the user is in its ready stance. The longer the user is in this stance, the more Aeos energy is charged into the sword, and the more damage this move deals. If a set amount of Aeos energy or more is charged into the sword, the Unite Move becomes boosted, and the slash’s area of effect increases. This boosted Unite Move deals increased damage to opposing Pokémon it hits who have been buffed by their own Unite Move.
rsb.add4_label: Damage (Additional - Boosted) versus Unite Buffed Pokémon

name: Zeraora
notes: Only auto attacks and Spark's additional auto attacks can critically strike. Zeraora's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Volt Absorb
skills.description: Gain an electric charge when receiving damage, converting a portion of that damage into additional Attack.

rsb.name: Volt Absorb
rsb.true_desc: Converts 8% of the damage Zeraora was dealt as Atk, up to 200 Atk. Resets after not taking damage for 4s.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage and paralyzing the enemy while restoring some of Zeraora's HP.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage and paralyzing (slow by 15% for 2.5s and reduce Attack Speed by 25% for 1s) the enemy while restoring 10% of Zeraora's missing HP.

skills.name: Agility
skills.description: Perform a quick dash and increase basic attack speed for a short time afterward.

rsb.name: Agility
rsb.true_desc: Zeraora quickly dashes forward, increasing auto attack speed by 45% for 3s.

upgrades.name: Volt Switch
upgrades.description1: Perform a high-speed dash, dealing damage to enemies hit and increase basic attack speed for a short time. Using this move again within a set period of time will allow the user to immediately dash back to the original position.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage and basic attack speed buff duration.

rsb.name: Volt Switch
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Dash
rsb.true_desc: Zeraora charges forward, damaging enemies in the path and increasing Zeraora's auto attack speed by 45% for 3s. Activating this ability again within 3s will teleport Zeraora to their original location, dealing damage to enemies in the path back.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage and further increasing attack speed to 60% for 3s.

upgrades.name: Spark
upgrades.description1: Leap at an enemy dealing damage to them. If using your basic attack before reaching the targeted enemy, instead leap at the closest enemy and deal damage to it. This move can be used 3 times before going on cooldown.
upgrades.description2: Also restore HP if performing a basic attack before reaching the targeted enemy.

rsb.name: Spark
rsb.label: Damage - Jump
rsb.true_desc: Zeraora leaps in a selected direction, damaging all enemies in their path and becoming unstoppable for 0.2s. If an auto attack is used before the leap ends, Zeraora will jump to the closest enemy, dealing additional damage to the target. Holds 3 uses in reserve - after the first use the next use must be executed within 4s or this move goes on cooldown. The second use resets this timer.
rsb.add1_true_desc: If an auto attack is used before the leap ends, deal 110% Atk as damage instead.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: 15% missing HP is restored if performing an auto attack before reaching the enemy.

skills.name: Slash
skills.description: Pounce at an enemy and attack with sharp claws. This move's final attack throws enemies.

rsb.name: Slash
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (3 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Zeraora charges toward an enemy and attacks them with multiple swipes, ending with an interrupt that knocks the enemy into the air for 0.5s.

upgrades.name: Discharge
upgrades.description1: Release an electrical discharge, dealing damage to nearby enemies and grant the user a shield when it hits. If this move hits enemies that are paralyzed, it pulls them in toward the user once the move ends, dealing damage to them once again and leaving them unable to act.
upgrades.description2: Decreases movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Discharge
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick (6 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: Zeraora emits an electric aura, damaging all enemies within the aura every 0.3s for 1.5s (6 ticks) followed after 0.4s by a final tick and granting a shield to Zeraora for 3s when it hits. Any paralyzed enemies within the area of effect are pulled towards Zeraora with the final tick, damaging them with an extra tick of damage and stunning them for 1s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Enemies hit are slowed by 25% for 1s, refreshing every tick.

upgrades.name: Wild Charge
upgrades.description1: Charge in the designated direction. If this move hits an enemy, unleash a combo attack that also deals a set amount of damage to itself. If the user hit an enemy with Volt Switch, Spark, or a boosted attack before using this move, the number of attacks in the combo is increased.
upgrades.description2: Also deals damage to nearby enemies when this hits.

rsb.name: Wild Charge
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Hit
rsb.true_desc: Zeraora charges towards an enemy, damaging them multiple times and switching to the nearest enemy if the initial target's HP drops to zero before all hits are used. Initially Wild Charge has 3 hits, but hitting any enemies with abilities or boosted attacks previously within 5s provides up to 3 stacks, each stack adding an additional hit to Wild Charge (capped at 6 hits). Stacks have to be consumed within 5s. The first hit deals full damage and subsequent hits deal half damage. Zeraora is untargetable for the duration of this move (1.2s at 0 stacks, 1.5s at 1 stack, 1.8s at 2 stacks and 2s at 3 stacks).
rsb.notes: Zeraora takes 1% remaining HP (per hit) as physical damage upon use. The first hit deals 2 instances of recoil damage and subsequent hits deal only 1.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also deals damage to nearby enemies when it hits.

skills.name: Plasma Gale
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 20% Attack Speed, 15% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Unleash a blast of lightning, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and throw them. This also creates a zone of plasma that increases the user's basic attack range and damage dealt while inside this zone.

rsb.name: Plasma Gale
rsb.label: Damage - Trail
rsb.true_desc: Become unstoppable for 0.5s and launch a bolt of lightning that travels towards the target enemy; dealing damage and knocking up enemies hit along the path for 0.5s and then once again in an area when reaching the target, knocking all enemies hit into the air. Creates an area of electricity for 5s centered on the initial target that paralyzes enemies caught within, increasing Zeraora's auto attack range and auto attack damage by 20% while inside the area.

name: Zoroark
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Zoroark's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Illusion
skills.description: The user takes the form of a random wild Pokémon or Pokémon from the opposing team. The user returns to their original form when taking damage or using an auto attack or move (15s cd).

rsb.name: Illusion
rsb.true_desc: Zoroark takes the form of the nearest wild Pokémon or Pokémon from the opposing team. Zoroark returns to their original form when taking damage, using an auto attack or move, when attempting to score, or when recalling to base. Applying the illusion applies Invulnerable for 20 frames (1/3s). This ability has a 15s cooldown.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted with every third attack, dealing increased damage.

skills.name: Slash
skills.description: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit.

rsb.name: Slash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit.

upgrades.name: Shadow Claw
upgrades.description1: Dash in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit and leaving them unable to act for a short time. If this move hits an enemy near the end point of the dash, they will be thrown instead of being left unable to act.
upgrades.description2: Increases the length of time enemies are thrown.

rsb.name: Shadow Claw
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dash in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies, and leaving them unable to act for 0.1s. If this move hits an enemy near the end point of the dash, they will be thrown for 0.3s instead of being left unable to act.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the length of time enemies are thrown to 0.6s.

upgrades.name: Cut
upgrades.description1: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies, and restoring the Zoroark's HP.
upgrades.description2: Increases the amount of HP this move restores.

rsb.name: Cut
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies, and restoring Zoroark's HP.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the amount of HP this move restores.

skills.name: Fury Swipes
skills.description: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies. If this move hits an enemy, for a short time afterwards, this move can be activated again.

rsb.name: Fury Swipes
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies. If this move hits an enemy, for a short time, this move can be used again.

upgrades.name: Night Slash
upgrades.description1: For a short time, change the user’s normal movement to dash attacks. After performing a dash attack, the user’s next auto attack changes to a special auto attack. During this move’s effect duration, whenever Zoroark hits an enemy with other moves or special auto attacks, this move’s effect duration increases and the user is able to use Night Slash again. This move’s effect duration ends if the user moves when it’s unable to use Night Slash. During this move’s effect duration, if Zoroark hits enemies with a total of six moves and/or special auto attacks, Zoroark will jump into the air and then while landing, slash a set area-of-effect, dealing damage to enemies. Zoroark recovers HP if they hit enemies with this slashing attack. While jumping, the user is able to use Shadow Claw or Cut to move a set distance.
upgrades.description2: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

rsb.name: Night Slash
rsb.label: Damage - Dash
rsb.true_desc: For 2s, changes the user’s normal movement to dash attacks. After performing a dash attack, the user’s next auto attack changes to a unique boosted attack. During this move’s effect duration, whenever Zoroark hits enemies with other moves or unique boosted attacks, this move’s effect duration is reset to 2s and the user is able to use Night Slash again. This move’s effect duration ends if the user moves when they're unable to use Night Slash. During this move’s effect duration, if Zoroark hits enemies with a total of six moves and/or unique boosted attacks, the user will jump into the air becoming invincible, and then while landing, slash a set area-of-effect, dealing damage to enemies and additional damage to enemies based on how much HP they are missing. Zoroark recovers HP if hitting enemies with this slashing attack. While jumping, the user is able to use Shadow Claw or Cut to move a set distance.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Deals an additional 10% missing enemy HP as damage. Against Wild Pokemon: The total damage is capped at 1000.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

upgrades.name: Feint Attack
upgrades.description1: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies and reducing all of the user’s move cooldowns. If this move hits an enemy, for a short time, the location where the dash started is marked, and the user is able to use this move again; returning to the marked location and dealing damage to enemies. A new mark is left where the dash started. As long as there is a mark, if the user uses another move, the mark will move to where the move was used. If the user hits enemies four times with either Feint Attack or other moves without interrupting the chain of marking, the next use of Feint Attack changes. If this changed form of Feint Attack is used, Zoroark leaps at the designated enemy and deals damage to them before landing in the designated direction.
upgrades.description2: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

rsb.name: Feint Attack
rsb.label: Damage - Dash
rsb.true_desc: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies and resetting all of the user’s move cooldowns. If this move hits an enemy, for 3s, the location where the dash started is marked, and the user is able to use this move again, returning to the marked location, dealing damage to enemies. A new mark is left where that dash started. As long as there is a mark, if the user uses another move, the mark will move to where the move was used. If the user hits enemies four times with either Feint Attack or other moves without interrupting the chain of marking, the next use of Feint Attack changes. If this changed form of Feint Attack is used, Zoroark leaps at the designated enemy. Zoroark designates a direction during the leap to bounce off the target in a designated direction to perform a slashing attack. This slashing attack deals damage to the originally designated target and any Pokémon in the slash area of effect. This slash also deals additional damage based on missing HP.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Deals an additional 15% missing enemy HP as damage. Against Wild Pokemon: The total damage is capped at 1200.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

skills.name: Nightfall Daze
skills.buffs: 80% Movement Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Release dark shockwaves, dealing damage to enemies hit. Three shockwaves are released, and each one has an increasingly larger area-of-effect. Zoroark is immune to hindrances while releasing shockwaves.

rsb.name: Nightfall Daze
rsb.label: Damage - per Shockwave
rsb.true_desc: Release dark shockwaves, dealing damage to enemies hit. Three shockwaves are released, and each one has an increasingly larger area-of-effect. The user is immune to hindrances while releasing shockwaves.
